text.100: [03] tatra aya.m, buddha anussati, sa atthikaa, pa~n~navaa assa, tadaa  aha.m, yaani idha bhuutaani, gacchaami iti, ati ito, kikii iva, bahu  upakaara.m, madhu udaka.m, su upadhaarita.m, yopi aya.m ^a^M0.0011^ea^, idaani aha.m,  sace aya.m, appassuto aya.m, itara itarena, saddhaa idha vitta.m, kamma  upanissayo, tathaa upama.m, ratti uparato, vi upasamo iccatra  pubbassaraana.m lope kate --
text.1005: [03] ^b^puma^eb^ntassa savibhattissa ^b^a.m^eb^ hoti aalapanekavacane  pare. he puma.m, he pumaano, puma.m, pumaano.
text.1008: [03] ^b^puma^eb^ntassa ^b^aau^eb^aadesaa honti vaa ^b^naa^eb^mhi  vibhattimhi. ^b^ca^eb^saddena pumakammathaamantassa cu'kaaro vaa  ^b^sasmaa^eb^su. pumaanaa pumunaa pumena vaa.
text.1012: [03] ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^yuvamaghavaa^eb^diinamantassa vaa ^b^aanaa^eb^deso  hoti sabbavibhattiisu. ``u naamhi caa''ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^saddena  pumantassukaaro vaa ^b^sasmaa^eb^su vibhattiisu. ``jhalato sassa no  vaa''ti ^b^no^eb^. pumuno pumassa, pumaana.m.
text.1015: [03] ^b^jhala^eb^iccetehi ^b^smaa^eb^vacanassa ^b^naa^eb^ hoti.  ^b^ca^eb^ggaha.na.m kvaci nivattanattha.m. pumaanaa pumunaa pumaa pumasmaa  pumamhaa, pumaanehi pumaanebhi pumehi pumebhi, pumuno pumassa, pumaana.m.
text.1017: [03] ^b^puma^eb^ntassa savibhattissa ^b^aane^eb^aadeso hoti vaa  smi.mmhi vibhattimhi. pumaane pume pumasmi.m pumamhi.

text.1022: [02] yuvaa yuvaano, yuvaanaa yuvaa, he yuva he yuvaa he yuvaana  he yuvaanaa, bhavanto yuvaanaa, yuvaana.m yuva.m, yuvaane yuve.

text.1032: [02] saa ti.t.thanti, he sa he saa, he saa, sa.m, se, sena,  saahi saabhi, sassa saaya, saana.m, saa sasmaa samhaa, saahi saabhi,  sassa, saana.m, se sasmi.m samhi, saasu.

text.104: [03] tatraaya.m, buddhaanussati, saatthikaa, pa~n~navaassa, tadaaha.m, yaaniidha  bhuutaani, gacchaamiiti, atiito, kikiiva, ^b^ba^eb^huupakaara.m, madhuudaka.m,  suupadhaarita.m, yopaaya.m, idaanaaha.m, sacaaya.m, appassutaaya.m, itariitarena,  saddhiidha vitta.m, kammuupanissayo, tathuupama.m, rattuuparato, vuupasamo.

text.1052: [03] ^b^jhalapa^eb^iccetehi parassa ^b^a.m^eb^vacanassa, ^b^ma^eb^kaarassa  ca niggahiita.m aadeso hoti. aggi.m.

text.1089: [03] ``agho rassa''ntiaadinaava siddhepi rassatte punaarambho  niyamattho, tena ``bho go''tiaadiisu na bhavati. da.n.dii da.n.dino.

text.1093: [03] ``jhalato caa''ti ^b^naa^eb^. da.n.dinaa da.n.dismaa da.n.dimhaa,  da.n.diihi da.n.diibhi, da.n.dino da.n.dissa, da.n.diina.m.
text.1094: [03] ``jhato, katarassaa''ti ca vattate, pure viya ``vaa''ti ca.

text.114: [03] ekaarassa padantabhuutassa .thaane sare pare kvaci ^b^ya^eb^kaaraadeso  hoti. ^b^a^eb^kaaremeteyesaddaadissevaaya.m vidhi, ^b^ya^eb^nti ya.m ruupa.m,  e eva anto ^b^edanto,^eb^ aadesi.t.thaane aadissatiiti ^b^aadeso^eb^.  ``bya~njane''ti adhikicca ``diigha''nti diigho.

text.1175: [03] katarassattaa ^b^ve^eb^aadeso na hoti. sesa.m  ^b^bhikkhu^eb^saddasama.m, rassattameva viseso. abhibhu.m, abhibhuu abhibhuvo  ^a^M0.0078^ea^, abhibhunaa, abhibhuuhi abhibhuubhi, abhibhuno abhibhussa,  abhibhuuna.m iccaadi.

text.1177: [03] tathaa ^b^sabba~n~nuu^eb^saddassa ^b^yo^eb^sveva viseso. so  sabba~n~nuu te sabba~n~nuu, ^b^yo^eb^lopaabhaave rassatta.m, ``lato vokaaro  caa''ti ettha ^b^kaara^eb^ggaha.nena ^b^yo^eb^na.m ^b^no^eb^aadeso.  ^b^vaa^eb^dhikaarassa vavatthitavibhaasattaa na ca ^b^vo^eb^kaaro.  sabba~n~nuno, bho sabba~n~nu, bhonto sabba~n~nuu sabba~n~nuno, sabba~n~nu.m,  sabba~n~nuu sabba~n~nuno iccaadi.

text.1185: [03] ^b^go^eb^iccetassa ^b^o^eb^kaarassa ^b^aavaa^eb^deso hoti  ^b^yo^eb^su. ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^naa smaa smi.msu^eb^iccetesu ca.  ``tato yonamo tuu''ti ettha ^b^tu^eb^ggaha.nena yonamokaaro,  saralopaadi. gaavo ti.t.thanti.
text.1187: [03] ^b^go^eb^iccetassa ^b^o^eb^kaarassa ^b^aava ava^eb^iccete  aadesaa honti ^b^a.m^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. seddena ^b^yo naa sa  smaasmi.msu^eb^iccetesu ca ^b^avaa^eb^deso hoti. gavo gacchanti, he  go, he gaavo he gavo.
text.119: [03] okaarukaaraana.m antabhuutaana.m sare pare kvaci ^b^va^eb^kaaraadeso  hoti. ^b^ka kha ya ta^eb^saddaadi^b^o^eb^kaarasseda.m gaha.na.m.
text.1190: [03] ^b^aava^eb^iccetassa ^b^gaavaa^eb^desassa antasarassa  ^b^u^eb^kaaraadeso hoti vaa ^b^a.m^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. aavassa a  aava, tassa ^b^aava^eb^saddantassa. ``a.mmo''tiaadinaa niggahiita.m.  gaavu.m gaava.m gava.m, gaavo gavo.
text.1193: [03] ^b^su hi naa^eb^iccetesu sabbassa ^b^go^eb^saddassa  ^b^go.naa^eb^deso hoti vaa. ^b^ca^eb^saddena sesesu ca. go.no,  go.naa, he go.na he go.naa, go.na.m, go.ne, go.nena, go.nehi go.nebhi,  go.nassa.

text.1353: [03] sabbesa.m ^b^tumha amha^eb^saddaana.m savibhattiina.m padasmaa paresa.m  ^b^vo no^eb^aadesaa honti yathaakkama.m dutiyaacatutthiicha.t.thiisu bahuvacanesu  navaa. ettha ca ``ekavacanesuu''ti vakkhamaanattaa ``bahuvacanesuu''ti  laddha.m. pahaaya vo gamissaami, maa no ajja vikanti.msu, dhamma.m vo  bhikkhave desissaami, sa.mvibhajetha no rajjena, tu.t.thosmi vo pakatiyaa,  satthaa no bhagavaa anuppatto.

text.1495: [03] tattha ^b^pa^eb^saddo pakaaraa'dikamma  padhaani'ssariya'ntobhaavaviyoga tappara bhusattha sambhavatitti anaavila  patthanaadiisu. ^b^pa^eb^iti ayamupasaggo etesu pakaaraadiisu atthesu  vattati, yathaa -- ^b^pakaare^eb^ pa~n~naa, ^b^aadikamme^eb^ vippakata.m,  ^b^padhaane^eb^ pa.niita.m, padhaana.m padhaanatta.m, ^b^issariye^eb^ pabhuu aya.m  desassa, ^b^antobhaave^eb^ pakkhitta.m, ^b^viyoge^eb^ pavaasii,  ^b^tappare^eb^ paacariyo, ^b^bhusatthe^eb^ pavuddhakaayo, ^b^sambhave^eb^  himavataa ga"ngaa pabhavati, ^b^tittiya.m^eb^ pahuutamanna.m, ^b^anaavile^eb^  pasannamudaka.m, ^b^patthane^eb^ pa.nihita.m.
text.1496: [03] ^b^paraa^eb^iti ^a^M0.0127^ea^ parihaani paraajaya  gativikkamaa'masanaadiisu. yathaa -- ^b^parihaaniya.m^eb^ paraabhavo,  ^b^paraajaye^eb^ paraajito, ^b^gatiya.m^eb^ paraayana.m. ^b^vikkame^eb^  parakkamati, ^b^aamasane^eb^ a"ngassa paraamasana.m.
text.1497: [03] ^b^ni^eb^iti nissesa niggata niihara.na'ntopavesanaa'bhaavanisedha  nikkhanta paatubhaavaa'vadhaara.na vibhajana upamuu'padhaara.naa'vasaanachekaadiisu.  ^b^nissese^eb^ nirutti, niravasesa.m deti, ^b^niggate^eb^  nikkileso, niyyaati, ^b^niihara.ne^eb^ niddhaara.na.m, ^b^antopavesane^eb^  nikhaato, ^b^abhaave^eb^ nimmakkhika.m, ^b^nisedhe^eb^ nivaareti,  ^b^nikkhante^eb^ nibbaano, nibbaana.m, ^b^paatubhaave^eb^ nimmita.m,  ^b^avadhaara.ne^eb^ nicchayo, ^b^vibhajane^eb^ niddeso, ^b^upamaaya.m^eb^  nidassana.m, ^b^upadhaara.ne^eb^ nisaamana.m, ^b^avasaane^eb^ ni.t.thita.m,  ^b^cheke^eb^ nipu.no.
text.1499: [03] ^b^u^eb^iti uggatu'ddhakamma padhaana viyoga sambhava  atthalaabhasatti saruupakathanaadiisu. ^b^uggate^eb^ uggacchati,  ^b^uddhakamme^eb^ aasanaa u.t.thito, ukkhepo, ^b^padhaane^eb^ uttamo,  lokuttaro, ^b^viyoge^eb^ ubbaasito, ^b^sambhave^eb^ ubbhuuto,  ^b^atthalaabhe^eb^ uppanna.m ~naa.na.m, ^b^sattiya.m^eb^ ussahati gantu.m,  ^b^saruupakathane^eb^ uddisati sutta.m.
text.1500: [03] ^b^du^eb^iti asobhanaa'bhaavakucchitaa'samiddhi kiccha  viruupataadiisu. ^b^asobhane^eb^ duggandho, ^b^abhaave^eb^ dubbhikkha.m,  ^b^kucchite^eb^ dukka.ta.m, ^b^asamiddhiya.m^eb^ dussassa.m, ^b^kicche^eb^ dukkara.m,  ^b^viruupataaya.m^eb^ dubba.n.no, dummukho.
text.1501: [03] ^b^sa.m^eb^iti samodhaana sammaasama samantabhaavasa"ngata  sa"nkhepabhusattha sahattha appattha pabhavaa'bhimukhabhaava sa"ngaha pidhaana  punappunakara.na samiddhaadiisu. ^b^samodhaane^eb^ sandhi,  ^b^sammaasamesu^eb^ samaadhi ^a^M0.0128^ea^, sampayutto, ^b^samantabhaave^eb^  sa.mki.n.naa samullapanaa, ^b^sa"ngate^eb^ sa"ngamo, ^b^sa"nkhepe^eb^ samaaso,  ^b^bhusatthe^eb^ saaratto, ^b^sahatthe^eb^ sa.mvaaso, ^b^appatthe^eb^ samaggho.  ^b^pabhave^eb^ sambhavo, ^b^abhimukhabhaave^eb^ sammukha.m, ^b^sa"ngahe^eb^  sa"nga.nhaati, ^b^pidhaane^eb^ sa.mvuta.m, ^b^punappunakara.ne^eb^ sandhaavati,  ^b^samiddhiya.m^eb^ sampanno.
text.1502: [03] ^b^vi^eb^iti visesa vividha viruddha vigata viyoga  viruupataadiisu. ^b^visese^eb^ vimutti visi.t.tho, ^b^vividhe^eb^  vimati vicitra.m, ^b^viruddhe^eb^ vivaado, ^b^vigate^eb^ vimala.m,  ^b^viyoge^eb^ vippayutto, ^b^viruupataaya.m^eb^ viruupo.
text.1503: [03] ^b^ava^eb^iti adhobhaaga viyoga paribhava jaanana suddhi  nicchayadesa theyyaadiisu. ^b^adhobhaage^eb^ avakkhittacakkhu,  ^b^viyoge^eb^ omukkaupaahano avakokila.m vana.m, ^b^paribhave^eb^  avajaanana.m avama~n~nati, ^b^jaanane^eb^ avagacchati, ^b^suddhiya.m^eb^  vodaana.m, ^b^nicchaye^eb^ avadhaara.na.m, ^b^dese^eb^ avakaaso, ^b^theyye^eb^  avahaaro.
text.1504: [03] ^b^anu^eb^iti anugataa'nupacchinna pacchattha bhusattha saadissa  hiinatatiyattha lakkha.ni'tthambhuutakkhaana bhaaga vicchaadiisu.  ^b^anugate^eb^ anveti, ^b^anupacchinne^eb^ anusayo, ^b^pacchaasaddatthe^eb^  anuratha.m, ^b^bhusatthe^eb^ anuratto, ^b^saadisse^eb^ anuruupa.m. ^b^hiine^eb^  anusaariputta.m pa~n~navanto, ^b^tatiyatthe^eb^ nadimanvavasitaa senaa,  ^b^lakkha.ne^eb^ rukkha.m anu vijjotate vijju, ^b^itthambhuutakkhaane^eb^  saadhu devadatto maatara.m anu, ^b^bhaage^eb^ yadettha ma.m anusiyaa ta.m  diiyatu, ^b^vicchaaya.m^eb^ rukkha.m rukkha.m anu vijjotate cando.
text.1505: [03] ^b^pari^eb^iti samantatobhaava pariccheda vajjanaa'li"ngana  nivaasanapuujaabhojanaa'vajaanana dosakkhaana lakkha.naadiisu.  ^b^samantatobhaave^eb^ parivuto, ^b^paricchede^eb^ pari~n~neyya.m, ^b^vajjane^eb^  pariharati ^a^M0.0129^ea^, ^b^aali"ngane^eb^ parissajati, ^b^nivaasane^eb^  vattha.m paridhassati, ^b^puujaaya.m^eb^ paaricariyaa, ^b^bhojane^eb^ bhikkhu.m  parivisati. ^b^avajaanane^eb^ paribhavati, ^b^dosakkhaane^eb^  paribhaasati, ^b^lakkha.naadiisu^eb^ rukkha.m pari vijjotate vijjuiccaadi.
text.1506: [03] ^b^adhi^eb^iti  adhiki'ssa'ruuparibhaavaa'dhibhavanajjhaayanaa'dhi.t.thaananicchayapaapu.nanaadiisu.  ^b^adhike^eb^ adhisiila.m, ^b^issare^eb^ adhipati, adhi brahmadatte  pa~ncaalaa, ^b^uparibhaave^eb^ adhirohati, pathavi.m adhisessati,  ^b^adhibhavane^eb^ adhibhavati, ^b^ajjhaayane^eb^ byaakara.namadhiite,  ^b^adhi.t.thaane^eb^ bhuumikampaadi.m adhi.t.thaati, ^b^nicchaye^eb^ adhimokkho,  ^b^paapu.nane^eb^ bhogakkhandha.m adhigacchati.
text.1507: [03] ^b^abhi^eb^iti abhimukhabhaava visi.t.thaa'dhi ku'ddhakamma kula  saaruppavandana lakkha.ni'tthambhuutakkhaana vicchaadiisu.  ^b^abhimukhabhaave^eb^ abhimukho abhikkamati, ^b^visi.t.the^eb^ abhidhammo,  ^b^adhike^eb^ abhivassati, ^b^uddhakamme^eb^ abhiruhati, ^b^kule^eb^  abhijaato, ^b^saaruppe^eb^ abhiruupo, ^b^vandane^eb^ abhivaadeti,  ^b^lakkha.naadiisu^eb^ purimasama.m.
text.1508: [03] ^b^pati^eb^iti patigata pa.tilomapatinidhi patidaana  nisedhanivattana saadissa patikara.naa'daana patibodha pa.ticca  lakkha.ni'tthambhuutakkhaana bhaagavicchaadiisu. ^b^patigate^eb^ paccakkha.m,  ^b^pa.tilome^eb^ patisota.m, ^b^patinidhimhi^eb^ aacariyato pati  sisso, ^b^patidaane^eb^ telatthikassa ghata.m pati dadaati, ^b^nisedhe^eb^  pa.tisedhana.m, ^b^nivattane^eb^ pa.tikkamati, ^b^saadisse^eb^ patiruupaka.m,  ^b^patikara.ne^eb^ patikaaro, ^b^aadaane^eb^ patigga.nhaati, ^b^patibodhe^eb^  pa.tivedho, ^b^pa.ticce^eb^ paccayo, ^b^lakkha.naadiisu^eb^ purimasama.m.
text.1509: [03] ^b^su^eb^iti sobhana su.t.thusammaa samiddhi sukhatthaadiisu.  ^b^sobhane^eb^ sugandho, ^b^su.t.thusammaadatthesu^eb^ su.t.thu gato sugato, sammaa  gatotipi sugato, ^b^samiddhiya.m^eb^ subhikkha.m, ^b^sukhatthe^eb^ sukaro.
text.1510: [03] ^b^aa^eb^iti ^a^M0.0130^ea^ abhimukhabhaavu'ddhakamma  mariyaadaa'bhividhi patti'cchaaparissajana aadikammaggaha.na nivaasa  samiipa'vhaanaadiisu. ^b^abhimukhabhaave^eb^ aagacchati, ^b^uddhakamme^eb^  aarohati, ^b^mariyaadaaya.m^eb^ aapabbataa khetta.m, ^b^abhividhimhi^eb^  aakumaara.m yaso kaccaayanassa, ^b^pattiya.m^eb^ aapattimaapanno,  ^b^icchaaya.m^eb^ aaka"nkhaa, ^b^parissajane^eb^ aali"ngana.m,  ^b^aadikamme^eb^ aarambho, ^b^gaha.ne^eb^ aadiiyati aalambati,  ^b^nivaase^eb^ aavasatho, ^b^samiipe^eb^ aasanna.m, ^b^avhaane^eb^  aamantesi.
text.1511: [03] ^b^ati^eb^iti abhikkamanaa'tikkantaa'tisaya bhusatthaadiisu.  ^b^atikkamane^eb^ atirocati amhehi, atiito, ^b^atikkante^eb^  accanta.m, ^b^atisaye^eb^ atikusalo, ^b^bhusatthe^eb^ atikkodho  ativuddhi.
text.1512: [03] ^b^api^eb^iti sambhaavanaa'pekkhaa samuccaya garaha pa~nhaadiisu.  ^b^sambhaavanaaya.m^eb^ api dibbesu kaamesu, merumpi vinivijjhitvaa  gaccheyya, ^b^apekkhaaya.m^eb^ ayampi dhammo aniyato, ^b^samuccaye^eb^  itipi araha.m, antampi antagu.nampi aadaaya, ^b^garahe^eb^ api amhaaka.m  pa.n.ditaka, ^b^pa~nhe^eb^ api bhante bhikkha.m labhittha.
text.1513: [03] ^b^apa^eb^iti apagata garaha vajjana puujaa padussanaadiisu.  ^b^apagate^eb^ apamaano apeto, ^b^garahe^eb^ apagabbho, ^b^vajjane^eb^  apasaalaaya aayanti vaa.nijaa, ^b^puujaaya.m^eb^ vuddhaapacaayii,  ^b^padussane^eb^ aparajjhati.
text.1514: [03] ^b^upa^eb^iti upagamana samiipuu'papatti  saadissaa'dhikuu'paribhaavaa'nasana dosakkhaana sa~n~naa pubbakamma puujaa  gayhaakaara bhusatthaadiisu. ^b^upagamane^eb^ nisinna.m vaa upanisiideyya,  ^b^samiipe^eb^ upanagara.m, ^b^upapattiya.m^eb^ sagga.m loka.m upapajjati, atha  vaa ^b^upapatti^eb^ yutti, yathaa ^a^M0.0131^ea^-- upapattito ikkhatiiti  upekkhaa, ^b^saadisse^eb^ upamaana.m upamaa, ^b^adhike^eb^ upa khaariya.m  do.no, ^b^uparibhaave^eb^ upasampanno, ^b^anasane^eb^ upavaaso,  ^b^dosakkhaane^eb^ para.m upapadati, ^b^sa~n~naaya.m^eb^ upadhaa upasaggo,  ^b^pubbakamme^eb^ upakkamo upakaaro, ^b^puujaaya.m^eb^ buddhupa.t.thaako,  maatupa.t.thaana.m, ^b^gayhaakaare^eb^ soceyyapaccupa.t.thaana.m, ^b^bhusatthe^eb^ upaadaana.m,  upaayaaso, upanissayoti. iti anekatthaa hi upasaggaa.

text.1664: [03] ^b^bhaage^eb^ yadettha ma.m pati siyaa, ma.m pari, ma.m anu, ta.m diiyatu.
text.1665: [03] ^b^vicchaayoge^eb^ ^a^M0.0143^ea^ atthamattha.m pati saddo nivisati,  rukkha.m rukkha.m pati vijjotate cando, rukkha.m rukkha.m pari, rukkha.m  rukkha.m anu.
text.1666: [03] ``abhirabhaage''ti abhissa bhaagavajjitesu lakkha.naadiisu  kammappavacaniiyasa~n~naa vuttaa. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m  kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato, saadhu devadatto maatara.m abhi.
text.1669: [03] cha.t.thiina.m atthe kvaci dutiyaavibhatti hoti. antaraaabhito  parito pati pa.tibhaatiyoge aya.m. antaraa ca raajagaha.m antaraa ca  naa.landa.m addhaanamaggappa.tipanno, raajagahassa ca naa.landaaya ca majjheti  attho. abhito gaama.m vasati, parito gaama.m vasati, nadi.m nera~njara.m  pati, nera~njaraaya nadiyaa samiipeti attho. pa.tibhantu ta.m cunda  bojjha"ngaa, upamaa ma.m pa.tibhaati, upamaa mayha.m upa.t.thahatiiti attho.
text.1672: [03] tatiyaasattamiinamatthe ca kvaci li"ngamhaa dutiyaavibhatti hoti.
text.1673: [03] ^b^tatiyatthe^eb^ sace ma.m naalapissati, tva~nca ma.m naabhibhaasasi,  vinaa saddhamma.m kuto sukha.m, upaayamantarena na atthasiddhi.
text.1674: [03] ^b^sattamiyatthe^eb^ ^a^M0.0144^ea^-- kaale, upaanvajjhaavasassa  payoge, adhisi.t.thaavasaana.m payoge, tappaanacaare ca dutiyaa.
text.1675: [03] ^b^kaale^eb^ taava -- pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa, eka.m samaya.m  bhagavaa. ima.m ratti.m cattaaro mahaaraajaano.
text.1676: [03] ^b^upaa^eb^dipubbassa ^b^vasa^eb^dhaatussa payoge -- gaama.m  upavasati, gaama.m anuvasati, vihaara.m adhivasati, gaama.m aavasati,  agaara.m ajjhaavasati. tathaa pathavi.m adhisessati, gaama.m adhiti.t.thati,  gaama.m ajjhaavasati.
text.168: [03] ^b^jhala^eb^iccetesa.m ^b^iyauva^eb^iccete aadesaa honti vaa sare  pare, saralopo.
text.1683: [03] yena vaa kattaa upakara.nabhuutena vatthunaa kriya.m abyavadhaanena  karoti, yena vaa vikaroti, yena vaa paapu.naati, ta.m kaaraka.m  kara.nasa~n~na.m hoti.
text.1684: [03] kariiyate anenaati ^b^kara.na.m,^eb^ ettha ca satipi sabbakaarakaana.m  kriyaasaadhakatte ``yena vaa kayirate''ti visesetvaa vacana.m  kattuupakara.nabhuutesu kaarakesu saadhakatamasseva gaha.nattha.m.
text.1687: [22] sambhaaviiyati ta.m vutta.m, kara.na.m naama kaaraka''nti..
text.1689: [03] yathaa -- hatthena kamma.m karoti, cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, manasaa  dhamma.m vi~n~naaya. dattena viihayo lunaati, agginaa ku.ti.m jhaapeti.
text.169: [03] tiyanta.m, tiyaddha.m, aggiyaagaare, sattamiyatthe, pa~ncamiyanta.m,  duva"ngika.m, bhikkhuvaasane, puthuvaasane, sayambhuvaasane. ^b^vaa^eb^ti ki.m?  agyaagaare, sattamiiatthe, bhikkhuaasane nisiidati.
text.1692: [03] kattari ca kaarake li"ngamhaa tatiyaavibhatti hoti. caggaha.nena  itthambhuutalakkha.ne, kriyaapavagge, pubbasadisasamuunattha kalaha nipu.na  missaka sakhilatthaadiyoge, kaaladdhaanesu,  paccattakammatthapa~ncamiyatthaadiisu ca tatiyaa.
text.1695: [03] yo kriya.m attappadhaano hutvaa karoti, so kattusa~n~no hoti.
text.1696: [03] so tividho suddhakattaa hetukattaa kammakattaati. tattha yo  sayameva kriya.m karoti, so ^b^suddhakattaa^eb^. yo a~n~na.m kaatu.m samattha.m  akaronta.m kamma.m niyojeti, so ^b^hetukattaa,^eb^ yathaa -- gantu.m  samattho devadatto, tama~n~no payojeti ``gamayati devadatta''nti.
text.1697: [03] ya.m pana tattha tattha gacchati devadatto, tama~n~no payojayati  ``gamayati devadatta''nti hetvatthanidassana.m, tampi  saamatthiyadassanavasena ^a^M0.0146^ea^ vuttanti gahetabba.m. a~n~nathaa yadi  sayameva gacchati, ki.m tattha payojakabyaapaarena akaronta.m balena  kaarayati, paasaa.na.m u.t.thaapayatiitiaadika~nca na sijjheyya.
text.1701: [03] yo kattaara.m kaareti, so hetusa~n~no hoti, kattaa caati  hetukattusa~n~naa.
text.1702: [03] yo pana parassa kriya.m pa.ticca kammabhuutopi sukarattaa sayameva  sijjhanto viya hoti, so ^b^kammakattaa^eb^ naama, yathaa -- saya.m  kariiyate ka.to, sayameva paccate odanoti.
text.1705: [22] appayutto payutto vaa, sa kattaati pavuccati..
text.1710: [03] nanu ca ``sa.myogo jaayate''tiaadiisu katha.m pure asato  jananakriyaaya kattubhaavosiyaati? vuccate -- lokasa"nketasiddho hi  saddappayogo, avijjamaanampi hi loko saddaabhidheyyataaya vijjamaana.m  viya gahetvaa voharati ^a^M0.0147^ea^, vikappabuddhigahitaakaaroyeva hi  saddenaabhidhiiyate, na tu vatthusabhaavo, a~n~nathaa sutamaya~naa.nenapi  paccakkhena viya vatthusabhaavasacchikara.nappasa"ngo ca musaavaada  kudi.t.thivaadaadiinamabhaavappasa"ngo ca siyaa, tasmaa  buddhiparikappitapa~n~nattivasenapi saddappavatti hotiiti asato  sa.myogaadissapi hoteva jananakriyaaya kattukaarakataati.
text.1714: [21] buddhiyaa gahitattaa hi, sa.myogo jaayate iti.
text.1716: [03] tatra ^b^tatiyaa^eb^ jinena desito dhammo, buddhena jito maaro,  ahinaa da.t.tho naro, buddhena bodhito loko, saddhehi kaarito vihaaro.
text.1717: [03] abhihite na bhavati. ka.ta.m karoti devadatto, kaareti vaa.
text.1718: [03] ^b^itthambhuutassa lakkha.ne^eb^ -- saa bhinnena siisena paggharantena  lohitena pa.tivissakaana.m ujjhaapesi, uunapa~ncabandhanena pattena a~n~na.m  nava.m patta.m cetaapeyya, tida.n.dakena paribbaajakamaddakkhi.
text.1719: [03] ^b^apavagge^eb^ -- ekaaheneva baaraa.nasi.m paayaasi, navahi  maasehi vihaara.m ni.t.thaapesi, yojanena adhiita.m byaakara.na.m,  ^b^kriyaapavaggo^eb^ti kriyaaya aasu.m parini.t.thaapana.m.
text.1720: [03]  ^b^pubbaadiyoge^eb^ ^a^M0.0148^ea^-- maasena pubbo, pitaraa  sadiso, maataraa samo, kahaapa.nena uuno, dhanena vikalo, asinaa  kalaho, aacaarena nipu.no, vaacaaya nipu.no, gu.lena missaka.m, tilena  missaka.m, vaacaaya sakhilo, ma.ninaa attho, dhanena attho, pitaraa  tulyo.
text.1726: [03] ^b^saha saddhi.m sama.m naanaa vinaa ala.m ki^eb^miccevamaadiihi yoge  li"ngamhaa tatiyaavibhatti hoti, ^b^ca^eb^saddena sahatthepi.
text.1727: [03] tattha ^b^saha^eb^saddena yogo kriyaa gu.na dabba samavaaye  sambhavati. yathaa -- vitakkena saha vattati, puttena saha thuulo,  antevaasikasaddhivihaarikehi saha aacariyupajjhaayaana.m laabho, nisiidi  bhagavaa saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena, sahassena sama.m mitaa, sabbehi me piyehi  manaapehi naanaabhaavo vinaabhaavo, sa"ngho vinaapi gaggena uposatha.m  kareyya, ala.m te idha vaasena, ki.m me ekena ti.n.nena, purisena  thaamadassinaa, ki.m te ja.taahi dummedha, ki.m te ajinasaa.tiyaa.
text.1728: [03] ^b^sahatthe^eb^ ^a^M0.0149^ea^-- devadatto raajagaha.m paavisi  kokaalikena pacchaasama.nena, dukkho baalehi sa.mvaaso.
text.173: [03] ^b^go^eb^iccetassa ^b^o^eb^kaarassa sare pare ^b^avaa^eb^deso  hoti samaase. gavaajina.m, gave.laka.m. ^b^ca^eb^saddaggaha.nena uva.n.nassa  ^b^uvaavaa^eb^desaa. yathaa -- bhuvi, pasavo.
text.1730: [03] ^b^yoga^eb^ggaha.namihaanuvattate, hetvatthe, hetvatthappayoge ca  li"ngamhaa tatiyaavibhatti hoti.
text.1731: [03] kismi~nci phale di.t.thasaamatthiya.m kaara.na.m hetu, soyeva attho,  tasmi.m hetvatthe, annena vasati, dhammena vasati, vijjaaya vasati.
text.1737: [21] kena paa.ni kaamadado, kena paa.ni madhussavo.
text.1738: [22] kena te brahmacariyena, pu~n~na.m paa.nimhi ijjhati..
text.1739: [03] ^b^hetvatthappayoge^eb^ -- kena nimittena, kena payojanena,  kena.t.thena, kena hetunaa vasati.
text.1742: [03] kaaladdhaanadisaadesaadiisu caaya.m. tena samayena, tena kaalena,  kaalena dhammassava.na.m, so vo mamaccayena satthaa, maasena bhu~njati,  yojanena dhaavati. puratthimena dhatara.t.tho, dakkhi.nena viruu.lhako,  pacchimena viruupakkho, uttarena ^a^M0.0150^ea^ kasivanto janoghamaparena  ca, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami iccaadi.
text.1744: [03] yena byaadhimataa a"ngena a"ngino vikaaro lakkhiiyate, tattha  tatiyaavibhatti hoti. ettha ca a"ngamassa atthiiti ^b^a"nga.m,^eb^  sariira.m. akkhinaa kaa.no, hatthena ku.nii, paadena kha~njo, pi.t.thiyaa  khujjo.
text.1746: [03] visesiiyati visesitabba.m anenaati ^b^visesana.m,^eb^ gottaadi.  tasmi.m gottanaamajaatisippavayogu.nasa"nkhaate visesanatthe tatiyaavibhatti  hoti, ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^pakati^eb^aadiihi ca. gottena gotamo naatho.
text.1747: [21] saariputtoti naamena, vissuto pa~n~navaa ca so.
text.1751: [03] sippena na.lakaaro so, ekuunati.mso vayasaa, vijjaaya saadhu,  pa~n~naaya saadhu, tapasaa uttamo, suva.n.nena abhiruupo.
text.1752: [03] ^b^pakati^eb^aadiisu -- pakatiyaa abhiruupo, yebhuyyena mattikaa,  samena dhaavati, visamena dhaavati, dvido.nena dha~n~na.m ki.naati, sahassena  assake ki.naati iccaadi.
text.1757: [03] 302^b^.^eb^ ^b^yassa daatukaamo rocate dhaarayate vaa ta.m  sampadaana.m^eb^.
text.1758: [03] yassa vaa daatukaamo, yassa vaa rocate, yassa vaa dhaarayate, ta.m  kaaraka.m sampadaanasa~n~na.m hoti. sammaa padiiyate assaati  ^b^sampadaana.m,^eb^ pa.tiggaahako.
text.1759: [03] ta.m pana tividha.m diyyamaanassaanivaara.najjhesanaanumativasena.  yathaa -- buddhassa puppha.m yajati, bodhirukkhassa jala.m dadaati.  ^b^ajjhesane^eb^ -- yaacakaana.m dhana.m dadaati. ^b^anumatiya.m^eb^ --  bhikkhuuna.m daana.m deti.
text.176: [03] ^b^putha^eb^iccetassa nipaatassa ante kvaci ^b^ga^eb^kaaraagamo  hoti sare pare. aagacchatiiti ^b^aagamo,^eb^ asantuppatti aagamo.  ettha ca ``sare''ti nimittaasannavasena puthassa anteti labbhati.  puthageva, putha eva.
text.1762: [22] sampadaana.m tidhaa vutta.m, rukkha yaacaka bhikkhavo''ti..
text.1764: [03] ^b^rocanaa^eb^diisu pana -- sama.nassa rocate sacca.m,  maayasmantaanampi sa"nghabhedo ruccittha, yassaayasmato khamati, devadattassa  suva.n.nacchatta.m dhaarayate ya~n~nadatto.
text.1766: [03] 303^b^.^eb^ ^b^silaagha hanu .thaa sapa dhaara piha kudha  duhi ssaasuuya raadhikkha paccaasu.na anupatigi.napubbakattaarocanatthatadattha  tumatthaalamattha ma~n~naanaadarappaa.nini gatyatthakammani aasisattha sammuti  bhiyyasattamyatthesu ca^eb^.
text.1767: [03] catuppadamida.m ^a^M0.0152^ea^. ^b^silaagha^eb^ katthane, ^b^hanu^eb^  apanayane, ^b^.thaa^eb^ gatinivattimhi, ^b^sapa^eb^ akkose, ^b^dhara^eb^  dhaara.ne, ^b^piha^eb^ icchaaya.m iccetesa.m dhaatuuna.m payoge, ^b^kudha^eb^ kope,  ^b^duha^eb^ jigha.msaaya.m, ^b^issa^eb^ issaaya.m, ^b^usuuya^eb^ dosaavikara.ne  iccetesa.m tadatthavaaciina~nca dhaatuuna.m payoge ca ^b^raadha^eb^ hi.msaasa.mraadhesu,  ^b^ikkha^eb^ dassana"nkesuuti imesa.m payoge ca ^b^pati aa^eb^pubbassa  ^b^su^eb^ sava.neti imassa ca ^b^anupati^eb^pubbassa ^b^ge^eb^saddeti  imassa ca pubbakattaa ca aarocanatthappayoge, tadatthe, tumatthe,  alamatthappayoge ca ma~n~natippayoge anaadare appaa.nini ca gatyatthaana.m  kammani ca aasisatthappayoge ca sammuti bhiyyappayogesu ca  sattamyatthe caati ta.m kammaadikaaraka.m sampadaanasa~n~na.m hoti,  ^b^ca^eb^saddaggaha.nena pahi.natikappati pahoti upamaa~njalikara.na phaasu  atthaseyyappabhutiyoge ca pure viya catutthii.
text.1768: [03] ^b^silaaghaadippayoge^eb^ taava -- buddhassa silaaghate.  upajjhaayassa silaaghate, thometiiti attho.
text.1769: [03] hanute mayhameva, hanute tuyhameva, apalapatiiti attho.
text.1770: [03] upati.t.theyya sakyaputtaana.m va.d.dhakii, ettha ca upa.t.thaana.m naama  upagamana.m. bhikkhussa bhu~njamaanassa paaniiyena vaa vidhuupanena vaa  upati.t.theyya.
text.1771: [03] tuyha.m sapate, mayha.m sapate, ettha ca ^b^sapana.m^eb^ naama saccakara.na.m.
text.1772: [03] ^b^dhaarayatippayoge^eb^ dhanikoyeva sampadaana.m, suva.n.na.m te  dhaarayate, i.na.m dhaarayatiiti attho. tassa ra~n~no maya.m naaga.m dhaarayaama.
text.1773: [03] ^b^pihappayoge^eb^ ^a^M0.0153^ea^ icchitoyeva, devaapi tassa  pihayanti taadino, devaapi tesa.m pihayanti, sambuddhaana.m satiimata.m,  patthentiiti attho.
text.1774: [03] ^b^kodhaadiatthaana.m payoge^eb^ ya.m pati kopo, tassa kujjha  mahaaviira, yadiha.m tassa kuppeyya.m.
text.1775: [03] duhayati disaana.m megho, yo mittaana.m na dubbhati.
text.1777: [03] dujjanaa gu.navantaana.m usuuyanti, kaa usuuyaa vijaanata.m.
text.1778: [03] ^b^raadhikkhappayoge^eb^ yassa vipucchana.m kammavikhyaapanattha.m,  ^b^vaa^eb^dhikaarato dutiyaa ca. aaraadho me ra~n~no, ra~n~no  aparajjhati, raajaana.m vaa aparajjhati, kyaaha.m ayyaana.m aparajjhaami,  kyaaha.m ayye aparajjhaami vaa.
text.1779: [03] aayasmato upaalittherassa upasampadaapekkho upatisso,  aayasmanta.m vaa.
text.1780: [03] ^b^paccaasu.na anupatigi.naana.m pubbakattaa ca^eb^ su.notissa  dhaatussa paccaayoge, gi.nassa ca anupatiyoge pubbassa kammuno yo  kattaa, so sampadaanasa~n~no hoti. yathaa -- bhagavaa bhikkhuu  etadavoca, ettha ``bhikkhuu''ti akathitakamma.m, ``eta''nti  kathitakamma.m, pubbassa vacanakammassa kattaa bhagavaa. bhikkhuu bhagavato  paccassosu.m, aasu.nanti buddhassa bhikkhuu, tathaa bhikkhu jana.m dhamma.m  saaveti, tassa bhikkhuno jano anugi.naati, tassa bhikkhuno jano  patigi.naati, saadhukaaradaanaadinaa ta.m ussaahayatiiti attho.
text.1781: [21] yo vadeti sa kattaati, vutta.m kammanti vuccati.
text.1783: [03] ^b^aarocanatthappayoge^eb^ ^a^M0.0154^ea^ yassa aaroceti, ta.m  sampadaana.m. aarocayaami vo bhikkhave, pa.tivedayaami vo bhikkhave,  aamantayaami te mahaaraaja, aamanta kho ta.m gacchaamaati vaa. ettha ca  ^b^aarocana^eb^saddassa kathanappakaaratthattaa desanatthaadippayogepi catutthii.  dhamma.m vo desessaami, desetu bhante bhagavaa dhamma.m bhikkhuuna.m, yathaa  no bhagavaa byaakareyya, nirutti.m te pavakkhaami iccaadi.
text.1787: [03] ^b^a^eb^kaarantato li"ngamhaa parassa catutthekavacanassa  ^b^aayaa^eb^deso hoti vaa, saralopaadi.
text.1788: [03] buddhassatthaaya dhammassatthaaya sa"nghassatthaaya jiivita.m pariccajaami,  pi.n.dapaata.m pa.tisevaami neva davaaya na madaaya na ma.n.danaaya na  vibhuusanaaya, uunassa paaripuuriyaa, atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattati.
text.1790: [03] ^b^ala.m^eb^saddassa atthaa arahapa.tikkhepaa. ^b^arahatthe^eb^ --  ala.m me rajja.m, ala.m bhikkhu pattassa, akkhadhutto purisapuggalo naala.m  daarabhara.naaya, ala.m mallo mallassa, arahati mallo mallassa.
text.1791: [03] ^b^pa.tikkhepe^eb^ ^a^M0.0155^ea^-- ala.m te idha vaasena, ala.m me  hira~n~nasuva.n.nena, ki.m me ekena ti.n.nena, ki.m te ja.taahi dummedha, ki.m  tettha catuma.t.thassa.
text.1792: [03] ^b^ma~n~natippayoge anaadare appaa.nini^eb^ kammaniyeva --  ka.t.thassa tuva.m ma~n~ne, ka.li"ngarassa tuva.m ma~n~ne, jiivita.m ti.naayapi na  ma~n~namaano.
text.1793: [03] ^b^anaadare^eb^ti ki.m? suva.n.na.m ta.m ma~n~ne.  ^b^appaa.ninii^eb^ti ki.m? gadrabha.m tuva.m ma~n~ne.
text.1794: [03] ^b^gatyatthakammani vaa^eb^dhikaarato dutiyaa ca. appo saggaaya  gacchati, appo sagga.m gacchati, nibbaanaaya vajantiyaa, muulaaya  pa.tikasseyya, muula.m pa.tikasseyya.
text.1795: [03] ^b^aasiisanatthe aayubhaddakusalaa^eb^diyogeyeva, aayasmato  diighaayu hotu, ``totitaa sasmi.mnaasuu''ti ^b^ntu^eb^ssa savibhattissa  ^b^to^eb^ aadeso. bhadda.m bhavato hotu, kusala.m bhavato hotu, anaamaya.m  bhavato hotu, sukha.m bhavato hotu, attha.m bhavato hotu, hita.m bhavato  hotu, svaagata.m bhavato hotu, sotthi hotu sabbasattaana.m.
text.1796: [03] ^b^sammutippayoge^eb^ -- saadhu sammuti me tassa bhagavato  dassanaaya.
text.1798: [03] ^b^sattamiyatthe aavikara.na paatubhavanaa^eb^diyoge -- tuyha~ncassa  aavikaromi, tassa me sakko paaturahosi.
text.1799: [03] ^b^ca^eb^saddaggaha.nena ^a^M0.0156^ea^ pahi.naadikriyaayoge,  phaasuaadinaamapayoge ca -- tassa pahi.neyya, bhikkhuuna.m duuta.m paahesi,  kappati sama.naana.m aayogo, ekassa dinna.m dvinna.m ti.n.na.m pahoti, upama.m  te karissaami, a~njali.m te pagga.nhaami. tathaa tassa phaasu hoti,  lokassattho, ma.ninaa me attho, seyyo me attho iccaadi.
text.180: [03] ^b^paa^eb^iccetassa ante sare pare kvaci ^b^ga^eb^kaaraagamo hoti,  ^b^paa^eb^ssa anto ca saro rasso hoti. pageva vutyassa, paa eva.
text.1802: [03] ^b^namo^eb^saddayoge, ^b^sotthisvaagataadii^eb^hi ca yoge  li"ngamhaa catutthiivibhatti hoti. namo te buddha viiratthu, namo  karohi naagassa, namatthu buddhaana.m, namatthu bodhiyaa, sotthi pajaana.m,  svaagata.m te mahaaraaja, atho te aduraagata.m.
text.1805: [03] bhaavavaacimhi catutthiivibhatti hoti bhavissatikaale. bhavana.m  ^b^bhaavo^eb^. paccissate, pacana.m vaa paako, paakaaya vajati, pacitu.m  gacchatiiti attho. eva.m bhogaaya vajati iccaadi.
text.1810: [03] yasmaa vaa avadhito apeti, yasmaa vaa bhayahetuto bhaya.m bhavati,  yasmaa vaa akkhaataaraa vijja.m aadadaati, ta.m kaaraka.m apaadaanasa~n~na.m  hoti. apanetvaa ito aadadaatiiti ^b^apaadaana.m^eb^.
text.1811: [03] ta.m pana tividha.m visayabhedena niddi.t.thavisaya.m, upaattavisaya.m,  anumeyyavisaya~ncaati.
text.1812: [03] apaadaanasa~n~naavisayassa kriyaavisesassa niddi.t.thattaa  ^b^niddi.t.thavisaya.m^eb^. yathaa -- gaamaa apenti munayo, nagaraa  niggato raajaa.
text.1813: [03] ettha ca ``paapaa citta.m nivaaraye, paapaa nivaarentii''tiaadiisu  yadipi kaayasa.myogapubbakaapagamana.m natthi, tathaapi cittasa.myogapubbakassa  apagamanassa sambhavato iminaa ca apaadaanasa~n~naa.
text.1814: [03] yattha pana apagamanakriya.m upaatta.m ajjhaaha.ta.m visaya.m katvaa  pavattati, ta.m ^b^upaattavisaya.m^eb^. yathaa -- valaahakaa vijjotate  vijju, kusuulato pacatiiti. ettha ca ``valaahakaa nikkhamma,  kusuulato apanetvaa''ti ca pubbakriyaa ajjhaahariiyati.
text.1815: [03] ^b^anumeyyavisaya.m^eb^ yathaa -- maathuraa paa.taliputtakehi abhiruupaa.  ettha hi kenaci gu.nena ukka.msiiyantiiti anumeyyova kriyaaviseso.  idha pana ^b^duurantikaa^eb^disutte ^b^vibhatta^eb^ggaha.nena apaadaanasa~n~naa.
text.182: [03] 34^b^.^eb^ ^b^yava ma da na ta ra laa caagamaa^eb^.
text.1822: [03] ^b^bhayahetumhi^eb^ -- coraa bhaya.m jaayati, ta.nhaaya jaayatii bhaya.m,  paapato uttasati, ^b^akkhaatari^eb^ -- upajjhaayaa sikkha.m ga.nhaati,  aacariyamhaa adhiite, aacariyato su.naati.
text.1825: [03] dhaatavo ca naamaani ca ^b^dhaatunaamaani,^eb^ tesa.m  avihitalakkha.naana.m dhaatunaamaana.m payoge, upasaggayoge ca  ^b^aadi^eb^saddena nipaatayoge ca ta.myutta.m kaaraka.m apaadaanasa~n~na.m hoti.
text.1826: [03] ^b^dhaatuppayoge^eb^ taava -- ^b^paraaji^eb^yoge yo asayho,  pabhuuyoge pabhavo, janiyoge jaayamaanassa pakati ca. yathaa --  buddhasmaa paraajenti a~n~natitthiyaa. himavataa pabhavanti pa~nca  mahaanadiyo, anavatattamhaa mahaasaraa pabhavanti, aciravatiyaa pabhavanti  kunnadiyo. kaamato jaayatii soko, yasmaa so jaayate gini,  urasmaa jaato putto, kammato jaata.m indriya.m.
text.1827: [03] ^b^naamappayoge a~n~natthitaraa^eb^diihi yutte -- naa~n~natra dukkhaa  sambhoti, naa~n~na.m dukkhaa nirujjhati, tato a~n~nena kammena, tato  itara.m, ubhato sujaato putto iccaadi.
text.1828: [03] ^b^upasaggayuttesu^eb^ ^a^M0.0159^ea^ ^b^apaparii^eb^hi vajjanatthehi  yoge, mariyaadaabhividhiatthe aayoge ^b^pati^eb^naa  patinidhipatidaanatthena yoge ca. yathaa -- apasaalaaya aayanti  vaa.nijaa, saala.m vajjetvaati attho. tathaa paripabbataa devo vassati,  pabbata.m vajjetvaati attho. ^b^mariyaadaaya.m^eb^ -- aapabbataa khetta.m.  ^b^abhividhimhi^eb^ -- aabrahmalokaa saddo abbhuggacchati, brahmaloka.m  abhibyaapetvaati attho. ^b^patinidhimhi^eb^ -- buddhasmaa pati  saariputto dhammadesanaaya aalapati temaasa.m. ^b^patidaane^eb^ --  ghatamassa telasmaa pati dadaati, kanakamassa hira~n~nasmaa pati dadaati.
text.1829: [03] ^b^nipaatayuttesu rite naanaa vinaa^eb^diihi yoge -- rite  saddhammaa kuto sukha.m labhati. te bhikkhuu naanaakulaa pabbajitaa.  vinaa saddhammaa nattha~n~no koci naatho loke vijjati. ariyehi  puthagevaaya.m jano, yaava brahmalokaa saddo abbhuggacchati.
text.183: [03] sare pare ^b^ya^eb^kaaraadayo a.t.tha aagamaa honti vaa.  ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^ga^eb^kaaraagamo ca, vavatthitavibhaasatthoya.m  ^b^vaa^eb^saddo.
text.1830: [03] ^b^api^eb^ggaha.nena kammaapaadaanakaarakamajjhepi pa~ncamii  kaaladdhaanehi, pakkhasmaa vijjhati miga.m luddako, ito pakkhasmaa miga.m  vijjhatiiti vutta.m hoti. eva.m maasasmaa bhu~njati bhojana.m, kosaa  vijjhati ku~njara.m.
text.1831: [03] ^b^ca^eb^saddaggaha.nena ^b^pabhutyaa^eb^diatthe, tadatthappayoge ca --  yatoha.m bhagini ariyaaya jaatiyaa jaato, yato saraami attaana.m, yato  pattosmi vi~n~nuta.m, yatvaadhikara.namena.m, yato pabhuti, yato pa.t.thaaya, tato  pa.t.thaaya iccaadi.
text.1833: [03] rakkha.natthaana.m dhaatuuna.m payoge ya.m icchita.m, ta.m kaaraka.m  apaadaanasa~n~na.m hoti, ^b^ca^eb^kaaraadhikaarato anicchita~nca. rakkha.na~ncettha  nivaara.na.m, taayana~nca. kaake rakkhanti ta.n.dulaa, yavaa  pa.tisedhenti gaavo.
text.1834: [03] ^b^anicchita.m^eb^ yathaa -- paapaa citta.m ^b^ni^eb^vaaraye,  paapaanivaarenti, raajato vaa corato vaa aggito vaa udakato vaa  naanaabhayato vaa naanaarogato vaa naanaaupaddavato vaa aarakkha.m ga.nhantu.
text.1837: [03] yena adassanamicchita.m antaradhaayantena, ta.m kaaraka.m  apaadaanasa~n~na.m hoti vaa, antaradhaanevaaya.m. upajjhaayaa antaradhaayati  sisso, niliiyatiiti attho. maataapituuhi antaradhaayati putto.
text.1838: [03] ^b^vaa^eb^ti ki.m? jetavane antarahito. ^b^yenaa^eb^ti ki.m?  yakkho tattheva antaradhaayati.
text.1839: [03] 312^b^.^eb^  ^b^duurantikaddhakaalanimmaanatvaalopadisaayogavibhattaarappayoga  suddhappamocana hetu vivittappamaa.na pubbayoga bandhana gu.navacana pa~nha  kathanathokaakattuusu ca^eb^.
text.184: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0019^ea^ ^b^yakaaraagamo yathaa^eb^dibho ikaarekaaraadiisu.  yathaa ida.m yathayida.m, bya~njaneti adhikicca ``rassa''nti rassatta.m, yathaa  ida.m vaa, yathaa eva, yathaayeva, yatheva, eva.m maayida.m, maayeva.m, ta.myida.m,  ta.myeva, nayida.m, nayimassa, nayimaani, navayime dhammaa, buddhaana.myeva,  santiyeva, bodhiyaayeva, satiyeva, pathaviiyeva, dhaatuyeva, tesuyeva,  soyeva, paa.tiyekka.m.
text.1840: [03] duuratthe, antikatthe, addhanimmaane, kaalanimmaane, tvaalope,  disaayoge, vibhatte, aaratippayoge, suddhatthappayoge, pamocanatthappayoge,  hetvatthe, vivittatthappayoge, pamaa.natthe, pubbayoge, bandhanatthappayoge,  gu.navacane ^a^M0.0161^ea^, pa~nhe, kathane, thokatthe, akattari ca  yadavadhibhuuta.m, hetukammaadibhuuta~nca, ta.m kaaraka.m apaadaanasa~n~na.m hoti,  ^b^ca^eb^saddena yathaayoga.m dutiyaa, tatiyaa, cha.t.thii ca.
text.1841: [03] ^b^e^eb^ttha ca duurantika~nca duurantikattha~ncaati  ^b^duurantika^eb^nti saruupekasesa.m katvaa vuttanti da.t.thabba.m, tena  duurantikatthappayoge, tadatthe ca apaadaanasa~n~no hoti.
text.1842: [03] ^b^duuratthappayoge^eb^ taava -- kiivaduuro ito na.lakaaragaamo, tato  have duuratara.m vadanti, gaamato naatiduure. aarakaa te moghapurisaa  imasmaa dhammavinayaa, aarakaa tehi bhagavaa. ^b^duuratthe^eb^ -- duuratova  namassanti, addasa duuratova aagacchanta.m.
text.1843: [03] ^b^antikatthappayoge^eb^ -- antika.m gaamaa, aasanna.m gaamaa,  samiipa.m gaamaa, gaamassa samiipanti attho.
text.1844: [03] dutiyaa, tatiyaa ca, duura.m gaama.m aagato, duurena gaamena aagato,  duurato gaamaa aagatoti attho. duura.m gaamena vaa. antika.m gaama.m  aagato, antika.m gaamena vaa, aasanna.m gaama.m, aasanna.m gaamena vaa iccaadi.
text.1845: [03] ^b^addhakaalanimmaane^eb^ nimmaana.m naama parimaa.na.m, tasmi.m  gamyamaane -- ito mathuraaya catuusu yojanesu sa"nkassa.m, raajagahato  pa~ncacattaaliisayojanamatthake saavatthi.
text.1846: [03] ^b^kaalanimmaane^eb^ -- ito ekanavutikappamatthake vipassii  bhagavaa loke udapaadi, ito vassasahassaccayena buddho loke  uppajjissati.
text.1847: [03] ^b^tvaapaccayantassa lopo^eb^ naama tadatthasambhavepi  avijjamaanataa, tasmi.m tvaalope kammaadhikara.nesu -- paasaadaa  sa"nkameyya, paasaada.m abhiruhitvaa sa"nkameyyaati attho ^a^M0.0162^ea^.  tathaa hatthikkhandhaa sa"nkameyya, abhidhammaa pucchanti, abhidhamma.m sutvaa  vaa, abhidhammaa kathayanti, abhidhamma.m pa.thitvaa vaa, aasanaa vu.t.thaheyya,  aasane nisiiditvaa vaa.
text.1848: [03] ^b^disatthavaaciihi yoge, disatthe^eb^ ca -- ito saa purimaa  disaa, ito saa dakkhi.naa disaa, ito saa pacchimaa disaa, ito saa  uttaraa disaa, aviicito uparibhavaggaa, uddha.m paadatalaa, adho  kesamatthakaa iccaadi. ^b^disatthe^eb^ -- puratthimato  dakkhi.natotiaadi. ettha pana sattamiyatthe ^b^to^eb^paccayopi  bhavissati.
text.1849: [03] ^b^vibhatta.m^eb^ naama saya.m vibhattasseva tada~n~nato gu.nena vibhajana.m,  tasmi.m vibhatte -- yato pa.niitataro vaa visi.t.thataro vaa natthi,  attadanto tato vara.m. ki~ncaapi daanato siilameva vara.m, tato mayaa  sutaa assutameva bahutara.m, siilameva sutaa seyyo. cha.t.thii ca,  channavutiina.m paasa.n.daana.m pavara.m yadida.m sugatavinayo.
text.185: [03] tathaa sare ^b^vipari^eb^yaadito ca. vi a~njanaa viya~njanaa,  bya~njanaa vaa, eva.m viyaakaasi, byaakaasi. parianta.m pariyanta.m, eva.m  pariyaadaana.m, pariyu.t.thaana.m, pariyesati, pariyosaanamiti nicca.m. ni  aayogo niyaayogo. idha na bhavati, parikkhato, upaparikkhati.
text.1850: [03] ^b^aaratippayogo^eb^ naama virama.natthasaddappayogo. tattha --  asaddhammaa aarati, virati paapaa, paa.naatipaataa verama.nii, adinnaadaanaa  pa.tivirato, appa.tivirato musaavaadaa.
text.1851: [03] ^b^suddhatthappayoge^eb^ -- lobhaniiyehi dhammehi suddho asa.msa.t.tho,  maatito ca pitito ca suddho anupakku.t.tho agarahito.
text.1852: [03] ^b^pamocanatthappayoge^eb^ ^a^M0.0163^ea^-- parimutto dukkhasmaati  vadaami, mutto maarabandhanaa, na te muccanti maccunaa, muttoha.m  sabbapaasehi.
text.1853: [03] ^b^hetvatthe,^eb^ saruupekasesassa gahitattaa hetvatthappayoge ca  sabbanaamato -- kasmaa nu tumha.m daharaa na miiyare, kasmaa idheva mara.na.m  bhavissati, kasmaa hetunaa, yasmaa ca kammaani karonti, yasmaa tiha  bhikkhave, tasmaa tiha bhikkhave eva.m sikkhitabba.m, tasmaa buddhosmi  braahma.na, yasmaa kaara.naa, tasmaa kaara.naa, ki.m kaara.naa. dutiyaa, cha.t.thii  ca, ki.m kaara.na.m, ta.m kissa hetu, kissa tumhe kilamatha.
text.1854: [03] kena hetunaa, kena kaara.nena, yena midhekacce sattaa, tena  nimittena, tena vuttamiccaadiisu ``hetvatthe caa''ti tatiyaa.
text.1855: [03] ^b^vivitta.m^eb^ naama vivecana.m, tadatthappayoge -- vivitto paapakaa  dhammaa, vivicceva kaamehi, vivicca akusalehi dhammehi.
text.1856: [03] ^b^pamaa.natthe^eb^ tatiyaa ca, aayaamato ca vitthaarato ca  yojana.m, gambhiirato ca puthulato ca yojana.m candabhaagaaya parimaa.na.m,  parikkhepato navayojanasataparimaa.no majjhimapadeso.
text.1857: [03] diighaso nava vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyaa pamaa.nikaa kaaretabbaa.
text.1858: [03] ettha ca ``smaahismi.mna''miccaadito ``smaa''ti ca ``so,  vaa''ti ca vattamaane
text.186: [03] ^b^vakaaro ti^eb^saddaadito ava.n.nukaaresu. ti a"ngula.m  tiva"ngula.m, eva.m tiva"ngika.m, bhuuvaadayo, migii bhantaa vudikkhati,  pavuccati, paagu~n~navujutaa.
text.1861: [03] diighaso, diighamhaa vaa, [oraso, oramhaa vaa] tatiyaa ca,  yojana.m aayaamena, yojana.m vitthaarena, yojana.m ubbedhena saasaparaasi.
text.1862: [03] pa.thamatthavaacakena ^b^pubba^eb^saddena yogo ^b^pubbayogo,^eb^ ettha  ca ^b^pubba^eb^ggaha.na.m adisatthavuttino  ^b^pubbaa^eb^diggaha.nassupalakkha.nanti da.t.thabba.m, tena ^b^paraa^eb^diyogepi.  yathaa -- pubbeva me bhikkhave sambodhaa, ito pubbenaahosi, tato  para.m paccantimaa janapadaa, dhaatuli"ngehi paraa paccayaa, tato aparena  samayena, tato uttarimpi iccaadi.
text.1863: [03] ^b^bandhanatthappayoge^eb^ bandhanahetumhi i.ne pa~ncamii, tatiyaa ca  hoti, satasmaa baddho naro ra~n~naa, satena vaa baddho naro.
text.1864: [03] phalasaadhanahetubhuutassa gu.nassa vacana.m ^b^gu.navacana.m,^eb^ tasmi.m  gu.navacane pa~ncamii, tatiyaa ca, issariyaa jana.m rakkhati raajaa,  issariyena vaa, siilato na.m pasa.msanti, siilena vaa, pa~n~naaya  vimuttimano iccaadi.
text.1865: [03] ^b^pa~nhakathanesu^eb^ -- kutosi tva.m, kuto bhava.m, paa.taliputtato.  ettha ca ^b^kathana.m^eb^ naama vissajjana.m.
text.1866: [03] ^b^thokatthe asatvavacane^eb^ kara.ne tatiyaa ca, thokaa muccati,  thokena muccati vaa, appamattakaa muccati, appamattakena vaa, kicchaa  muccati, kicchena vaa.
text.1867: [03] ^b^akattari^eb^ ^a^M0.0165^ea^ ^b^akaarake ~naapakahetumhi^eb^ --  kammassa katattaa upacitattaa ussannattaa vipulattaa uppanna.m hoti  cakkhuvi~n~naa.na, ^b^na^eb^ taavida.m naamaruupa.m ahetuka.m sabbattha sabbadaa  sabbesa~nca ekasadisabhaavaapattito.
text.187: [03] ^b^makaaro lahu^eb^ppabhutito sare chandaanurakkha.naadimhi. lahu  essati lahumessati, eva.m garumessati, idhamaahu, kena te idha  mijjhati, bhadro kasaamiva, aakaase mabhipuujayi, ekamekassa, yena  midhekacce, aasatimeva.
text.1872: [03] karoti attano phalanti ^b^kaara.na.m,^eb^ kaarakahetu [janakahetu],  tasmi.m kaara.natthe ca pa~ncamiivibhatti hoti, vikappenaaya.m, hetvatthe  tatiyaaya ca vihitattaa, ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m  yathaabhuuta.m adassanaa evamida.m diighamaddhaana.m sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m,  avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, avijjaaya tveva  asesaviraaganirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho, sa"nkhaaranirodhaa  vi~n~naa.nanirodho, vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa iccaadi.
text.1877: [03] pariggayhatiiti ^b^pariggaho,^eb^ yo yassa pariggaho aayatto  sambandhii, ta.m pati so attho saamisa~n~no hoti. ^b^vaa^eb^ggaha.nena  saamitabba rujaadiyogepi.
text.1878: [03] ettha ^a^M0.0166^ea^ ca kriyaabhisambandhaabhaavaa na kaarakataa  sambhavati. saamibhaavo hi kriyaakaarakabhaavassa phalabhaavena gahito,  tathaa hi ``ra~n~no puriso''ti vutte yasmaa raajaa dadaati, puriso ca  patigga.nhaati, tasmaa ``raajapuriso''ti vi~n~naayati. eva.m yo yassa  aayatto sevakaadibhaavena vaa bha.n.dabhaavena vaa samiipa samuuhaavayavavikaara  kaariyaavatthaa jaati gu.na kriyaadivasena vaa, tassa sabbassaapi so  sambandhaadhaarabhuuto visesana.t.thaanii aagamiivasena tividhopi attho  ^b^saamii^eb^ naamaati gahetabbo.
text.188: [03] ^b^dakaaro^eb^ ^a^M0.0020^ea^ ^b^u^eb^upasagga saki kenaci ki~nci  kismi~nci koci sammaa yaava taava puna ya te'tattasaadiihi.  ^b^u^eb^upasaggato nicca.m, u aggo udaggo, eva.m udayo, udapaadi,  udaaha.ta.m, udito, udiirita.m, udeti.
text.1888: [03] ^b^visesanato^eb^ taava -- ra~n~no purisoti, ettha ca raajaa  purisa.m a~n~nasaamito viseseti nivattetiiti ^b^visesana.m,^eb^ puriso  tena visesiiyatiiti ^b^visesitabbo,^eb^ eva.m sabbattha visesitabbayoge  visesanatova cha.t.thii.
text.1889: [03] ^b^bha.n.dena sambandhe^eb^ -- pahuuta.m me dhana.m sakka, etassa  pa.tiviiso, bhikkhussa pattaciivara.m.
text.189: [03] nipaatato ca, saki eva sakideva, eva.m sakadaagaami,  mahaavuttisuttena ^b^i^eb^kaarassa ^b^a^eb^kaaro. tathaa kenacideva,  ki~ncideva, kismi~ncideva, kocideva, sammaa attho sammadattho,  rassatta.m. eva.m sammadakkhaato, sammada~n~naa vimuttaana.m, sammadeva,  yaavadattha.m, yaavadeva, taavadeva, punadeva.
text.1894: [03] ^b^kaariyasambandhe^eb^ -- yavassa a"nkuro, meghassa saddo,  puttaapi tassa bahavo, kammaana.m phala.m vipaako.
text.1895: [03] ^b^avatthaasambandhe^eb^ -- khandhaana.m paatubhaavo, khandhaana.m jaraa,  khandhaana.m bhedo.
text.1897: [03] ^b^gu.nasambandhe^eb^ -- suva.n.nassa va.n.no, va.n.no na khiiyetha  tathaagatassa, buddhassa gu.naghoso, pupphaana.m gandho, phalaana.m raso,  cittassa phusanaa, sippikaana.m sata.m natthi, tilaana.m mu.t.thi, tesa.m  samaayogo, sandhino vimokkho, tathaagatassa pa~n~naapaarami.m aarabbha,  pubbacariya.m vaa, sukha.m te, dukkha.m te, cetaso parivitakko udapaadi,  pa~n~naaya pa.tubhaavo, ruupassa lahutaa, ruupassa mudutaa, ruupassa upacayo.
text.1898: [03] ^b^kriyaasambandhe^eb^ -- paadassa ukkhipana.m, paadassa avakkhepana.m  vaa, hatthassa sami~njana.m, paadaana.m pasaara.na.m, dhaatuuna.m gamana.m, dhaatuuna.myeva  .thaana.m, nisajjaa, sayana.m vaa. tathaa tassa naamagottaadi, tassa kaara.na.m,  tassa maataapitaro, tassa purato paaturahosi, tassa pacchato, nagarassa  dakkhi.nato, vassaana.m tatiye maase, na tassa upamaa, kuverassa bali  iccaadi.
text.190: [03] naamato, yadattha.m, tadattha.m, yadantaraa, tadantaraa, tada"ngavimutti,  etadattha.m, attadattha.m, sadatthapasuto siyaa. yatetattasehi samaaseyeva.
text.1902: [03] ^b^tabba rujaadiyoge^eb^ -- mahaasenaapatiina.m ujjhaapetabba.m  vikanditabba.m viravitabba.m, devadattassa rujati, tassa rogo uppajjati,  rajakassa vattha.m dadaati, musaavaadassa ottappa.m iccaadi.
text.1906: [03] ^b^yajassa kara.ne^eb^ -- pupphassa buddha.m yajati, pupphena vaa,  ghatassa aggi.m juhoti.
text.1907: [03] ^b^suhitatthayoge^eb^ -- patta.m odanassa puuretvaa, odanenaati  attho. imameva kaaya.m puura.m naanappakaarassa asucino paccavekkhati,  puura.m hira~n~nasuva.n.nassa, puurati baalo paapassa.
text.1908: [03] ^b^tulyatthakimalamaadiyoge^eb^ -- pitussa tulyo, pitaraa vaa  tulyo, maatu sadiso, maataraa sadiso vaa, ki.m tassa ca tu.t.thassa, ki.m  tena tu.t.thenaati attho. ala.m tassa ca tu.t.thassa.
text.1909: [03] ^b^kattari kitappaccayayoge^eb^ -- sobhanaa kaccaayanassa kati,  kaccaayanena vaa, ra~n~no sammato, ra~n~naa vaa, eva.m ra~n~no ^a^M0.0169^ea^  puujito, ra~n~no sakkato, ra~n~no apacito, ra~n~no maanito, amata.m tesa.m  bhikkhave aparibhutta.m, yesa.m kaayagataasati aparibhuttaa iccaadi.
text.191: [03] ^b^aadi^eb^saddena a~n~nadattha.m, manasaada~n~naa vimuttaana.m, bahudeva  ratti.m, ahudeva bhaya.m.
text.1910: [03] ^b^sattamiyatthe kusalaadiyoge^eb^ -- kusalaa naccagiitassa  sikkhitaa caaturitthiyo, kusalo tva.m rathassa a"ngapacca"ngaana.m, kusalo  maggassa, kusalo amaggassa, santi hi bhante u.laaraa yakkhaa bhagavato  pasannaa, divasassa tikkhattu.m, divase tikkhattu.m vaa, maasassa dvikkhattu.m  iccaadi.

text.1917: [03] ^b^pa~ncamiyatthe parihaanibhayatthayoge^eb^ -- assavanataa dhammassa  parihaayanti, ki.m nu kho aha.m tassa sukhassa bhaayaami, sabbe tasanti  da.n.dassa, sabbe bhaayanti maccuno, bhiito catunna.m aasivisaana.m iccaadi.

text.1992: [03] so ca sa~n~naavasena chabbidho abyayiibhaavo kammadhaarayo digu  tappuriso bahubbiihi dvando caati.
text.1996: [03] ``upanagara.m''itiidha -- ^b^upa^eb^saddato pa.thamekavacana.m ^b^si,^eb^  tassa upasaggaparattaa ``sabbaasamaavusopasagganipaataadiihi caa''ti  lopo, ^b^nagara^eb^saddato cha.t.thekavacana.m ^b^sa,^eb^ nagarassa samiipanti  a~n~napadena viggahe --
text.1999: [03] ^b^upasagga^eb^pubbako, ^b^nipaata^eb^pubbako ca naamiko yuttattho  teheva attapubbakehi upasagganipaatehi saha nicca.m samasiiyate, so ca  samaaso ^b^abyayiibhaava^eb^sa~n~no hoti. idha  abyayiibhaavaadisa~n~naavidhaayakasuttaaneva vaa sa~n~naavidhaanamukhena  samaasavidhaayakaaniiti da.t.thabbaani.
text.2000: [03] tattha ^b^abyaya^eb^miti upasagganipaataana.m sa~n~naa,  li"ngavacanabhedepi byayarahitattaa, abyayaana.m attha.m vibhaavayatiiti  ^b^abyayiibhaavo^eb^ abyayatthapubba"ngamattaa, anabyaya.m abyaya.m bhavatiiti  vaa ^a^M0.0178^ea^ abyayiibhaavo. pubbapadatthappadhaano hi abyayiibhaavo,  ettha ca ``upasagganipaatapubbako''ti vuttattaa upasagganipaataanameva  pubbanipaato.
text.2002: [03] tesa.m naamaana.m payujjamaanapadatthaana.m yo yuttattho, so samaasasa~n~no  hoti, tada~n~na.m vaakyamiti ru.lha.m.
text.2007: [03] duvidha~ncassa samasana.m saddasamasanamatthasamasana~nca, tadubhayampi  luttasamaase paripu.n.nameva labbhati. aluttasamaase pana atthasamasanameva  vibhattilopaabhaavato, tatthaapi vaa ekapadattuupagamanato duvidhampi  labbhateva. dve hi samaasassa payojanaani  ekapadattamekavibhattitta~ncaati.
text.2008: [03] yutto attho ^b^yuttatto,^eb^ atha vaa yutto sa"ngato, sambandho  vaa attho yassa soya.m yuttattho, etena sa"ngatatthena ^b^yuttattha^eb^vacanena  bhinnatthaana.m ekatthiibhaavo samaasalakkha.nanti vutta.m hoti. ettha ca  ``naamaana''nti vacanena ``devadatto pacatii''tiaadiisu aakhyaatena  samaaso na hotiiti dasseti. sambandhatthena pana  ^b^yuttattha^eb^ggaha.nena ``bha.to ra~n~no putto devadattassaa''tiaadiisu  a~n~nama~n~naanapekkhesu, ``devadattassa ka.nhaa dantaa''tiaadiisu ca  a~n~nasaapekkhesu ^a^M0.0179^ea^ ayuttatthataaya samaaso na hotiiti diipeti.
text.2011: [03] idha padantarena vaa taddhitappaccayehi vaa ^b^aayaa^eb^dippaccayehi  vaa ekatthiibhuutaa yuttatthaa naama, tena ``tesa.m yuttatthaana.m samaasaana.m,  taddhitaa^b^yaa^eb^dippaccayantaana~nca vibhattiyo lopaniiyaa hontii''ti  attho. ^b^samaasa^eb^ggaha.naadhikaare pana sati ^b^tesa.m^eb^gaha.nena vaa  taddhitaa^b^yaa^eb^dippaccayanta vibhattilopo. ^b^ca^eb^ggaha.na.m  ``pabha"nkaro''tiaadiisu lopanivattanattha.m.
text.2014: [03] luttaasu vibhattiisu sarantassa assa yuttatthabhuutassa tividhassapi  li"ngassa pakatibhaavo hoti. ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^ki.msamudaya  idappaccayataa^eb^diisu niggahiitantassapi. nimittaabhaave  nemittakaabhaavassa idha anicchitattaa ayamatideso.
text.2015: [03] sakatthavirahenidha samaasassa ca li"ngabhaavaabhaavaa  vibhattuppattiyamasampattaaya.m naamabyapadesaatidesamaaha.
text.2017: [03] taddhitantaa ^a^M0.0180^ea^, kitantaa, samaasaa ca naamamiva da.t.thabbaa  ^b^tavetuna tvaana tvaa^eb^dippaccayante vajjetvaa. ^b^ca^eb^ggaha.na.m  kiccappaccaya^b^aaiiinii^eb^itthippaccayantaadissapi naamabyapadesattha.m.  idha ^b^samaasa^eb^ggaha.na.m atthavata.m samudaayaana.m naamabyapadeso  samaasassevaati niyamatthanti apare.
text.2020: [03] so abyayiibhaavasamaaso napu.msakali"ngova da.t.thabboti  napu.msakali"ngatta.m. ettha hi satipi li"ngaatidese  ``adhipa~n~na''ntiaadiisu ``adhi~naa.na.m''ntiaadi ruupappasa"ngo na hoti  saddantarattaa, ``tipa~n~na''ntiaadiisu viyaati da.t.thabba.m, na caaya.m  atideso, sutte atidesali"ngassa ^b^iva^eb^saddassa adassanato. pure  viya syaadyuppatti.

text.2027: [03] tena upanagara.m kata.m, upanagarena vaa, tehi upanagara.m, upanagarehi  vaa, tassa upanagara.m dehi, tesa.m upanagara.m, upanagaraa aanaya,  upanagaramhaa upanagarasmaa, upanagarehi, upanagara.m santaka.m, upanagarassa  vaa, tesa.m upanagara.m, upanagaraana.m vaa ^a^M0.0181^ea^, upanagara.m nidhehi,  upanagaramhi upanagarasmi.m, upanagara.m upanagaresu vaa. eva.m upakumbha.m.
text.2031: [03] ^b^vicchaaya.m^eb^ -- attaanamattaana.m pati paccatta.m, addhamaasa.m  addhamaasa.m anu anvaddhamaasa.m.
text.2033: [03] ^b^pa.tilome^eb^ -- sotassa pa.tiloma.m pa.tisota.m, pa.tipatha.m,  pativaata.m, attaana.m adhikicca pavattaa ajjhatta.m.
text.2034: [03] ^b^pariyaadaabhividhiisu^eb^ aapaa.nako.tiyaa aapaa.nako.tika.m,  ``kvaci samaasantagataanamakaaranto''ti ^b^ka^eb^ppaccayo, aakumaarehi  yaso kaccaayanassa aakumaara.m.
text.2035: [03] ^b^samiddhiya.m^eb^ -- bhikkhaaya samiddhiiti atthe samaaseva  napu.msakali"ngatte ca kate --
text.2038: [03] napu.msake vattamaanassa samaasassa anto saro rasso hoti.  ettha ca ^b^abyayiibhaava^eb^ggaha.na.m naanuvattetabba.m, tena  digudvandabahubbiihiisupi napu.msake vattamaanassa samaasantassarassa rassatta.m  siddha.m hoti. ``a.m vibhattiina''miccaadinaa ^b^a^eb^maadeso, subhikkha.m.  ga"ngaaya samiipe vattatiiti upaga"nga.m, ma.nikaaya samiipa.m upama.nika.m.
text.2042: [03] ^b^a^eb^kaarantato a~n~nasmaa abyayiibhaavasamaasaa paraasa.m  vibhattiina.m lopo ca hoti. adhitti, itthiisu adhikicca kathaa  pavattatiiti attho. adhitthi passa, adhitthi kata.m iccaadi, eva.m  adhikumaari, vadhuyaa samiipa.m upavadhu, gunna.m samiipa.m upagu,  ^b^o^eb^kaarassa rassatta.m ^b^u^eb^kaaro. eva.m ^b^upasaggapubbako^eb^.
text.2043: [03] ^b^nipaatapubbako^eb^ yathaa -- vu.d.dhaana.m pa.tipaa.ti, ye ye vu.d.dhaa  vaa yathaavu.d.dha.m, ^b^padatthaanatikkame^eb^ -- yathaakkama.m, yathaasatti, yathaabala.m  karoti, balamanatikkamitvaa karotiiti attho. jiivassa yattako  paricchedo yaavajiiva.m, yaavataayuka.m, ^b^ka^eb^ppaccayo. yattakena attho  yaavadattha.m, pabbatassa parabhaago tiropabbata.m, tiropaakaara.m, tiroku.t.ta.m,  paasaadassa anto antopaasaada.m, antonagara.m, antovassa.m, nagarassa bahi  bahinagara.m, paasaadassa upari uparipaasaada.m, uparima~nca.m, ma~ncassa he.t.thaa  he.t.thaama~nca.m, he.t.thaapaasaada.m, bhattassa pure purebhatta.m, eva.m pacchaabhatta.m.
text.2044: [03] ^b^saakallatthe^eb^ -- saha makkhikaaya samakkhika.m bhu~njati, na  ki~nci parivajjetiiti attho. ``tesu vuddhii''tiaadinaa  ^b^saha^eb^saddassa ^b^saa^eb^deso. ga"ngaaya ora.m oraga"ngamiccaadi.
text.2048: [03] so ca navavidho visesanapubbapado visesanuttarapado  visesanobhayapado upamaanuttarapado sambhaavanaapubbapado avadhaara.napubbapado  ^b^na^eb^nipaatapubbapado ^b^ku^eb^pubbapado ^b^paa^eb^dipubbapado caati.
text.2049: [03] tattha ^b^visesanapubbapado^eb^ taava -- ``mahanta purisa''itiidha  ubhayattha pa.thamekavacana.m ^b^si,^eb^ tulyaadhikara.nabhaavappasiddhattha.m  ^b^ca^eb^sadda ^b^ta^eb^saddappayogo, mahanto ca so puriso caati  viggahe --
text.2050: [03] ito para.m ``vibhaasaa rukkhati.na''iccaadito ``vibhaasaa''ti  samaasavidhaane sabbattha vattate.
text.2052: [03] dve padaani naamikaani tulyaadhikara.naani a~n~nama~n~nena saha  vibhaasaa samasyante, tasmi.m dvipade tulyaadhikara.ne sati so samaaso  kammadhaarayasa~n~no ca hoti.
text.2053: [03] dve padaani ^b^dvipada.m,^eb^ tulya.m samaana.m adhikara.na.m attho yassa  padadvayassa ta.m ^b^tulyaadhikara.na.m,^eb^ tasmi.m dvipade tulyaadhikara.ne.  bhinnappavattinimittaana.m dvinna.m padaana.m visesanavisesitabbabhaavena ekasmi.m  atthe pavatti ^b^tulyaadhikara.nataa^eb^. kammamiva dvaya.m dhaarayatiiti  ^b^kammadhaarayo^eb^. yathaa hi kamma.m kriya~nca payojana~nca dvaya.m  dhaarayati, kamme sati kriyaaya, payojanassa ca sambhavato, tathaa aya.m  samaaso ekassa atthassa dve naamaani dhaarayati, tasmi.m samaase sati  ^b^e^eb^katthajotakassa naamadvayassa sambhavato.
text.2054: [03] pure ^a^M0.0184^ea^ viya samaasasa~n~naavibhattilopapakatibhaavaa,  samaaseneva tulyaadhikara.nabhaavassa vuttattaa ``vuttatthaanamappayogo''ti  ^b^ca^eb^sadda ^b^ta^eb^saddaanamappayogo.
text.2056: [03] ^b^mahanta^eb^ saddassa ^b^mahaa^eb^ hoti tulyaadhikara.ne uttarapade  pare. ^b^mahata^eb^nti bahuvacanaggaha.nena kvaci ^b^maha^eb^aadeso ca,  ettha ca visesanassa pubbanipaato visesanabhuutassa pubbapadassa  ^b^mahaa^eb^desavidhaanatova vi~n~naayati.
text.2060: [03] tassa puriso tappuriso, tappurisasadisattaa ayampi samaaso  anvatthasa~n~naaya ^b^tappuriso^eb^ti vutto. yathaa hi  ^b^tappurisa^eb^saddo gu.namativatto, tathaa aya.m samaasopi.  uttarapadatthappadhaano hi tappurisoti. tato naamabyapadeso syaadyuppatti.  aya.m pana tappuriso abhidheyyavacano, parali"ngo ca.
text.2061: [03] mahaapuriso, mahaapurisaa iccaadi ^b^purisa^eb^saddasama.m, eva.m  mahaaviiro, mahaamuni, mahanta~nca ta.m bala~ncaati mahaabala.m, mahabbhaya.m,  ^b^maha^eb^aadeso. santo ca so puriso caati sappuriso,  ``santasaddassa so bhe bo cante''ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^saddena  ^b^santa^eb^saddassa samaase a^b^bha^eb^kaarepi ^b^saa^eb^deso, tathaa  pubbapuriso, parapuriso, pa.thamapuriso, majjhimapuriso, uttamapuriso,  dantapuriso, paramapuriso, viirapuriso, setahatthii, ka.nhasappo,  niiluppala.m, lohitacandana.m.
text.2062: [03] kvaci ^a^M0.0185^ea^ vibhaasaadhikaarato na bhavati, yathaa --  pu.n.no mantaaniputto, citto gahapati, sakko devaraajaati.
text.2063: [03] pumaa ca so kokilo caati atthe samaase kate --
text.2066: [03] ^b^puma^eb^iccetassa anto ^b^a^eb^kaaro lopamaapajjate  ^b^li"ngaa^eb^diisu parapadesu samaasesu, ``a.mmo niggahiita.m jhalapehii''ti  ^b^ma^eb^kaarassa niggahiita.m. pu"nkokilo. eva.m punnaago.
text.2067: [03] khattiyaa ca saa ka~n~naa caati viggayha samaase kate --
text.2068: [03] ``tulyaadhikara.ne, pade, itthiya.m bhaasitapumitthii pumaava ce''ti  ca vattate.
text.2070: [03] kammadhaarayasa~n~ne ca samaase itthiya.m vattamaane tulyaadhikara.ne  uttarapade pare pubbabhuuto itthivaacako saddo pubbe bhaasitapumaa ce, so  pumaa iva da.t.thabboti pubbapade itthippaccayassa nivatti hoti.
text.2071: [03] khattiyaka~n~naa, khattiyaka~n~naayo iccaadi. eva.m rattalataa,  dutiyabhikkhaa, braahma.nii ca saa daarikaa caati braahma.nadaarikaa,  naagamaa.navikaa.
text.2072: [03] pubbapadassevaaya.m pumbhaavaatideso, tena ``khattiyakumaarii  kumaarasama.nii taru.nabraahma.nii''tiaadiisu uttarapadesu itthippaccayassa na  nivatti hoti.
text.2074: [03] ^b^bhaasitapumaa^eb^ti ki.m? ga"ngaanadii, ta.nhaanadii, pathaviidhaatu.  ``nandaapokkhara.nii, nandaadevii''tiaadiisu pana sa~n~naasaddattaa na  hoti.
text.2075: [03] tathaa puratthimo ca so kaayo caati puratthimakaayo, ettha ca  kaayekadeso ^b^kaaya^eb^saddo. eva.m pacchimakaayo, he.t.thimakaayo,  uparimakaayo, sabbakaayo, puraa.navihaaro, navaavaaso, kataranikaayo,  katamanikaayo, hetuppaccayo, abahula.m bahula.m katanti bahuliikata.m,  jiivitappadhaana.m navaka.m jiivitanavaka.m iccaadi.
text.2076: [03] ^b^visesanuttarapade^eb^ jinavacanaanuparodhato theraacariyapa.n.ditaadi  visesana.m para~nca bhavati. yathaa -- saariputto ca so thero caati  saariputtatthero. eva.m mahaamoggallaanatthero, mahaakassapatthero,  buddhaghosaacariyo, dhammapaalaacariyo, aacariyaguttiloti vaa, mahosadho  ca so pa.n.dito caati mahosadhapa.n.dito. eva.m vidhurapa.n.dito,  vatthuviseso.
text.2077: [03] ^b^visesanobhayapado^eb^ yathaa -- siita~nca ta.m u.nha~ncaati  siitu.nha.m, siniddho ca so u.nho caati siniddhu.nho, maaso. kha~njo  ca so khujjo caati kha~njakhujjo. eva.m andhabadhiro, kataakata.m,  chiddaavachidda.m, uccaavaca.m, chinnabhinna.m, sittasamma.t.tha.m, gatapaccaagata.m.
text.2078: [03] ^b^upamaanuttarapade^eb^ abhidhaanaanurodhato upamaanabhuuta.m visesana.m  para.m bhavati. yathaa -- siiho viya siiho, muni ca so siiho caati  munisiiho. eva.m munivasabho, munipu"ngavo, buddhanaago, buddhaadicco,  ra.msi viya ra.msi, saddhammo ca ^a^M0.0187^ea^ so ra.msi caati  saddhammara.msi. eva.m vinayasaagaro, pu.n.dariikamiva pu.n.dariiko, sama.no  ca so pu.n.dariiko caati sama.napu.n.dariiko, sama.napadumo. cando viya  cando, mukha~nca ta.m cando caati mukhacando. eva.m mukhapaduma.m iccaadi.
text.2079: [03] ^b^sambhaavanaapubbapado^eb^ yathaa -- dhammo iti buddhi dhammabuddhi.  eva.m dhammasa~n~naa, dhammasa"nkhaato, dhammasammato, paa.nasa~n~nitaa,  asubhasa~n~naa, aniccasa~n~naa, anattasa~n~naa, dhaatusa~n~naa, dhiitusa~n~naa,  attasa~n~naa, atthisa~n~naa, attadi.t.thi iccaadi.
text.2080: [03] ^b^avadhaara.napubbapado^eb^ yathaa -- gu.no eva dhana.m gu.nadhana.m.  eva.m saddhaadhana.m, siiladhana.m, pa~n~naadhana.m, cakkhu eva indriya.m cakkhundriya.m.  eva.m cakkhaayatana.m, cakkhudhaatu, cakkhudvaara.m, ruupaaramma.namiccaadi.
text.2081: [03] ^b^nanipaatapubbapado^eb^ yathaa -- na braahma.noti atthe  kammadhaarayasamaase, vibhattilopaadimhi ca kate --
text.2084: [03] ^b^na^eb^ssa nipaatapadassa tappurise uttarapade pare sabbasseva  ^b^a^eb^tta.m hoti. tappurisekadesattaa tappuriso, abraahma.no.
text.2092: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0188^ea^ yo ``asuuriyapassaa raajadaaraa''tiaadiisu  viya uttarapadatthassa sabbathaa abhaava.m diipeti, so  ^b^pasajjappa.tisedhavaacii^eb^ naama. yo pana ``abraahma.na  amanussaa''tiaadiisu viya uttarapadattha.m pariyudaasitvaa ta.msadise  vatthumhi kaariya.m pa.tipaadayati, so ^b^pariyudaasavaacii^eb^ naama.
text.2097: [03] vuccate -- ^b^braahma.naa^eb^disaddaana.m braahma.naadiatthasseva  ta.msadisaadiatthassaapi vaacakattaa, ^b^braahma.naa^eb^disaddaa hi  kevalaabraahma.naadiatthesveva paaka.taa, ^b^bhuu^eb^saddo viyasattaaya.m, yadaa te  pana a~n~nena sadisaadivaacakena ^b^na^eb^iti nipaatena yujjanti, tadaa  ta.msadisatada~n~natabbiruddhatadabhaavesupi vattanti, ^b^bhuu^eb^saddo viya  ^b^anvabhi^eb^yaadiyoge anubhavanaabhibhavanaadiisu, tasmaa  uttarapadatthajotakoyevettha ^b^na^eb^iti nipaatoti na doso, tena  abraahma.noti braahma.nasadisoti vutta.m hoti. eva.m amanusso,  assama.no.
text.2099: [03] ^b^viruddhatthe^eb^ -- na kusalaa akusalaa, kusalapa.tipakkhaati  attho. eva.m alobho, amitto.
text.2100: [03] ^b^pasajjappa.tisedhe^eb^ -- na katvaa akatvaa, akaatuna pu~n~na.m  akaronto.
text.2103: [03] ^b^na^eb^iccetassa padassa tappurise uttarapade ^b^ana^eb^ hoti  sare pare.
text.2104: [03] ^b^na^eb^ asso anasso, na ariyo anariyo. eva.m  anissaro, ani.t.tho, anupavaado, na aadaaya anaadaaya, anoloketvaa  iccaadi.
text.2105: [03] ^b^kupubbapado^eb^ yathaa -- kucchitamannanti niccasamaasattaa  a~n~napadena viggaho, kammadhaarayasamaase kate --
text.2108: [03] ^b^ku^eb^iccetassa nipaatassa tappurise uttarapade ^b^kada^eb^  hoti sare pare. kadanna.m. eva.m kadasana.m.
text.211: [03] ``saralopo''tiaadinaa pubbassare lutte, paranayane ca kate  ``dhaatuppaccayavibhattivajjitamatthava.m li"nga''nti vuttattaava paccayantassaapi  ali"ngattaa vibhattuppattiyamasampattaaya.m ``taddhitasamaasakitakaa naama.m  vaa'tavetunaadiisu caa''ti ettha ^b^va^eb^ggaha.nena itthippaccayantassaapi  naamabyapadeso. pure viya ^b^syaa^eb^dyuppatti, ``sesato lopa.m  gasipii''ti ^b^si^eb^lopo. saa ka~n~naa.
text.2112: [03] ^b^ku^eb^iccetassa appatthe vattamaanassa ^b^kaa^eb^ hoti tappurise  uttarapade pare. bahuvacanuccaara.nato kucchitatthe ca kvaci tappurise.  appaka.m lava.na.m kaalava.na.m. eva.m kaapuppha.m, kucchito puriso kaapuriso,  kupuriso vaa.
text.2113: [03] ^b^paadipubbapado^eb^ ca niccasamaasova, padhaana.m vacana.m paavacana.m,  bhusa.m vaddha.m pavaddha.m, sariira.m, sama.m, sammaa vaa aadhaana.m samaadhaana.m, vividhaa  mati vimati, vividho kappo vikappo, visi.t.tho vaa kappo  ^a^M0.0190^ea^ vikappo, adhiko devo atidevo. eva.m adhidevo,  adhisiila.m, sundaro gandho sugandho, kucchito gandho duggandho, sobhana.m  kata.m sukata.m, asobhana.m kata.m dukka.ta.m iccaadi.
text.2114: [03] ye idha avihitalakkha.naa naamanipaatopasaggaa, tesa.m ``naamaana.m  samaaso''ti yogavibhaagena samaaso da.t.thabbo. yathaa -- apunageyyaa  gaathaa, acandamullokikaani mukhaani, assaddhabhojii,  alava.nabhojiitiaadiisu ayuttatthattaa naa~n~nena samaaso.
text.2115: [03] tathaa di.t.tho pubbanti di.t.thapubbo tathaagata.m. eva.m sutapubbo  dhamma.m, gatapubbo magga.m, ^b^kammani^eb^ di.t.thaa pubbanti di.t.thapubbaa devaa  tena. eva.m sutapubbaa dhammaa, gatapubbaa disaa, pahaaro, paraabhavo,  vihaaro, aahaaro, upahaaro iccaadi.
text.2119: [03] tayo lokaa samaaha.taa cittena sampi.n.ditaa, ti.n.na.m lokaana.m  samaahaaroti vaa atthe --
text.212: [03] bahuvacane ``aalapane si gasa~n~no''ti ito ``sa~n~no'', ``te  itthikhyaa po''ti ito ``itthikhyaa''ti ca vattate.
text.2120: [03] ``naamaana.m samaaso yuttattho''ti vattamaane ``dvipade''tiaadinaa  kammadhaarayasamaaso, tato samaasasa~n~naaya.m, vibhattilope, pakatibhaave ca  kate --
text.2124: [03] dve gaavo digu, digusadisattaa ayampi samaaso ^b^diguu^eb^ti  vutto. atha vaa sa"nkhyaapubbattanapu.msakekattasa"nkhaatehi dviihi  lakkha.nehi gato avagatoti diguuti vuccati, dviihi vaa lakkha.nehi  gacchati pavattatiiti digu. ettha ca ``sa"nkhyaapubbo''ti vuttattaa  sa"nkhyaasaddasseva pubbanipaato, ``ubhe tappurisaa''ti tappurisasa~n~naa.
text.2128: [03] samaahaaradigusseta.m gaha.na.m, tattha sabbatthekavacanameva hoti,  a~n~natra pana bahuvacanampi, naamabyapadesasyaadyuppatti ^b^a^eb^maadesaadi.
text.2129: [03] tiloka.m, he tiloka, tiloka.m, tilokena, tilokassa,  tilokaa tilokasmaa tilokamhaa, tilokassa, tiloke tilokamhi  tilokasmi.m.
text.2130: [03] eva.m tayo da.n.daa tida.n.da.m, tii.ni malaani samaaha.taani, ti.n.na.m  malaana.m samaahaaroti vaa timala.m, tilakkha.na.m, catussacca.m, catasso  disaa catuddisa.m, ``saro rasso napu.msake''ti rassatta.m, pa~ncasikkhaapada.m,  sa.laayatana.m, sattaaha.m, a.t.thasiila.m, navalokuttara.m, dasasiila.m, satayojana.m.
text.2131: [03] tathaa -- dve rattiyo dviratta.m, tisso rattiyo tiratta.m, dve  a"nguliyo dva"ngula.m, satta godaavariyo, taasa.m samaahaaroti vaa  sattagodaavara.m.
text.2134: [03] raajaadiga.nasseta.m gaha.na.m, tena samaasantagataana.m ^b^raajaadii^eb^na.m  naamaana.m anto kvaci ^b^a^eb^kaaro hotiiti attho.  ^b^kaara^eb^ggaha.nena bahubbiihaadimhi samaasante kvaci ^b^ka^eb^ppaccayo  hoti, ^b^surabhi su du puutii^eb^hi ^b^gandha^eb^ntassikaaro ca.
text.2135: [03] atha vaa ^b^a^eb^ ca ^b^ko^eb^ ca akaa, ^b^ra^eb^kaaro  padasandhikaro, tena kvaci samaasantagataanamanto hutvaa ^b^a ka^eb^  iccete paccayaa hontiiti attho. tena pa~nca gaavo samaaha.taati atthe  samaasaadi.m katvaa samaasante ^b^a^eb^ppaccaye, ``o sare caa''ti  ^b^avaa^eb^dese ca kate ``pa~ncagava''ntiaadi ca sijjhati.  ``dviratta''ntiaadiisu pana ^b^a^eb^ppaccaye kate pubbasarassa  ``saralopo''tiaadinaa lopo.
text.2136: [03] ^b^asamaahaaradigu^eb^ yathaa -- eko ca so puggalo caati  ekapuggalo. eva.m ekadhammo, ekaputto, tayo bhavaa tibhavaa, catasso  disaa catuddisaa, dasasahassacakkavaa.laani iccaadi.
text.214: [03] li"ngassanto ^b^aa^eb^kaaro yadaa itthikhyo, tadaa  ^b^gha^eb^sa~n~no hotiiti ^b^gha^eb^sa~n~naaya.m ``ghapato ca yona.m lopo''ti  ^a^M0.0082^ea^ vikappena ^b^yo^eb^lopo. taa ka~n~naa ka~n~naayo.
text.2140: [03] so pana dutiyaadiisu chasu vibhattiisu bhaavato chabbidho. tattha  dutiyaatappuriso gatanissitaatiitaatikkantappattaapannaadiihi bhavati.
text.2144: [03] ^b^a^eb^maadivibhatyantaani yuttatthaani pubbapadaani naamehi  parapadebhi saha vibhaasaa samasyante, so samaaso tappurisasa~n~no hoti.  aya~nca tappuriso abhidheyyavacanali"ngo.
text.2145: [03] ^b^gataa^eb^disaddaa kitantattaa tili"ngaa, vibhattilopaadi sabba.m  pubbasama.m. so sara.nagato, te sara.nagataa. saa sara.nagataa, taa  sara.nagataayo. ta.m kula.m sara.nagata.m, taani kulaani sara.nagataani  iccaadi.
text.2146: [03] eva.m ara~n~nagato, bhuumigato, dhamma.m nissito dhammanissito,  atthanissito, bhava.m atiito bhavaatiito, kaalaatiito, pamaa.na.m atikkanta.m  pamaa.naatikkanta.m. lokaatikkanta.m, sukha.m patto sukhappatto, dukkhappatto,  sota.m aapanno sotaapanno, nirodhasamaapanno, ratha.m aaru.lho rathaaru.lho,  sabbaratti.m sobhano sabbarattisobhano, muhuttasukha.m.
text.2147: [03] ^b^upapadasamaase^eb^ pana vuttiyeva tassa niccattaa. yathaa --  kamma.m karotiiti kammakaaro, kumbhakaaro, attha.m kaametiiti atthakaamo,  dhammakaamo, dhamma.m dhaaretiiti dhammadharo, vinayadharo, sacca.m vaditu.m  siilamassaati saccavaadii iccaadi.
text.2148: [03] ^b^tavantumaanantaa^eb^dikitantehi vaakyameva  vavatthitavibhaasaadhikaarato. yathaa -- odana.m bhuttavaa, dhamma.m  su.namaano, dhamma.m su.nanto, ka.ta.m karaano, anabhidhaanato vaa,  abhidhaanalakkha.naa hi taddhitasamaasakitakaati.
text.2150: [03] tatiyaa ^a^M0.0194^ea^ kitaka pubba sadisa samuunattha kalaha  nipu.na missasakhilaadiihi.
text.2151: [03] buddhena bhaasito buddhabhaasito, dhammo. eva.m jinadesito,  satthaaraa va.n.nito satthuva.n.nito, vi~n~nuuhi garahito vi~n~nugarahito,  vi~n~nuppasattho, issarakata.m, saya.mkata.m, sukehi aaha.ta.m sukaahata.m, ra~n~naa  hato raajahato, rogapii.lito, aggida.d.dho, sappada.t.tho, sallena viddho  sallaviddho, icchaaya apakato icchaapakato, siilena sampanno  siilasampanno. eva.m sukhasahagata.m, ~naa.nasampayutta.m, mittasa.msaggo,  piyavippayogo, jaatitthaddho, gu.nahiino, gu.navu.d.dho, catuvaggakara.niiya.m,  catuvaggaadikattabba.m, kaakehi peyyaa kaakapeyyaa, nadii.
text.2152: [03] kvaci vuttiyeva, urena gacchatiiti urago, paadena pivatiiti  paadapo. kvaci vaakyameva, parasunaa chinnavaa, kaakehi paatabbaa,  dassanena pahaatabbaa.
text.2153: [03] ^b^pubbaadiyoge^eb^ -- maasena pubbo maasapubbo. eva.m  maatusadiso, pitusamo, ekuunaviisati, siilavikalo, asikalaho,  vaacaanipu.no, yaavakaalikasa.mmissa.m, vaacaasakhilo, satthaaraa sadiso  satthukappo, pu~n~nena atthiko pu~n~natthiko, gu.naadhiko, gu.lena sa.msa.t.tho  odano gu.lodano, khiirodano, assena yutto ratho assaratho,  maggacitta.m, jambuyaa pa~n~naato lakkhito diipo jambudiipo, ekena  adhikaa dasa ekaadasa, jaatiyaa andho jaccandho, pakatiyaa medhaavii  pakatimedhaavii iccaadi.
text.2156: [03] ^b^tadatthe^eb^ -- kathinassa dussa.m kathinadussa.m,  kathinaciivaratthaayaati attho. eva.m ciivaradussa.m, ciivaramuulya.m, yaaguyaa  atthaaya ta.n.dulaa yaaguta.n.dulaa, bhattata.n.dulaa, sa"nghassatthaaya bhatta.m sa"nghabhatta.m,  aagantukaanamatthaaya bhatta.m aagantukabhatta.m. eva.m gamikabhatta.m, paasaadaaya  dabba.m paasaadadabba.m.
text.2157: [03] ^b^atthe^eb^ bhikkhusa"nghassatthaaya vihaaro bhikkhusa"nghattho vihaaro,  bhikkhusa"nghatthaa yaagu, bhikkhusa"nghattha.m ciivara.m. yassatthaaya yadattho,  yadatthaa, yadattha.m. eva.m tadattho, tadatthaa. tadattha.m. etadattho  vaayaamo, etadatthaa kathaa, etadattha.m sotaavadhaana.m. kimattha.m, attattha.m,  parattha.m, vinayo sa.mvaratthaaya, sukha.m samaadhatthaaya, nibbidaa  viraagatthaaya, viraago vimuttatthaaya. tathaa lokassa hito lokahito,  buddhassa deyya.m buddhadeyya.m, puppha.m. sa"nghadeyya.m, ciivara.m. idha na bhavati,  sa"nghassa daatabba.m, sa"nghassa daatu.m iccaadi.
text.2160: [03] methunasmaa apeto methunaapeto. eva.m palaapaapagato,  nagaraniggato, pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto. gaamato nikkhanta.m gaamanikkhanta.m,  rukkhaggaa patito rukkhaggapatito, saasanacuto, aapattivu.t.thaana.m,  dhara.nitaluggato, sabbabhavehi nissa.to sabbabhavanissa.to.
text.2161: [03] ^b^bhayatthaadiyoge^eb^ yathaa -- raajato bhaya.m raajabhaya.m, corehi  bhaya.m corabhaya.m, amanussehi bhaya.m amanussabhaya.m, aggito bhaya.m aggibhaya.m.  paapato bhiito paapabhiito ^a^M0.0196^ea^, paapabhiiruko, akattabbato  virati akattabbavirati. eva.m kaayaduccaritavirati,  vaciiduccaritavirati, bandhanaa mutto bandhanamutto, vanamutto,  bandhanamokkho, kammato samu.t.thita.m kammasamu.t.thita.m, ukka.t.thukka.t.tha.m, omakomaka.m.
text.2162: [03] kvaci vuttiyeva, kammato jaata.m kammaja.m. eva.m cittaja.m, utuja.m,  aahaaraja.m. idha na bhavati, paasaadaa patito.
text.2164: [03] cha.t.thii ra~n~no putto raajaputto. eva.m raajapuriso,  aacariyapuujako, buddhasaavako, buddharuupa.m, jinavacana.m, samuddaghoso,  dha~n~naana.m raasi dha~n~naraasi, pupphagandho, phalaraso, kaayassa lahutaa  kaayalahutaa, mara.nassati, rukkhamuula.m, ayassa patto ayopatto, eva.m  suva.n.naka.taaha.m, paaniiyathaalaka.m, sappikumbho.
text.2165: [03] ``devaana.m raajaa''ti atthe samaasaadimhi kate ``kvaci  samaasantagataanamakaaranto''ti ^b^a^eb^kaaro, tato ``syaa caa''ti  ^b^aa^eb^tta.m ^b^na^eb^ bhavati. devaraajo, devaraajaa, devaraaja.m, devaraaje  iccaadi ^b^purisa^eb^saddasama.m. ^b^a^eb^ttaabhaave so devaraajaa, te  devaraajaano iccaadi ^b^raaja^eb^saddasama.m. tathaa devaana.m sakhaa  devasakho, devasakhaa, so devasakhaa, te devasakhaano iccaadi.
text.2166: [03] pumassa li"nga.m pulli"nga.m. eva.m pumbhaavo, pumantalopaadi.
text.2167: [03] hatthipada.m, itthiruupa.m, bhikkhunisa"ngho, jambusaakhaa, ettha ca  ``kvacaadimajjhuttaraana''ntiaadinaa majjhe ^b^ii^eb^kaaruukaaraana.m rassatta.m.
text.2168: [03] vibhaasaadhikaarato ^a^M0.0197^ea^ kvaci vaakyameva, sahasaa  kammassa kattaaro, bhinnaana.m sandhaataa, kappassa tatiyo bhaago, yaa ca  pakkhassa a.t.thamii, manussaana.m khattiyo suuratamo.
text.2169: [03] ^b^yuttattho^eb^ icceva? ``bha.to ra~n~no puriso devadattassaa''ti  ettha ``bha.tasambandhe cha.t.thii''ti a~n~nama~n~naanapekkhataaya ayuttatthabhaavato  samaaso na bhavati, ``kosalassa ra~n~no putto''tiaadiisu pana  saapekkhataaya asamatthattaa na bhavati, ^b^sambandhii^eb^saddaana.m pana nicca.m  saapekkhattepi gamakattaa samaaso, yathaa -- devadattassa gurukula.m,  bhagavato saavakasa"nghotiaadi.
text.217: [03] ^b^gha^eb^to parassa ^b^ga^eb^ssa ^b^e^eb^kaaro hoti, saralopaadi.  bhoti ka~n~ne, bhotiyo ka~n~naa ka~n~naayo.
text.2171: [03] sattamii ruupe sa~n~naa ruupasa~n~naa, eva.m ruupasa~ncetanaa,  sa.msaaradukkha.m, cakkhumhi sannissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, dhamme  rato dhammarato, dhammaabhirati, dhammaruci, dhammagaaravo, dhammesu nirutti  dhammanirutti, daanaadhimutti, bhavantarakata.m, dassane assaado  dassanassaado, ara~n~ne vaaso ara~n~navaaso, vikaale bhojana.m  vikaalabhojana.m, kaale vassa.m kaalavassa.m, vane puppha.m vanapuppha.m. eva.m  vanamahiso, gaamasuukaro, samuddamaccho, aavaa.takacchapo, aavaa.tama.n.duuko,  kuupama.n.duuko, titthanaavaa, itthiisu dhutto itthidhutto chaayaaya sukkho  chaayaasukkho, a"ngaarapakka.m, caarakabaddho.
text.2172: [03] idha vuttiyeva, yathaa -- vane caratiiti vanacaro, kucchimhi  sayatiiti kucchisayo, thale ti.t.thatiiti thala.t.tho. eva.m jala.t.tho,  pabbata.t.tho, magga.t.tho, pa"nke jaata.m pa"nkaja.m, sire ruhatiiti siroruha.m  iccaadi.
text.2173: [03] idha ^a^M0.0198^ea^ na bhavati, bhojane matta~n~nutaa, indriyesu  guttadvaarataa, aasane nisinno, aasane nisiiditabba.m.
text.2175: [03] ``tadanuparodhenaa''ti vuttattaa yathaabhidhaana.m tappurise kvaci  ^b^accantaa^eb^diisu ^b^a^eb^maadivibhatyanta.m pubbapada.m para.m sambhavati.
text.2176: [03] yathaa -- anta.m atikkanta.m accanta.m, accantaani, vela.m atikkanto  ativelo, rassatta.m. eva.m maala.m atiito atimaalo, pattajiiviko,  aapannajiiviko, akkha.m patigata.m nissitanti paccakkha.m dassana.m,  paccakkho attabhaavo, paccakkhaa buddhi, attha.m anugata.m anvattha.m,  kokilaaya avaku.t.tha.m avakokila.m vana.m, pariccattanti attho. avamayuura.m,  ajjhayanaaya parigilaano pariyajjhayano, kammassa ala.m samatthoti  ala.mkammo, vacanaaya alanti ala.mvacano, vaanato nikkhanta.m nibbaana.m,  kilesehi nikkhanto nikkileso, nira"nga.no, kosambiyaa nikkhanto  nikkosambii, vanato niyyaato nibbano, aacariyato paro paacariyo.  eva.m payyako, parahiyyo, ga"ngaaya upari upariga"nga.m. eva.m he.t.thaanadii,  antosamaapatti, ha.msaana.m raajaa raajaha.mso, ha.msaraajaa vaa, maasassa addha.m  addhamaasa.m, maasaddha.m vaa, aamalakassa addha.m addhaamalaka.m, aamalakaddha.m vaa,  kahaapa.nassa a.d.dha.m a.d.dhakahaapa.na.m, a.d.dhamaasaka.m, rattiyaa a.d.dha.m a.d.dharatta.m,  rattiyaa pubba.m pubbaratta.m, rattiyaa pacchaa pacchaaratta.m. ettha ca ``kvaci  samaasantagataanamakaaranto''ti ^b^ratti^eb^saddantassa ^b^a^eb^tta.m, ahassa  pubba.m pubbanha.m. eva.m saayanha.m, ``tesu vuddhii''tiaadinaa ^b^aha^eb^ssa  ^b^anhaa^eb^deso.
text.2179: [03] yathaa -- pabha.m karotiiti atthe ``amaadayo parapadebhii''ti  samaaso, ``naamaana.m samaaso yuttattho''ti samaasasa~n~naa, tato ``tesa.m  vibhattiyo lopaa caa''ti vibhattilope sampatte tattheva ^b^ca^eb^ggaha.nena  pubbapade vibhattilopaabhaavo. sesa.m sama.m. pabha"nkaro, amata.m dadaatiiti  amatandado, ra.na.m jahaatiiti ra.na~njaho, juti.m dhaaretiiti jutindharo,  tathaa sahasaakata.m, parassapada.m. attanopada.m, bhayato upa.t.thaana.m bhayatuupa.t.thaana.m,  paratoghoso, gava.mpatitthero, manasikaaro, pubbenivaaso,  pubbenivaasaanussati, majjhekalyaa.na.m, antevaasii, antevaasiko,  janesuto, urasilomo, ka.n.thekaa.lo, sarasijamiccaadi.
text.2185: [03] so ca navavidho dvipado tulyaadhikara.no, dvipado  bhinnaadhikara.no, tipado ^b^na^eb^nipaatapubbapado, ^b^saha^eb^pubbapado  upamaanapubbapado sa"nkhyobhayapado disantaraa.lattho byatihaaralakkha.no  caati.
text.2186: [03] tattha ^b^dvipado tulyaadhikara.no^eb^ bahubbiihi kammaadiisu chasu  vibhatyatthesu bhavati.
text.2187: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0200^ea^ ^b^dutiyatthe^eb^ taava -- ``aagataa sama.naa  ima.m sa"nghaaraama''nti viggahe --
text.2189: [03] samasyamaanapadato a~n~nesa.m pa.thamadutiyaadivibhatyantaana.m  padaanamatthesu yuttatthaani naamaani vibhaasaa samasyante, so samaaso  bahubbiihisa~n~no ca hoti.
text.219: [03] tatiyaadiisu ``aaya catutthekavacanassa tuu''ti ito ``aayo,  ekavacanaana''nti ca vattate.
text.2190: [03] bahavo viihayo yassa so bahubbiihi, bahubbiihisadisattaa  ayampisamaaso anvatthasa~n~naavasena ^b^bahubbiihii^eb^ti vutto,  a~n~napadatthappadhaano hi bahubbiihi.
text.2191: [03] duvidho caaya.m bahubbiihi  taggu.nasa.mvi~n~naa.naataggu.nasa.mvi~n~naa.navasena, tesu yattha visesanabhuuto  attho ^b^a~n~napadattha^eb^ggaha.nena gayhati, so ^b^taggu.nasa.mvi~n~naa.no,^eb^  yathaa -- lambaka.n.namaanayaati.
text.2192: [03] yattha pana na gayhati, so ^b^ataggu.nasa.mvi~n~naa.no,^eb^ yathaa --  bahudhanamaanayaati.
text.2193: [03] idha ^b^bahubbiihi^eb^sadde viya visesanassa pubbanipaato, sesa.m  pubbasama.m.
text.2194: [03] aagatasama.no sa"nghaaraamo. ettha ca ^b^aagata^eb^saddo,  ^b^sama.na^eb^saddo ca attano atthe a.t.thatvaa dutiyaavibhatyatthabhuute  sa"nghaaraamasa"nkhaate a~n~napadatthe vattanti, tadatthajotanatthameva tadanantara.m  ``sa"nghaaraamo''ti padantara.m payujjati, tato samaaseneva kammatthassa  abhihitattaa puna dutiyaa na hoti. ^b^ida.m^eb^saddassa ca appayogo,  eva.m sabbattha. bahubbiihi caaya.m abhidheyyali"ngavacano.
text.2195: [03] tathaa aagatasama.naa saavatthi, aagatasama.na.m jetavana.m, pa.tipannaa  addhikaa ya.m patha.m soya.m pa.tipannaddhiko patho ^a^M0.0201^ea^, abhiru.lhaa  vaa.nijaa ya.m naava.m saa abhiru.lhavaa.nijaa naavaa. eva.m kammatthe  bahubbiihi.
text.2196: [03] ^b^tatiyatthe^eb^ bahubbiihi yathaa -- jitaani indriyaani yena  sama.nena soya.m jitindriyo sama.no. eva.m di.t.thadhammo, pattadhammo,  katakicco, jitaa maaraa anenaati jitamaaro bhagavaa,  pa.tividdhasabbadhammo.
text.2197: [03] ^b^catutthiyatthe^eb^ bahubbiihi yathaa -- dinno su"nko yassa  ra~n~no soya.m dinnasu"nko raajaa, upaniita.m bhojana.m assa sama.nassaati  upaniitabhojano sama.no, upaha.to bali assaati upaha.tabali yakkho.
text.2198: [03] ^b^pa~ncamiyatthe^eb^ bahubbiihi yathaa -- niggataa janaa asmaa  gaamaa soya.m niggatajano gaamo, niggato ayo asmaati nirayo,  niggataa kilesaa etasmaati nikkileso, apeta.m vi~n~naa.na.m asmaati  apetavi~n~naa.no matakaayo, apagata.m bhayabherava.m asmaati apagatabhayabheravo  arahaa.
text.2199: [03] ^b^cha.t.thiyatthe^eb^ bahubbiihi yathaa -- chinnaa hatthaa yassa  purisassa soya.m chinnahattho puriso. eva.m paripu.n.nasa"nkappo,  khii.naasavo, viito raago assaati viitaraago, dve padaani assaati  dvipado, dvihattho pa.to, tevijjo, catuppado, pa~nca cakkhuuni assaati  pa~ncacakkhu bhagavaa, cha.labhi~n~no, rassatta.m, nava"nga.m satthusaasana.m,  dasabalo, ananta~naa.no, tii.ni dasa parimaa.nametesanti tidasaa devaa,  samaasantassa ^b^a^eb^tta.m, idha ^b^parimaa.na^eb^saddassa sannidhaanato  ^a^M0.0202^ea^ ^b^dasa^eb^saddo sa"nkhyaane vattate, aya.m paccayo etesanti  idappaccayaa, ko pabhavo assaati ki.mpabhavo aya.m kaayo, vigata.m  malamassaati vimalo, sundaro gandho assaati sugandha.m candana.m. eva.m  susiilo, sumukho, kucchito gandho assaati duggandha.m ku.napa.m, du.t.thu  mano assaati dummano. eva.m dussiilo, dummukho, tapo eva dhana.m  assaati tapodhano, khantisa"nkhaata.m bala.m assaati khantibalo,  indoti naama.m etassaati indanaamo.
text.22: [03] akkharaa api aadayo ekacattaaliisa.m, te ca kho  jinavacanaanuruupaa akaaraadayo niggahiitantaa ekacattaaliisamattaa va.n.naa  pacceka.m akkharaa naama honti. ta.m yathaa -- aa i ii u uu e o,  ka kha ga gha "na, ca cha ja jha ~na, .ta .tha .da .dha .na, ta tha da dha na,  pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra lava sa ha .la a.m-iti akkharaa.
text.2200: [03] ^b^chandajaataa^eb^diisu visesanavisesitabbaana.m yathicchitattaa  ubhaya.m pubba.m nipatati, yathaa -- chando jaato assaati chandajaato,  jaato chando assaatipi jaatachando. eva.m sa~njaatapiitisomanasso,  piitisomanassasa~njaato, maasajaato, jaatamaaso, chinnahattho,  hatthacchinno.
text.2204: [03] itthiya.m vattamaane tulyaadhikara.ne pade pare pubbe bhaasitapumaa  itthivaacako saddo atthi ce, so pumaa iva da.t.thabboti pubbapade  itthippaccayaabhaavo, bahubbiihivisayoya.m, upari ``kammadhaarayasa~n~ne  caa''ti vakkhamaanattaa.
text.2206: [03] kvaci taddhitasamaasanaamopasaggaadiisu padesu aadimajjhuttarabhuutaana.m  saraana.m jinavacanaanuparodhena diigharassaa honti paccayesu, apaccayesu  paresu, aparabhuutesu ca.
text.2209: [22] rassatta.m ajjave itthi- ruupaado ca ka, taadisuuti..
text.221: [03] ^b^gha^eb^sa~n~nato li"ngassaakaaraa paresa.m ^b^naa^eb^diina.m  ^b^smi.m^eb^pariyantaana.m ekavacanaana.m vibhattiga.naana.m ^b^aayaa^eb^deso  hoti. saralopaparanayanaani. ka~n~naaya, ka~n~naahi ka~n~naabhi,  ka~n~naaya, ka~n~naana.m, ka~n~naaya, ka~n~naahi ka~n~naabhi, ka~n~naaya, ka~n~naana.m.
text.2210: [03] bahubbiihisamaase sati pulli"nge uttarapadantassa rassatta.m.  diighaja"ngho puriso, tathaa pahuutaa jivhaa assaati pahuutajivho bhagavaa.  mahatii pa~n~naa assaati mahaapa~n~no. ``mahata.m mahaa tulyaadhikara.ne  pade''ti ^b^mahaa^eb^deso.
