text.3895: [03] eva.m ^a^M0.0398^ea^ caratiiti cara.m, caratii, carantii, caranta.m,  caramaano, cariyamaano, pacatiiti paca.m, pacatii, pacantii, pacanta.m,  pacamaano, paccamaano, ``tassa cavagga''iccaadinaa ^b^ca^eb^vaggatta.m,  dvitta~nca.
text.3896: [03] ^b^bhuu^eb^ sattaaya.m, bhavatiiti atthe ^b^anta^eb^ppaccayo,  ^b^a^eb^ppaccayavuddhiavaadesaadi, so bhava.m, bhavanto. ^b^itthiya.m^eb^  iipaccayo, ``bhavato bhoto''ti ^b^bhotaa^eb^deso, bhotii, bhotii,  bhotiyo. ^b^napu.msake^eb^ bhava.m, bhavanta.m, bhavantaani, abhibhavamaano.  ^b^bhaave^eb^ bhuuyamaana.m. ^b^kammani^eb^ abhibhuuyamaano.
text.3897: [03] ^b^jara^eb^ vayohaanimhi, ``jara maraana''ntiaadinaa ^b^jiira  jiiyyaa^eb^desaa, jiiratiiti jiira.m, jiirantii, jiiranta.m, jiiramaano,  jiiriiyamaano, jiiya.m, jiiyantii, jiiyanta.m, jiiyamaano, jiiyyamaano.
text.3898: [03] ^b^mara^eb^ paa.nacaage, ``kvaci dhaatuu''tiaadinaa ekassa  ^b^ya^eb^kaarassa lopo, maratiiti miiya.m, miiyantii, miiyanta.m,  miiyamaano, miiyyamaano, mara.m, marantii, maranta.m, maramaano, mariiyamaano.  labha.m, labhantii, labhanta.m, labhamaano, labbhamaano. vaha.m, vahantii,  vahanta.m, vahamaano, vuyhamaano. ``isuyamuunamanto ccho vaa''ti  ^b^cchaa^eb^deso, icchatiiti iccha.m, icchantii, icchanta.m, icchamaano,  icchiiyamaano, issamaano.
text.3899: [03] ``disassa passadissadakkhaa vaa''ti ^b^passa dissa  dakkhaa^eb^desaa, passatiiti passa.m, passantii, passanta.m, passamaano,  vipassiiyamaano, dissamaano, dissanto, ^b^maana^eb^ssa  ^b^antaa^eb^deso, dissa.m, dissantii, dissanta.m, dakkha.m, dakkhantii,  dakkhanta.m, dakkhamaano dakkhiyamaano iccaadi.
text.3900: [03] ^b^tuda^eb^ byathane, tudatiiti tuda.m, tudantii, tudanta.m, tudamaano,  tujjamaano. pavisatiiti pavisa.m, pavisantii, pavisanta.m, pavisamaano,  pavisiiyamaano iccaadi.
text.3901: [03] ^b^huu,^eb^ ^a^M0.0399^ea^ ^b^bhuu^eb^ sattaaya.m, ^b^a^eb^ppaccayalopo,  pahotiiti pahonto, pahontii, pahonta.m, pahuuyamaana.m tena. setiiti  sento, sentii, senta.m, semaano, saya.m, sayantii, sayanta.m, sayamaano,  sayaano vaa, ^b^maana^eb^ssa ^b^aanaa^eb^deso, atisiiyamaano.
text.3902: [03] ^b^asa^eb^ sabbhaave, ``sabbatthaasassaadilopo caa''ti  ^b^a^eb^kaarassa lopo, atthiiti sa.m, santo, satii, santii, santa.m,  samaano, samaanaa, samaana.m.
text.3903: [03] ^b^.thaa^eb^ gatinivattimhi, ``vaa''ti vattamaane ``.thaa ti.t.tho''ti  ^b^ti.t.thaa^eb^deso, ti.t.tha.m, ti.t.thantii, ti.t.thanta.m, ti.t.thamaano. ^b^ti.t.thaa^eb^bhaave  ``kvaci dhaatuu''tiaadinaa ^b^.thaa^eb^to ^b^ha^eb^kaaraagamo, rassatta~nca,  upa.t.thaha.m, upa.t.thahantii, upa.t.thahanta.m, upa.t.thahamaano. .thiiyamaana.m tena,  upa.t.thiiyamaano, upa.t.thahiiyamaano.
text.3904: [03] ^b^paa^eb^ paane, ``paa pibo''ti ^b^pibaa^eb^deso, pibatiiti  piba.m, pibantii, pibanta.m, pibamaano, ``kvaci dhaatuu''tiaadinaa  ^b^ba^eb^kaarassa ^b^va^eb^tta.m, piva.m, pivantii, pivanta.m, pivamaano,  piiyamaano, piiyamaanaa, piiyamaana.m iccaadi.
text.3905: [03] ^b^hu^eb^ daanaadanahabyappadaanesu, ^b^a^eb^ppaccaye pure viya  dvibhaavaadi, juhotiiti juha.m, juhantii, juhanta.m, juhamaano, huuyamaano.  eva.m jaha.m, jahantii, jahanta.m, jahamaano, jahiiyamaano. dadaatiiti dada.m,  dadantii, dadanta.m, dadamaano, ^b^dvittaa^eb^bhaave daana.m dento, dentii,  denta.m, diiyamaano.
text.3906: [03] ^b^rudhi^eb^ aavara.ne, ``rudhaadito niggahiitapubba~ncaa''ti  ^b^a^eb^ppaccayaniggahiitaagamaa, rundhatiiti rundha.m, rundhantii, rundhanta.m,  rundhamaano, rujjhamaano. bhu~njatiiti bhu~nja.m, bhu~njantii, bhu~njanta.m,  bhu~njamaano, bhujjamaano iccaadi.
text.3907: [03] ^b^divu^eb^ ^a^M0.0400^ea^ kii.laaya.m, ``divaadito yo''ti  ^b^ya^eb^ppaccayo, ``tathaa kattari caa''ti pubbaruupatta.m, ^b^ba^eb^tta~nca,  dibbatiiti dibba.m, dibbantii, dibbanta.m, dibbamaano. eva.m bujjhatiiti  bujjha.m, bujjhanto, bujjhamaano, ^b^ca^eb^vaggaadeso. ^b^janii^eb^  paatubhaave, ``janaadiinamaa''ti yogavibhaagena ^b^aa^eb^tta.m, jaayatiiti  jaaya.m, jaayamaano, ja~n~namaano.
text.3908: [03] ^b^su^eb^ sava.ne, ``svaadito''tiaadinaa ^b^.nu .naa u.naa^eb^  ca, su.naatiiti su.na.m, su.nanto, su.namaano, suuyamaano, suyyamaano.  paapu.naatiiti paapu.na.m, paapu.namaano, paapiiyamaano.
text.3909: [03] ``kiyaadito naa''ti ^b^naa,^eb^ rassatta.m, ki.naatiiti ki.na.m,  kii.namaano, kiiyamaano. vinicchinaatiiti vinicchina.m,  vinicchinamaano, vinicchiiyamaano, cina.m, ciiyamaano. jaanaatiiti  jaana.m, jaanamaano, ^b^jaa^eb^deso, ~naayamaano. ga.nhaatiiti ga.nha.m,  ga.nhamaano, gayhamaano.
text.3910: [03] ^b^kara^eb^ kara.ne, karotiiti atthe ``vattamaane maanantaa''ti  ^b^anta^eb^ppaccayo, ``tanaadito oyiraa''ti ^b^o,^eb^ ``tassa  vaa''ti adhikicca ``uttamokaaro''ti ^b^u^eb^tta.m, ``karassaakaaro  caa''ti ^b^a^eb^kaara^b^ssu^eb^kaaro. ``yavakaaraa caa''ti sare  ^b^u^eb^kaarassa ^b^va^eb^tta.m, dvitta.m, ``bo vassaa''ti  ^b^ba^eb^kaaradvaya~nca, ``kvaci dhaatuu''tiaadinaa ^b^ra^eb^lopo, so  kubba.m, kubbanto, kubbatii, kubbantii, kubbanta.m. ^b^u^eb^ttaabhaave --  kamma.m karonto, karontii, karonta.m. ^b^maane -- u^eb^ttadvaya.m,  kurumaano, kurumaanaa, kurumaana.m, kubbaano vaa. ^b^kammani^eb^  kayiramaano, kariiyamaano vaa iccaadi.
text.3911: [03] ^b^cura^eb^ theyye, ``curaadito''tiaadinaa ^b^.ne .nayaa,^eb^  coretiiti corento, corentii, corenta.m, coraya.m, corayatii, corayanta.m,  corayamaano, coriiyamaano. paaletiiti paalento, paalentii, paalenta.m,  paalaya.m, paalayantii, paalayanta.m, paalayamaano, paaliiyamaano iccaadi.
text.3912: [03] ^b^kaarite^eb^ ^a^M0.0401^ea^ bhaavetiiti bhaavento, bhaaventii,  bhaaventa.m, bhaavaya.m, bhaavayantii, bhaavayanta.m, bhaavayamaano, bhaaviiyamaano.  kaaretiiti kaaronto, kaarentii, kaarenta.m, kaaraya.m, kaarayantii, kaarayanta.m,  kaarayamaano, kaariiyamaano, kaaraapento, kaaraapentii, kaaraapenta.m,  kaaraapaya.m, kaaraapayantii, kaaraapayanta.m, kaaraapayamaano, kaaraapiiyamaano  iccaadi.
text.3917: [03] bhavissati kaale gammamaane ^b^gamaa^eb^diihi dhaatuuhi ^b^.nii  ghi.na^eb^iccete paccayaa honti. ^b^.na^eb^kaaraa vuddhatthaa. aayati  gamana.m siilamassaati atthe ^b^.nii,^eb^ vuddhi^b^.na^eb^lopaa. gaamii,  gaamino, aagaamii kaalo. ^b^ghi.na^eb^paccaye -- ``kvaci  dhaatuu''tiaadinaa ^b^gha^eb^lopo, gaama.m gaami, gaamii, gaamayo.
text.3918: [03] ^b^bhaja^eb^ sevaaya.m, aayati bhajitu.m siilamassaati bhaajii,  bhaaji, ``na kagatta.m cajaa''ti yogavibhaagena nisedhanato ``sacajaana.m  kagaa .naanubandhe''ti ^b^ga^eb^tta.m na bhavati.
text.3919: [03] ^b^su^eb^ gatimhi, kaarite vuddhi^b^aavaa^eb^desaa ca, aayati  passavitu.m siilamassaati passaavii, passaavi. aayati pa.t.thaana.m  siilamassaati pa.t.thaayii, pa.t.thaayi, ``aakaarantaanamaayo''ti  ^b^aayaa^eb^deso.
text.3922: [03] ^b^kiriyaaya.m^eb^ kiriyatthaaya.m gammamaanaaya.m dhaatuuhi  ^b^.nvutu^eb^iccete paccayaa honti bhavissati kaale. ^b^.nvu^eb^mhi --  ^b^.na^eb^lopavuddhi^b^akaa^eb^desaa, karissa.m vajatiiti kaarako vajati.
text.3923: [03] ^b^tu^eb^mhi -- ``karassa ca tatta.m tusmi''nti ^b^ta^eb^kaaro,  sesa.m kattusama.m, kattaa vajati, kattu.m vajatiiti attho. eva.m pacissa.m  vajatiiti paacako vajati, pacitaa vajati. bhu~njissa.m vajatiiti  bhu~njako vajati, bhottaa vajati iccaadi.
text.3925: [03] kammasmi.m upapade dhaatuuhi ^b^.na^eb^ppaccayo hoti bhavissati  kaale ^b^.na^eb^lopavuddhii. nagara.m karissatiiti nagarakaaro vajati.  ^b^luu^eb^ chedane, saali.m lavissatiiti saalilaavo vajati. ^b^vapa^eb^  biijasantaane, dha~n~na.m vapissatiiti dha~n~navaapo vajati. bhoga.m  dadissatiiti bhogadaayo vajati, sindhu.m pivissatiiti sindhupaayo  vajati iccaadi.
text.3928: [03] kammasmi.m upapade ^b^sese^eb^ aparisamattatthe dhaatuuhi ^b^ssa.mntu  maana aana^eb^iccete paccayaa honti bhavissati kaale gammamaane, te ca  kitakattaa kattari bhavanti. kamma.m karissatiiti atthe  ^b^ssa.m^eb^paccayo, ^b^i^eb^kaaraagamo, ^b^si^eb^lopo, kamma.m karissa.m  vajati, saapekkhattaa na samaaso. ^b^ntu^eb^paccaye ``tanaadito  oyiraa''ti ^b^o,^eb^ ``simhi vaa''ti ntva'ntassa ^b^a^eb^tta.m,  kamma.m karissatiiti kamma.m karonto vajati iccaadi ^b^gu.navantu^eb^sama.m.
text.3929: [03] atha ^a^M0.0403^ea^ vaa ``bhavissati gamaadiihi .nii ghi.na''ti  ettha ``bhavissatii''ti vacanato ``ssantu''iti ekova paccayo  da.t.thabbo, tato ``simhi vaa''ti ^b^a^eb^tta.m, ``ntasaddo  a''mitiyogavibhaagena ^b^a^eb^maadeso, silopo, karissa.m  karissanto, karissantaa, karissanta.m, karissante, karissataa  karissantena, karissantehi, karissato karissantassa, karissata.m  karissantaana.m, karissataa, karissantehi, karissato karissantassa,  karissata.m karissantaana.m, karissati karissante, karissantesuutiaadi  ^b^gu.navantu^eb^sadisa.m neyya.m.
text.393: [03] napu.msakali"ngehi paresa.m sabbesa.m ^b^yona.m ni^eb^ hoti vaa.
text.3930: [03] ^b^maana^eb^mhi -- ^b^o^eb^kaa^b^raa^eb^kaaraana.m ^b^u^eb^tta.m, kamma.m  karissatiiti kamma.m kurumaano, kamma.m karaano vajati. eva.m bhojana.m  bhu~njissa.m vajati, bhojana.m bhu~njanto, bhu~njamaano, bhu~njaano vajati.
text.3932: [03] khaadana.m khaadissatiiti khaadana.m khaadissa.m vajati, khaadana.m  khaadanto, khaadana.m khaadamaano, khaadana.m khaadaano vajati. magga.m  carissatiiti magga.m carissa.m, magga.m caranto, magga.m caramaano, magga.m  caraano vajati. ^b^bhikkha^eb^ aayaacane, bhikkha.m bhikkhissatiiti  bhikkha.m bhikkhissa.m carati, bhikkha.m bhikkhanto, bhikkha.m bhikkhamaano,  bhikkha.m bhikkhaano carati iccaadi.
text.3939: [03] atiite kaale, vattamaane ca gammamaane dhaatuuhi .nuppaccayo hoti.  ^b^aadi^eb^saddena ^b^yu kta mi^eb^iccaadayo ca honti.
text.394: [03] a.t.thiini, a~n~nattha nicca.m ^b^yo^eb^lopo, diigho ca, a.t.thii, tathaa  he a.t.thi, he a.t.thii a.t.thiini, a.t.thi.m, a.t.thii a.t.thiini, a.t.thinaa iccaadi  ^b^aggi^eb^saddasama.m.
text.3940: [03] ^b^kara^eb^ kara.ne, akaasi, karotiiti vaa atthe .nuppaccayo,  ^b^.na^eb^lopo, vuddhi, kaaru sippii, kaaruu kaaravo. ^b^vaa^eb^  gatigandhanesu, avaayi, vaayatiiti vaa vaayu, ^b^aayaa^eb^deso.  ^b^sada^eb^ assaadane, assaadiiyatiiti saadu. ^b^raadha, saadha^eb^  sa.msiddhimhi, saadhiiyati anena hitanti saadhu. ^b^bandha^eb^ bandhane,  attani para.m bandhatiiti bandhu. ^b^cakkha^eb^ viyattiya.m vaacaaya.m,  cakkhatiiti cakkhu. ^b^i^eb^ gatimhi, enti gacchanti pavattanti  sattaa etenaati aayu. ^b^dara^eb^ vidaara.ne, dariiyatiiti daaru ka.t.tha.m.  ^b^sanu^eb^ daane. sanotiiti saanu pabbatekadeso. janiiyatiiti  jaanu ja"nghaasandhi. cariiyatiiti caaru dassaniiyo. ^b^raha^eb^ caage,  rahiiyatiiti raahu asurindo. ^b^tara^eb^ tara.ne, taalu, ^b^lo ra^eb^ssa.
text.3941: [03] ^b^maraa^eb^diina.m panettha ^b^.nu^eb^mhi ``gha.taadiina.m vaa''ti ettha  ^b^vaa^eb^saddena na vuddhi, maru, taru, tanu, dhanu, hanu, manu, asu,  vasu, va.tu, garu iccaadi.
text.3942: [03] ^b^cadi^eb^ hilaadane, ^b^yu^eb^ppaccayo, ``nudaadiihi  yu.nvuunamanaananaakaananakaa sakaaritehi caa''ti ^b^anaa^eb^deso,  niggahiitaagamo ca, candana.m. bhavati etthaati bhuvana.m,  ``jhalaanamiyuvaasare vaa''ti ^b^uvaa^eb^deso. ^b^kira^eb^ vikkhepe,  kira.no. vicakkha.no, kampana.m karotiiti karu.naa,  ^b^a^eb^kaara^b^ssu^eb^tta.m.
text.3943: [03] ^b^kta^eb^ppaccaye ^a^M0.0405^ea^ -- ^b^ka^eb^lopo, abhavi,  bhavatiiti vaa bhuuta.m yakkhaadi, bhuutaani. vaayatiiti vaato, taayatiiti  taato. ^b^mi^eb^mhi -- bhavanti etthaati bhuumi, netiiti nemi  iccaadi.
text.3945: [03] ^b^khii bhii su ru hu vaa dhuu hi luupii ada^eb^iccevamaadiihi  dhaatuuhi ^b^mana^eb^paccayo hoti, ^b^ma^eb^ssa ca ^b^to^eb^ hoti vaa.
text.3948: [03] ^b^khii^eb^ khaye, khiiyanti ^b^e^eb^ttha upaddavupasaggaadayoti  atthe ^b^mana^eb^paccayo, ``kvaci dhaatuu''tiaadinaa ^b^na^eb^lopo,  ``a~n~nesu caa''ti vuddhi, khemo. tathaa ^b^bhii^eb^ bhaye, bhaayanti  etasmaati bhiimo, ^b^vaa^eb^dhikaarato na vuddhi. ^b^su^eb^ abhisave,  savatiiti somo. ^b^ru^eb^ gatimhi, romo. ^b^hu^eb^  daanaadanahabyappadaanesu, huuyatiiti homo. ^b^vaa^eb^ gatigandhanesu,  vaamo. ^b^dhuu^eb^ kampane, dhunaatiiti dhuumo. ^b^hi^eb^ gatimhi,  hinotiiti hemo. ^b^luu^eb^ chedane, luuyatiiti lomo. ^b^pii^eb^  tappane, pii.nana.m pemo. ^b^ada^eb^ bhakkha.ne, adatiiti atthe ^b^mana,  ma^eb^ssa ca vaa ^b^ta^eb^kaaro, ``to dassaa''ti ^b^ta^eb^kaaro, attaa,  aatumaa, ``kvaci dhaatuu''tiaadinaa ^b^ada^eb^ssa diigho,  ^b^u^eb^kaaraagamo ca. ^b^yaa^eb^ paapa.ne, yaamo.
text.395: [03] eva.m satthi dadhi vaari akkhi acchi acci iccaadiini.
text.3951: [03] ^b^samadamadara raha lapa vasa yu du hi si daa saa .thaa bhasa  bahausu^eb^iccevamaadiihi dhaatuuhi ^b^tha ma^eb^iccete paccayaa honti vaa.
text.3952: [03] ^b^sama^eb^ ^a^M0.0406^ea^ upasame, ^b^kvaci^eb^ggaha.naadhikaaraa na  dhaatvantalopo, kilese sametiiti samatho samaadhi. eva.m damana.m  damatho. ^b^dara^eb^ daahe, dara.na.m daratho paridaaho. ^b^raha^eb^  upaadaane, rahiiyatiiti ratho, ``kvaci dhaatuu''tiaadinaa ^b^ha^eb^lopo.  ^b^sapa^eb^ akkose, sapana.m sapatho. ^b^vasa^eb^ nivaase, aavasanti  etasminti aavasatho. ^b^yu^eb^ missane, yuutho, diigho. ^b^du^eb^  gativuddhimhi, davati va.d.dhatiiti dumo. hinotiiti himo ussaavo.  ^b^si^eb^ bandhane, siiyatiiti siimaa, diigho. ^b^daa^eb^ avakha.n.dane,  daamo. ^b^saa^eb^ saamatthe, saamo. ^b^.thaa^eb^ gatinivattimhi,  thaamo, ^b^.tha^eb^ssa ^b^tha^eb^tta.m. ^b^bhasa^eb^ bhasmiikara.ne, bhasmaa,  ^b^brahmaa^eb^dittaa ``syaa caa''ti ^b^aa^eb^tta.m. ^b^baha^eb^ vuddhimhi,  brahmaa, nipaatanato ^b^bro ba^eb^ssa. ^b^usu^eb^ daahe, usmaa iccaadi.
text.3954: [03] ^b^masu^eb^iccetassa dhaatussa ^b^su^eb^ssa ^b^ccharacchera^eb^iccete  aadesaa honti. ^b^masu^eb^ macchere, ^b^kvi^eb^ppaccayo,  ^b^ccharaccheraa^eb^desaa, maccharo, macchero.
text.3957: [03] ^b^aa^eb^pubbassa ^b^cara^eb^iccetassa dhaatussa  ^b^ccharaccheraa^eb^desaa honti, ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^cchariyaa^eb^deso ca.  bhuso cara.nanti atthe ^b^kvi^eb^ppaccayo, ^b^cchariyaa^eb^diaadeso,  rassatta~nca. acchariya.m ^a^M0.0407^ea^, acchara.m, acchera.m. acchara.m  paharitu.m yuttantipi acchariya.m.
text.3959: [03] ^b^ala kala sala^eb^ iccetehi dhaatuuhi ^b^la ya^eb^iccete paccayaa  honti. ^b^ala^eb^ parisamattimhi, alla.m, alya.m. ^b^kala^eb^  sa"nkhyaane, kalla.m, kalya.m. ^b^sala, hula, pada^eb^ gatimhi, salla.m,  salya.m.
text.3962: [03] tehi ^b^kala sala^eb^iccetehi dhaatuuhi ^b^yaa.na laa.na^eb^ppaccayaa  honti. kalyaa.na.m, pa.tisalyaa.na.m, kallaa.no, pa.tisallaa.no. yadaa pana  ^b^lii^eb^ silesaneti dhaatu, tadaa ``pa.tisallayana.m, pa.tisallaa.na''nti  ^b^yu^eb^ppaccayena siddha.m, upasaggantassa niggahiitassa ^b^la^eb^tta.m,  ^b^rahaa^eb^diparattaa ^b^na^eb^ssa ^b^.na^eb^tta.m, ^b^e^eb^kaarassa ``kvaci  dhaatuu''tiaadinaa ^b^a^eb^tta~nca.
text.3964: [03] ^b^matha^eb^iccetassa dhaatussa ^b^tha^eb^ssa ^b^laa^eb^deso hoti,  ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^la^eb^ppaccayo, ^b^matha^eb^ vilo.lane, mallo, so eva  mallako, yathaa hiinako.
text.3967: [03] ^b^avassaka adhami.na^eb^iccetesvatthesu, ^b^.nii^eb^paccayo hoti,  kiccaa caati ^b^.nii^eb^paccayo, ^b^.na^eb^lopa vuddhi^b^si^eb^lopaa,  avassa.m ^a^M0.0408^ea^ me kamma.m kaatu.m yuttosiiti kaariisi me kamma.m  avassa.m, kaarino me kamma.m avassa.m, haariisi me bhaara.m avassa.m.
text.3968: [03] ^b^adhami.ne^eb^ -- sata.m me i.na.m daatu.m yuttosiiti daayiisi me  sata.m i.na.m, dhaariisi me sahassa.m i.na.m iccaadi, ^b^kicca^eb^ppaccayaa pana  he.t.thaayeva dassitaa.
text.3971: [03] ^b^vaja^eb^ gatimhi ^b^pa^eb^pubbo, pa.thamameva vajitabbanti atthe  ``bhaavakammesuu''ti adhikicca ``.nyocaa''ti ^b^.nya^eb^ppaccayo,  ^b^.na^eb^lopaadi. ``pavvajya''nti ruupe sampatte iminaa  ^b^jjha^eb^ssa ^b^jjaa^eb^deso, ^b^va^eb^kaaradvayassa ^b^ba^eb^kaaradvaya.m,  vuddhinisedho, itthili"ngatta~nca nipaccante, pabbajjaa.
text.3972: [03] tathaa ^b^i~nja^eb^ kampane, i~njana.m ijjaa. ^b^yaja^eb^ devapuujaaya.m,  yajana.m ijjaa, ``yajassaadissii''ti ^b^i^eb^tta.m. ^b^a~nja^eb^  byattigatiisu ^b^sa.m^eb^pubbo, sama~njana.m samajjaa, ~njhassa ^b^jjaa^eb^deso.  ^b^sada^eb^ visara.nagatyaavasaanesu, nisiidana.m nisajjaa. ^b^vida^eb^  ~naa.ne, vijaanana.m, vidatiiti vaa vijjaa. ^b^saja^eb^ vissagge,  vissajjana.m vissajjaa. ^b^pada^eb^ gatimhi, nipajjana.m nipajjaa.
text.3973: [03] ^b^hana^eb^ hi.msaagatiisu, hantabbanti atthe ^b^.nya^eb^mhi kate  ``vadho vaa sabbatthaa''ti ^b^hana^eb^ssa ^b^vadhaa^eb^deso,  ^b^jha^eb^ssiminaa ^b^jjhaa^eb^deso ca, so vajjho, saa vajjhaa.  ^b^sii^eb^ saye, sayana.m, sayanti etthaati vaa seyyaa, vuddhi,  ^b^ya^eb^kaarassa dvitta~nca ^a^M0.0409^ea^. ^b^dhaa^eb^ dhaara.ne ^b^sa.m^eb^pubbo,  sammaa citta.m nidheti etaaya, saya.m vaa saddahatiiti atthe  ``itthiyamatiyavo vaa''ti ^b^a^eb^ppaccayo, ``sandhaa''ti ruupe  sampatte iminaa ^b^na^eb^kaarassa ^b^da^eb^kaaro, saddhaa. ^b^cara^eb^  cara.ne, cara.nanti atthe .nyappaccaye, ^b^i^eb^kaaraagame ca kate iminaa  vuddhinisedho, cariyaa.
text.3974: [03] ^b^ruja^eb^ roge, rujananti atthe iminaa chappaccayo,  ``bya~njanantassa co chappaccayesu caa''ti dhaatvantassa ^b^ca^eb^kaaro,  rucchaa, rujaati ^b^a^eb^ppaccayena siddha.m. tathaa ^b^kuca^eb^ sa"nkocane,  ^b^cha^eb^ppaccayo, kocana.m kucchaa. ^b^labha^eb^ laabhe, ^b^cha^eb^mhi  ^b^caa^eb^deso, lacchaa. ^b^rada^eb^ vilekhane, racchaa. ^b^muha^eb^  vecitte, muyhana.m mucchaa, mucchana.m vaa mucchaa. ^b^vasa^eb^ nivaase,  vacchaa. ^b^kaca^eb^ dittimhi, kacchaa. ^b^katha^eb^ kathane  ^b^sa.m^eb^pubbo, saddhi.m kathananti atthe ^b^.nya^eb^ppaccayo, iminaa  ^b^thya^eb^ssa ^b^cchaa^eb^deso, ^b^sa.m^eb^saddassa ^b^saa^eb^deso ca,  saakacchaa. ^b^tuda^eb^ byathane, tucchaa. ^b^pada^eb^ gatimhi,  byaapajjananti atthe ^b^.nya^eb^mhi kate ``byaapaadyaa''ti ruupe sampatte  iminaa nipaatanena ^b^dya^eb^ssa ^b^jjaa^eb^deso, rassatta~nca, byaapajjaa.
text.3975: [03] ^b^mara^eb^ paa.nacaage, marati mara.nanti ca atthe iminaa  tyatyuppaccayaa, dhaatvantalopoca, tato ``yavata''miccaadinaa  ^b^ca^eb^kaaro, macco, maccu. ^b^sata^eb^ saatacce, iminaa  ^b^ya^eb^ppaccayo, tyassa ^b^ca^eb^kaaro, sacca.m. tathaa ^b^nata^eb^  gattavinaame, nacca.m. ^b^niti^eb^ nicce, nicca.m. ^b^maa^eb^ maane,  maayaa. ^b^jana^eb^ janane, jaayaa, ^b^kana^eb^ dittikantiisu, nyassa  ^b^~na^eb^tta.m, dvitta~nca, ka~n~naa. ^b^dhana^eb^ dha~n~ne, dha~n~na.m. punaatiiti  pu~n~na.m, ^b^na^eb^kaaraagamo iccaadi.
text.3976: [03] 661^b^.^eb^ ^b^ve^eb^ ^a^M0.0410^ea^ ^b^pu sii davava  mu ku daa bhuuhvaadiihi thuttima .nimaa nibbatte^eb^.
text.3977: [03] ^b^vepusiidavavamu^eb^iccevamaadiihi dhaatuuhi, ^b^ku daa  bhuu^eb^aadito, ^b^hvaa^eb^dito ca yathaakkama.m ^b^thuttima.nima^eb^iccete  paccayaa honti nibbattatthe. ^b^vepu^eb^ kampane, ^b^thu^eb^ppaccayo,  ``kvaci dhaatuu''tiaadinaa ^b^a^eb^kaaraagamo, atha vaa ``athuu''ti  vattabbe saralopa.m katvaa ``thuu''ti vuttanti da.t.thabba.m, vepena nibbatto  vepathu. ^b^sii^eb^ saye, sayanena nibbatto sayathu. ^b^dava^eb^  davane, davena nibbatto davathu. ^b^vamu^eb^ uggira.ne, vamena nibbatto  vamathu.
text.3978: [03] kutti kara.na.m, tena nibbatta.m kuttima.m, ^b^``ku''^eb^iti  nipaatanato ^b^kara^eb^ssa ^b^ku^eb^tta.m. ^b^daa^eb^ daane, daati daana.m,  tena nibbatta.m dattima.m, rassatta.m. bhuuti bhavana.m, tena nibbatta.m bhottima.m.  avahuti avahana.m, tena nibbatta.m ohaavima.m,  ^b^.na^eb^lopavuddhi^b^aavaa^eb^desaa.
text.398: [03] ``sukhabhaarii si'' itiidha anapu.msakattaabhaavaa ^b^si^eb^smimpi  ``agho rassa''miccaadinaa rassatta.m, ^b^si^eb^lopo. sukhakaari  daana.m, sukhakaarii sukhakaariini, he sukhakaari, he sukhakaarii he  sukhakaariini, sukhakaarina.m sukhakaari.m, sukhakaarii sukhakaariini.
text.3980: [03] akkose gammamaane ^b^namhi^eb^ nipaate upapade sati dhaatuto  ^b^aani^eb^ppaccayo hoti. na gamitabbo te jamma desoti atthe  ^b^aani^eb^ppaccayo, kitakattaa naamamiva katvaa ^b^si^eb^mhi kate na  gamaaniiti atthe kammadhaarayasamaaso, ^b^na^eb^ssa ^b^a^eb^tta.m, puna  samaasattaa naamamiva kate ^b^syaa^eb^dyuppatti, agamaani te jamma deso.  na kattabba.m te jamma kammanti akaraani te jamma kamma.m.
text.3981: [03] ^b^namhii^eb^ti ki.m? vipatti te. ^b^akkose^eb^ti ki.m?  agati te.
text.3983: [03] ^b^suna^eb^iccetassa paa.tipadikassa sambandhino ^b^una^eb^saddassa  ^b^o.na vaana uvaana una unakha u.na aa aana^eb^iccete aadesaa  honti. ^b^sunassuna^eb^ssa ^b^o.naa^eb^diaadese, paranayane ca kate  ^b^syaa^eb^dyuppatti, so.no, so.naa, svaano, svaanaa, suvaano, suvaanaa,  suno, sunaa, sunakho, sunakhaa, su.no, su.naa, saa saano, saanaa  iccaadi.
text.3985: [03] ^b^taru.na^eb^iccetassa saddassa ^b^susu^eb^iccaadeso hoti.  ^b^ca^eb^saddo aniyamattho, susu, taru.no vaa.
text.3987: [03] ^b^yuva^eb^iccetassa paa.tipadikassa ^b^uva^eb^saddassa  ^b^uvauvaanaunauuna^eb^iccete aadesaa honti. yuvaa ti.t.thati, yuvaano  ti.t.thati, yuno ti.t.thati, yuuno ti.t.thati.
text.3989: [03] ^b^chada^eb^iccevamaadiihi dhaatuuhi ^b^tatra.na^eb^iccete paccayaa honti.  ^b^chada^eb^ apavaara.ne, ``kvaci dhaatuu''tiaadinaa dhaatvantassa  ^b^ta^eb^kaaro. aatapa.m chaadetiiti chatta.m, chatra.m, bya~njanattaye  saruupaanamekassa lopo.
text.3990: [03] ^b^cinta^eb^ cintaaya.m, cintetiiti citta.m, ^b^na^eb^kaarassa  sa.myogaadittaa niggahiita.m, tassa ``bya~njane caa''ti lopo, citra.m,  ``gha.taadiina.m vaa''ti na vuddhi.
text.3991: [03] ^b^su^eb^ ^a^M0.0412^ea^ abhisave, ``paradvebhaavo .thaane''ti  ^b^ta^eb^ssa dvitta.m, atthe abhisavetiiti sutta.m, sutra.m.
text.3992: [03] ^b^suuda^eb^ pagghara.ne, atthe suudetiiti sutta.m, rassatta.m, bhujaadittaa  ^b^da^eb^lopo, dvitta~nca. ^b^su^eb^ savane, su.naatiiti sota.m, sotra.m,  vuddhi.
text.3993: [03] ^b^ni^eb^ paapa.ne, netiiti netta.m, netra.m. ^b^vida^eb^ ma"ngalle,  ^b^to da^eb^ssa, pavitta.m, pavitra.m. ^b^puu^eb^ pavane, punaatiiti pavitta.m,  pavitra.m, ^b^i^eb^kaaraagamo, vuddhib^avaab^desaa ca.
text.3994: [03] ^b^pata^eb^ gatimhi, patatiiti patta.m, patra.m, patato taayatiiti  patto, patro. ^b^tanu^eb^ vitthaare, ta~n~natiiti tanta.m, tantra.m.  ^b^yata^eb^ yatane, yatta.m, yatra.m. ^b^yaa^eb^ paapa.ne, yaapanaa yatraa.  ^b^yamu^eb^ uparame, yanta.m, yantra.m. ^b^ada^eb^ bhakkha.ne, adatiiti atta.m,  ^b^a^eb^tra.m. ^b^yuja^eb^ yoge, yujjatiiti yotta.m, yotra.m, bhujaadittaa  dhaatvantalopadvittaani.
text.3995: [03] ^b^vatu^eb^ vattane, vatta.m, vatra.m. ^b^mida^eb^ sinehane,  mijjatiiti mitta.m, mitra.m. ^b^maa^eb^ parimaa.ne, mattaa parimaa.na.m,  dvittarassattaani. eva.m punaatiiti putto, putro. ^b^kala^eb^  sa"nkhyaane, kalatta.m, kalatra.m bhariyaa. ^b^vara^eb^ sa.mvara.ne, varatta.m, varatra.m  cammamayayotta.m. ^b^vepu^eb^ kampane, vepatiiti vetta.m, vetra.m.
text.3996: [03] ^b^gupa^eb^ sa.mvara.ne, gotta.m, gotra.m, ``gupaadiina~ncaa''ti  dhaatvantalopo, dvitta~nca, gatta.m vaa, ``kvaci dhaatuu''tiaadinaa  ^b^u^eb^kaarassa ^b^a^eb^kaaro. ^b^daa^eb^ avakha.n.dane, daatta.m, daatra.m.  ^b^hu^eb^ havane, aggihutta.m. ^b^vaha^eb^ paapa.ne, vahitta.m, vahitra.m.  ^b^cara^eb^ cara.ne, caritta.m, caritra.m. ^b^muca^eb^ mocane, mutta.m passaavo.  ^b^bhaasa^eb^ dittimhi, bhastraa iccaadi.
text.3998: [03] ^b^vada cara vara^eb^iccevamaadiihi dhaatuuhi ^b^.nitta^eb^ppaccayo  hoti ga.ne gammamaane. ^b^vada^eb^ viyattiya.m vaacaaya.m, vaditaana.m ga.no  vaaditta.m. ^b^cara^eb^ cara.ne, caritaana.m ga.no caaritta.m. ^b^vara^eb^  vara.ne, varitaana.m ga.no vaaritta.m. atha vaa caranti tasmi.m  paripuurakaaritaayaati caaritta.m. vaarita.m taayanti ettha, etenaati vaa  vaaritta.m.
text.4000: [03] ^b^mida pada ranja tanu dhaa^eb^iccevamaadiihi dhaatuuhi yathaabhidhaana.m  ^b^tti ti^eb^iccete paccayaa honti. mijjati siniyhatiiti metti,  dhaatvantalopo. pajjatiiti patti. ^b^ranja^eb^ raage, ranjati etthaati  ratti. vitthaariiyatiiti tanti. dhaaretiiti dhaati. ^b^paa^eb^  rakkha.ne, paati. ^b^vasa^eb^ nivaase, vasati.
text.4002: [03] ^b^usu ranja da.msa^eb^iccetesa.m dhaatuuna.m antare ^b^da.msa^eb^ssa  ^b^da.d.dhaa^eb^deso hoti, sesehi dhaatuuhi ^b^.dha .tha^eb^iccete paccayaa  honti. ^b^usu^eb^ daahe, ^b^ranja^eb^ raage, ^b^.dha .tha^eb^ppaccayaa,  ``kvaci dhaatuu''tiaadinaa dhaatvantalopo, dvitta.m, u.d.dho, ra.t.tha.m.  ^b^da.msa^eb^ da.msane, ^b^kvi^eb^ppaccayo, ^b^kvi^eb^lopo, ^b^da.msa^eb^ssa  ^b^da.d.dhaa^eb^deso ca, da.d.dha.m.
text.4004: [03] ^b^suu vu asa^eb^iccetesa.m dhaatuuna.m ^b^uu u asaana.m  ata^eb^iccaadeso hoti, ante ^b^tha^eb^ppaccayo ca.
text.4005: [03] ^b^suu^eb^ ^a^M0.0414^ea^ hi.msaaya.m, sattha.m. ^b^vu^eb^ sa.mvara.ne, vattha.m.  ^b^asa^eb^ bhuvi, attho. yadaa pana ^b^sasu^eb^ hi.msaaya.m,  ^b^vasa^eb^ acchaadane, ^b^ara^eb^ gatimhiiti ca dhaatu, tadaa  ``samaadiihi tha maa''ti ^b^tha^eb^ppaccayo, ``kvaci dhaatuu''tiaadinaa  dhaatvantalopo, ``vagge ghosaa''tiaadinaa dvitta.m, sasatiiti sattha.m,  vasiiyatiiti vattha.m, ariiyatiiti attho.
text.4006: [03] 671^b^.^eb^ ^b^ranjudaadiihi dhadiddakiraa kvaci ja da  lopo ca^eb^.
text.4007: [03] ^b^ranja udi^eb^iccevamaadiihi dhaatuuhi ^b^dha da idda ka  ira^eb^iccete paccayaa honti kvaci, dhaatvantaana.m ^b^jadaana.m^eb^ lopo ca  hoti.
text.4008: [03] ^b^ranja^eb^ raage, ^b^dha^eb^ppaccayo, jalopo ca, randha.m.  ^b^udi^eb^ pasavanakledanesu ^b^sa.m^eb^pubbo, ^b^da^eb^ppaccayo, samuddo,  uddo. ^b^khuda^eb^ pipaasaaya.m, khuddo. ^b^chidi^eb^ dvidhaakara.ne,  chiddo. ^b^rudi^eb^ hi.msaaya.m, ruddo, luddo, ^b^lo ra^eb^ssa.  ^b^bhadi^eb^ kalyaa.ne, bhaddo. ^b^nidi^eb^ kucchaaya.m, niddaa.  ^b^muda^eb^ haase, muddaa. ^b^dala^eb^ duggatimhi, ^b^idda^eb^ppaccayo,  daliddo.
text.4009: [03] ^b^susa^eb^ sosane, ^b^suca^eb^ soke vaa, ^b^ka^eb^ppaccayo,  dhaatvantassa ^b^ka^eb^kaaro, sukka.m. ^b^vaca^eb^ viyattiya.m vaacaaya.m,  ^b^vaka^eb^ aadaane vaa, vakka.m. ^b^saka^eb^ sattimhi, sakko.  ^b^usu^eb^ daahe, ukkaa.
text.4010: [03] ^b^vaja^eb^ gatimhi, ^b^ira^eb^ppaccayo, appa.tihata.m vajatiiti  vajira.m. ^b^mada^eb^ ummaade, madiraa. eva.m mandira.m, rudhira.m, ruhira.m,  rucira.m. ^b^badha^eb^ bandhane, badhiro, badhiraa, badhira.m, timiro,  timira.m, siro. ^b^sara^eb^ hi.msaaya.m, sarira.m. ``kalila.m,  salila''ntiaadiisu ^b^lo ra^eb^ssa. ku.tilo, kokilo iccaadayo.
text.4012: [03] ^b^pa.ti^eb^to parassa ^b^hi^eb^iccetassa dhaatussa ^b^hera.na  hiira.na^eb^iccete aadesaa honti. ^b^hi^eb^ gatimhi ^b^pa.ti^eb^pubbo,  pa.tipakkhe madditvaa gacchatiiti atthe ``kvi caa''ti ^b^kvi^eb^ppaccayo,  ^b^kvi^eb^lopo, iminaa ^b^hera.na hiira.na^eb^aadesaa, ^b^.na^eb^lopo,  ``tesu vuddhii''tiaadinaa pa.tisaddaadissa vuddhi, paa.tihera.m, paa.tihiira.m,  yadaa pana ^b^hara^eb^ hara.neti dhaatu, tadaa pa.tipakkhe haratiiti  ``paa.tihaariya''miti ^b^.nye^eb^napi siddha.m.

text.483: [03] ^b^ta^eb^iccetassa sabbanaamassa ^b^ta^eb^kaarassa ^b^na^eb^tta.m hoti  vaa sabbattha li"ngesu. ne te, na.m ta.m, ne te, nena tena, nehi nebhi  tehi tebhi.
text.486: [03] ^b^ta^eb^iccetassa sabbanaamassa sabbasseva ^b^a^eb^tta.m hoti vaa  ^b^sa smaa smi.m sa.m saa^eb^iccetesu vacanesu sabbattha li"ngesu. assa  nassa tassa, nesa.m tesa.m nesaana.m tesaana.m.
text.487: [03] ``smaahismi.mna.m mhaabhimhi vaa''ti ito ``smaasmi.mna.m,  mhaamhii''ti ca vattate.
text.489: [03] ^b^ta ima^eb^iccetehi kataakaarehi paresa.m ^b^smaasmi.m^eb^na.m  ^b^mhaa mhi^eb^iccete aadesaa na honti.
text.49: [03] lahukaa mattaa pamaa.na.m yesa.m te ^b^lahumattaa, mattaa^eb^saddo cettha  accharaasa"nghaataakkhinimiilanasa"nkhaata.m kaala.m vadati, taaya mattaaya  ^b^e^eb^kamattaa ^b^rassaa,^eb^ dvimattaa ^b^diighaa,^eb^ a.d.dhamattaa  ^b^bya~njanaa. lahu^eb^ggaha.na~ncettha chandasi diya.d.dhamattassaapi gaha.nattha.m.  rassakaalayogato ^b^rassaa,^eb^ rassakaalavanto vaa ^b^rassaa^eb^.
text.492: [03] atha ^a^M0.0022^ea^ saraanameva sandhikaariye sampatte pakatibhaavo  vuccate.
text.495: [03] saraa kho sare pare kvaci chandabhedaasukhuccaara.na.t.thaane,  sandhicchaarahita.t.thaane ca pakatiruupaani honti, na  lopaadesavikaaramaapajjanteti attho.
text.496: [03] tattha ^b^pakati.t.thaana.m^eb^ naama aalapanantaa anitismi.m  acchandaanurakkha.ne asamaase padantadiighaa ca ikaarukaaraa ca  naamapadantaatiitakriyaadimhiiti evamaadi.
text.497: [03] ^b^aalapanantesu^eb^ taava -- katamaa caananda aniccasa~n~naa,  katamaa caananda aadiinavasa~n~naa, saariputta idhekacco, ehi sivika  u.t.thehi, upaasakaa idhekacco, bhoti ayye, bhikkhu aroga.m tava siila.m,  si~nca bhikkhu ima.m naava.m, bhikkhave eva.m vadaami, pa~ncime gahapatayo  aanisa.msaa iccevamaadiisu pakatibhaavo, pubbassaralopa^b^yavaa^eb^desaadayo  na honti.
text.498: [03] ^b^kvaci^eb^ggaha.nena ^b^iti^eb^smi.m chandaanurakkha.ne sandhi  hoti, yathaa -- sakkaa deviiti, namo te buddha viiratthu.
text.499: [03] ^b^sare^eb^ti ki.m? saadhu mahaaraajaati, eva.m kira bhikkhuuti.
text.500: [03] ^b^asamaase padantadiighesu^eb^ -- aayasmaa aanando gaathaa  ajjhabhaasi, devaa aabhassaraa yathaa, tevijjaa iddhippattaa ^a^M0.0023^ea^  ca, bhagavaa u.t.thaayaasanaa, bhagavaa etadavoca, abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m  a.t.thaasi, gantvaa olokento, bhuutavaadii atthavaadii, ya.m itthii arahaa  assa, saamaavatii aaha, paapakaarii ubhayattha tappati, nadii ottharati,  ye te bhikkhuu appicchaa, bhikkhuu aamantesi, bhikkhuuujjhaayi.msu,  bhikkhuu evamaaha.msu, imasmi.m gaame aarakkhakaa, sabbe ime, katame  ekaadasa, gambhiire odakantike, appamaado amatapada.m, sa"ngho aagacchatu,  ko ima.m pathavi.m viccessati, aaloko udapaadi, eko ekaaya, cattaaro  oghaa.
text.501: [03] ^b^nipaatesupi^eb^ -- are ahampi, sace imassa kaayassa, no  abhikkamo, aho acchariyo, atho anto ca, atha kho aayasmaa,  atho o.t.thavacittakaa, tato aamantayii satthaa.
text.502: [03] ^b^kvaci^eb^ggaha.nena ^b^a^eb^kaara itiivevetthaadiisu sandhipi.  yathaa -- aagatattha, aagatamhaa, katamaassu cattaaro, appassutaaya.m  puriso, itthiiti, ca mariiva, sabbeva, sveva, eseva nayo,  parisuddhetthaayasmanto, nettha, ta.m kutettha labbhaa, sacesa braahma.na,  tathuupama.m, yathaaha.
text.503: [03] ^b^asamaase^eb^ti ki.m? jivhaayatana.m, avijjogho, itthindriya.m,  abhibhaayatana.m, bhayatupa.t.thaana.m. ^b^acchandaanurakkha.ne^eb^ti ^a^M0.0024^ea^  ki.m? saddhiidha vitta.m purisassa se.t.tha.m, yo missaro.
text.504: [03] ^b^naamapadantaikaarukaaresu^eb^ -- gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi, pupphaani  aahari.msu, satthu adaasi.
text.507: [03] saraa kho bya~njane pare pakatiruupaa hontiiti yebhuyyena  diigharassalopehi vikaaraabhaavo. yathaa -- accayo, paccayo, bhaasati  vaa karoti vaa, vedanaakkhandho, bhaagyavaa, bhadro kasaamiva, diiyati,  tu.nhiibhuuto, so dhamma.m deseti.
text.513: [03] saraa kho bya~njane pare kvaci diigha.m pappontiiti  suttasukhuccaara.nachandaanurakkha.na.t.thaanesu diigho.
text.514: [03] tyassa pahiinaa tyaassa pahiinaa, svassa svaassa, madhuva ma~n~nati  baalo madhuvaa ma~n~natii baalo, tathaa eva.m gaame munii ^a^M0.0025^ea^ care,  khantii parama.m tapo titikkhaa, na ma"nkuu bhavissaami, svaakkhaato,  yvaaha.m, kaamato jaayatii soko, kaamato jaayatii bhaya.m, sakko ujuu ca  suhujuu ca, anuupaghaato, duurakkha.m, duurama.m, suurakkha.m, duuharataa.
text.516: [03] yi.t.tha.m vaa huta.m vaa loke, yadi vaa saavake, puggalaa dhammadasaa  te, bhovaadii naama so hoti, yathaabhaavii gu.nena so itiidha --
text.519: [03] saraa kho bya~njane pare kvaci rassa.m pappontiiti chandaanurakkha.ne,  aagame, sa.myoge ca rassatta.m.
text.52: [03] tattha a.t.thasu saresu rassehi a~n~ne dvimattaa pa~nca saraa diighaa  naama honti. ta.m yathaa -- aa ii uu e o-iti diighaa.
text.520: [03] ^b^chandaanurakkha.ne^eb^ taava yi.t.tha.mva huta.mva loke, yadiva saavake,  puggala dhammadasaa te, bhovaadi naama so hoti, yathaabhaavi gu.nena so.
text.522: [03] ^b^sa.myoge^eb^ paraakamo parakkamo, aasaado assaado, eva.m  ta.nhakkhayo, jhaanassa laabhimhi, vasimhi, thullaccayo.
text.523: [03] ^b^kvacii^eb^ti ki.m? maayida.m, manasaa da~n~naa vimuttaana.m,  yathaakkama.m, aakhyaatika.m, diiyyati, suuyyati.
text.524: [03] eso kho byanti.m kaahiti, so gaccha.m na nivattati iccatra --
text.527: [03] saraa kho bya~njane pare kvaci lopa.m papponti, tatra lutte .thaane  ^b^a^eb^kaaraagamo ca hoti. ^b^etata^eb^saddantokaarassevaaya.m lopo.
text.528: [03] esa kho byanti.m kaahiti, sa gaccha.m na nivattati, eva.m esa  dhammo, esa pattosi, sa muni, sa siilavaa.
text.529: [03] ^b^kvacii^eb^ti ki.m? eso dhammo, so muni, so siilavaa.
text.53: [03] ^b^a~n~na^eb^ggaha.na.m diya.d.dhamattikaanampi sa"ngaha.nattha.m. diighakaale  niyuttaa, tabbanto vaa ^b^diighaa^eb^. kvaci sa.myogapubbaa ekaarokaaraa  rassaa iva vuccante. yathaa -- ettha, seyyo, o.t.tho, sotthi.  ^b^kvacii^eb^ti ki.m? ma.m ce tva.m nikha.na.m vane. putto tyaaha.m mahaaraaja.
text.530: [03] ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^eta^eb^saddantassa sarepi kvaci lopo. yathaa  -- esa attho, esa aabhogo, esa idaani.
text.533: [03] saramhaa parassa bya~njanassa dvebhaavo hoti .thaane. dvinna.m bhaavo  dvibhaavo, so eva dvebhaavo.
text.534: [03] ettha ca ^b^.thaana.m^eb^ naama rassaakaarato para.m pa pati  pa.tikamukusa kudha kii gaha juta ~naasi su sambhuu sara  sasaadiinamaadibya~njanaana.m dvebhaava.m, tika taya ti.msa vataadiinamaadi ca,  vatu va.tudisaadiinamanta~nca, u du ni-upasagga ta catu cha  santasaddaadesaadipara~nca, apadantaa naakaaradiighato ^b^ya^eb^kaaraadi ca,
text.537: [03] ^b^chandaanurakkha.ne ca^eb^ -- ghara jhe dha.msu bhamaadiinamaadi ca,  rassaakaarato vaggaana.m catutthadutiyaa ca iccevamaadi.
text.538: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0027^ea^ ^b^pa pati pa.tiisu^eb^ taava -- idha pamaado  idhappamaado, eva.m appamaado, vippayutto, suppasanno, sammaa padhaana.m  sammappadhaana.m, rassatta.m, appativattiyo, adhipatippaccayo, suppati.t.thito,  appa.tipuggalo, vippa.tisaaro, suppa.tipanno, suppa.tipatti.
text.539: [03] ^b^kamaadidhaatuusu^eb^ -- pakkamo, pa.tikkamo, hetukkamo, aakamati  akkamati, eva.m parakkamati, yathaakkama.m.
text.543: [03] paggaho, viggaho, anuggaho, niggaho, candaggaho, di.t.thiggaaho.
text.545: [03] kata~n~nuu, vi~n~nuu, pa~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.na.m, anu~n~naa, manu~n~naa,  sama~n~naa.
text.55: [03] dvinna.m samuuho ^b^du,^eb^ tasmi.m dumhi. sa.myogabhuute akkhare pare  yo pubbo rassakkharo, so garusa~n~no hoti. yathaa -- datvaa,  hitvaa, bhutvaa.
text.551: [03] avissajjento, vissajjento, pariccajanto, upaddavo,  upakkili.t.tho, mittaddu, aayabbayo, udabbahi iccaadi.
text.552: [03] ^b^saramhaa^eb^ti ^a^M0.0028^ea^ ki.m? sampayutto, sampatijaato,  sampa.ticchanna.m, sa"nkamanto, sa"ngaho.
text.553: [03] ^b^.thaane^eb^ti ki.m? maa ca pamaado, patigayhati, vaciipakopa.m  rakkheyya, ye pamattaa yathaa mataa, manopakopa.m rakkheyya, idha modati,  pecca modati.
text.554: [03] ^b^tikaadiisu^eb^ -- kusalattika.m, piitittika.m, hetuttika.m,  vedanaattika.m, lokattaya.m, bodhittaya.m, vatthuttaya.m. ekatti.msa, dvatti.msa,  catutti.msa. siilabbata.m, subbato, sappiitiko, samannaagato, punappuna.m  iccaadi.
text.555: [03] ^b^vatu va.tu disaadiinamante^eb^ yathaa -- vattati, va.t.tati,  dassana.m, phasso iccaadi.
text.556: [03] ^b^u du ni upasaggaadiparesu^eb^ -- uka.mso ukka.mso. dukara.m  dukkara.m, nika"nkho nikka"nkhe.
text.557: [03] eva.m uggata.m, duccarita.m, nijja.ta.m, u~n~naata.m, unnati, uttaro,  dukkaro, niddaro, unnato, duppa~n~no, dubbalo, nimmalo, uyyutto,  dullabho, nibbatto, ussaaho, dussaho, nissaaro.
text.558: [03] tathaa takkaro, tajjo, tanninno, tappabhavo, tammayo.
text.562: [03] ^b^.thaane^eb^ti ki.m? nikaayo, nidaana.m, nivaaso, nivaato,  tato, catuviisati, chasa.t.thi.
text.563: [03] ^b^yakaaraadimhi^eb^ ^a^M0.0029^ea^ -- niiyyati, suuyyati,  abhibhuuyya, viceyya, vineyya, dheyya.m, neyya.m, seyyo, jeyyo,  veyyaakara.no.
text.567: [03] ^b^yavatamaadese^eb^ -- jaati andho, vipali aaso, ani  aayo, yadi eva.m, api ekacce, api ekadaa iccatra, ^b^i^eb^kaarassa  ``iva.n.no ya.m navaa''ti ^b^ya^eb^kaare kate --
text.568: [03] ``sabbassa so daamhi vaa''ti ito ma.n.duukagatiyaa ^b^vaa^eb^ti  vattate.
text.571: [03] ^b^kaara^eb^ggaha.na.m ^b^ya^eb^vata.m ^b^sa^eb^kaara ^b^ka ca .ta  pa^eb^vaggaana.m ^b^sa^eb^kaara^b^kaca.tapa^eb^vaggaadesattha.m, tathaa ^b^ya^eb^vata.m  ^b^ta dha .na^eb^kaaraana.m ^b^cha jha~na^eb^kaaraadesattha~nca, tato  yavatamaadesassa anena dvibhaavo.
text.572: [03] jaccandho, vipallaaso, a~n~naayo, yajjeva.m, appekacce appekadaa.
text.576: [03] ^b^chandaanurakkha.ne^eb^ ^a^M0.0030^ea^ -- nappajjahe va.n.nabala.m  puraa.na.m, ujjugatesu seyyo, gacchanti suggatinti.
text.58: [03] diigho ca saro garusa~n~no hoti. yathaa -- naavaa, nadii, vadhuu,  dve, tayo. garukato a~n~no ``lahuko''ti veditabbo.
text.580: [03] saramhaa parabhuutaana.m vagge ghosaaghosaana.m bya~njanaana.m yathaakkama.m  vaggatatiya pa.thamakkharaa dvibhaava.m gacchanti .thaaneti .thaanaasannavasena  tabbagge tatiyapa.thamaava honti.
text.581: [03] ettha ca sampatte niyamattaa ^b^ghosaaghosa^eb^ggaha.nena  catutthadutiyaava adhippetaa, itarathaa ani.t.thappasa"ngosiyaa. tena  ``kata~n~nuu, tannayo, tammayo''tiaadiisu vaggapa~ncamaana.m satipi ghosatte  tatiyappasa"ngona hoti, .thaanaadhikaarato vaa.
text.582: [03] ^b^gharaadiisu pa u du niaadiparacatutthesu^eb^ taava -- pagharati  paggharati, eva.m uggharati, ugghaa.teti, dugghoso, nigghoso, eseva  cajjhaanaphalo, pa.thamajjhaana.m, abhijjhaayati, ujjhaayati, viddha.mseti,  uddha.msito, uddhaaro, niddhaaro, niddhano, niddhuto, vibbhanto, ubbhato,  dubbhikkha.m, nibbhaya.m, tabbhaavo, catuddhaa, cabhubbhi, chaddhaa, saddhammo,  sabbhuuto, mahaddhano, mahabbhaya.m.
text.584: [03] ^b^.thaane^eb^ti ^a^M0.0031^ea^ ki.m? siilavantassa jhaayino, ye  jhaanappasutaa dhiiraa, nidhaana.m, mahaadhana.m.
text.585: [03] ^b^rassaakaaratopara.m vaggadutiyesu^eb^ -- pa~nca khandhaa  pa~ncakkhandhaa, eva.mruupakkhandho, akkhamo, abhikkha.na.m, avikkhepo,  jaatikkhetta.m, dhaatukkhobho, aayukkhayo. setachatta.m setacchatta.m, eva.m  sabbacchanna.m, vicchinna.m, bodhicchaayaa, jambucchaayaa, samucchedo. tatra  .thito tatra.t.thito, eva.m thala.t.tha.m, jala.t.tha.m, adhi.t.thita.m, ni.t.thita.m,  cattaari.t.thaanaani, garu.t.thaaniyo, samu.t.thito, suppa.t.thaano. yasatthero, yattha,  tattha, pattharati, vitthaaro, abhitthuto, vitthambhito, anutthuna.m,  catuttho, kuttha. pappho.teti, mahapphala.m, nipphala.m, vipphaaro,  paripphuseyya, madhupphaa.nita.m.
text.586: [03] ^b^aakaarato^eb^ -- aakhaato aakkhaato, eva.m ta.nhaakkhayo,  aa.naakkhetta.m, sa~n~naakkhandho, aachaadayati, aacchaadayati, eva.m  aacchindati, naavaa.t.tha.m, aattharati, aappho.teti.
text.587: [03] ^b^saramhaa^eb^ti ki.m? sa"nkhaaro, ta"nkha.ne, sa~nchanna.m, ta.n.thaana.m,  santhuto, tamphala.m.
text.588: [03] ^b^.thaane^eb^ti ki.m? puuvakhajjaka.m, tassa chaviyaadiini  chinditvaa, yathaa .thita.m, katha.m, kammaphala.m.
text.589: [03] nikamati, nipatti, nicayo, nicarati, nitara.na.m iccatra --  ``do dhassa caa''ti ettha caggaha.nassa bahulatthattaa tena  ^b^ca^eb^ggaha.nena yathaapayoga.m bahudhaa aadeso siyaa.
text.590: [03] yathaa -- ^b^ni upasaggato^eb^ kamu pada ci cara taraana.m  pa.thamassa vaggadutiyo iminaa dvitta.m, nikkhamati, nipphatti, nicchayo,  niccharati, nitthara.na.m.
text.591: [03] tathaa ^a^M0.0032^ea^ ^b^bo vassa^eb^ kuva diva siva vajaadiina.m  dviruupassaati ^b^va^eb^kaaradvayassa ^b^ba^eb^kaaradvaya.m, yathaa -- kubbanto,  eva.m kubbaano, kubbanti, sadhaatvantayaadesassa dvitta.m. divati  dibbati, eva.m dibbanto, sibbati, sibbanto, pavajati pabbajati,  pabbajanto, nivaana.m nibbaana.m, nibbuto, nibbindati, udabbaya.m iccaadi.
text.592: [03] ^b^lo rassa^eb^ pari taru.naadiina.m kvaci. paripanno palipanno,  eva.m palibodho, palla"nka.m, taru.no taluno, mahaasaalo, maaluto,  sukhumaalo.
text.593: [03] ^b^.to tassa^eb^ dukkataadiina.m kvaci. yathaa -- dukkata.m dukka.ta.m,  eva.m suka.ta.m, paha.to, pattha.to, uddha.to, visa.to iccaadi.
text.597: [03] tathaa ^b^.no nassa pa pariaadito^eb^. panidhaana.m pa.nidhaana.m,  eva.m pa.nipaato, pa.naamo, pa.niita.m, pari.nato, pari.naamo, ninnayo  ni.n.nayo, eva.m u.n.nato, o.nato iccaadi.
text.60: [03] .thapetvaa a.t.tha sare sesaa a.d.dhamattaa akkharaa ^b^ka^eb^kaaraadayo  niggahiitantaa tetti.msa bya~njanaa naama honti. vuttehi a~n~ne  ^b^sesaa^eb^. bya~njiiyati etehi atthoti ^b^bya~njanaa^eb^. ta.m yathaa  -- ka kha ga gha "na, ca cha ja jha ~na, .ta .tha .da .dha .na, ta tha da dha  na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra lava sa ha .la a.m-iti bya~njanaa.  ^b^ka^eb^kaaraadiisvakaaro uccaara.nattho.
text.600: [03] ^b^pati^eb^iccetassa upasaggassa sare vaa bya~njane vaa pare kvaci  ^b^pa.ti^eb^aadeso hoti pubbassaralopo. pa.taggi, pa.tiha~n~nati.
text.604: [03] ^b^putha^eb^iccetassa anto saro ^b^u^eb^kaaro hoti bya~njane  pare, dvitta.m. puthujjano, puthubhuuta.m.
text.605: [03] ^b^bya~njane^eb^ti ki.m? putha aya.m. ``puthassa a putha''iti  samaaseneva siddhe puna ^b^anta^eb^ggaha.naadhikaarena kvaci aputhantassaapi  utta.m sare.
text.606: [03] mano a~n~na.m manu~n~na.m, eva.m ima.m evuma.m, paralopo, iti eva.m  itveva.m, ^b^u^eb^kaarassa ^b^va^eb^kaaro.
text.610: [03] ^b^ava^eb^iccetassa upasaggassa ^b^o^eb^kaaro hoti kvaci  bya~njane pare. okaaso, onaddho, ovadati, osaana.m.
text.616: [03] ^b^ava^eb^saddassa upapade ti.t.thamaanassa tassokaarassa vipariito  ca hoti bya~njane pare.
text.617: [03] tassa vipariito tabbipariito, upoccaarita.m pada.m upapada.m,  ^b^okaaravipariito^eb^ti ukaarasseta.m adhivacana.m. ^b^ca^eb^saddo  ^b^ka^eb^tthaci ^a^M0.0034^ea^ nivattanattho, dvitta.m. uggate suuriye,  uggacchati, ^b^u^eb^ggahetvaa.
text.621: [03] bya~njane pare kvaci okaaraagamo hotiiti ^b^atippa  para^eb^saddehi okaaraagamo ``yavamada''iccaadisutte ^b^ca^eb^saddena  ^b^atippa^eb^to ^b^ga^eb^kaaraagamo ca.
text.622: [03] atippago kho taava, parosata.m, parosahassa.m, ettha ``saraa sare  lopa''nti pubbassaralopo.
text.626: [03] manomaya.m, ayomaya.m, eva.m manose.t.thaa, ayopatto, tapodhano,  tamonudo, siroruho, tejokasi.na.m, rajojalla.m, ahoratta.m, rahogato.
text.628: [03] siihagatiyaa ^b^vaa^eb^dhikaarato idha na bhavati, manamattena  manaccha.t.thaana.m, ayakapalla.m, tamavinodano, manaaayatana.m.
text.63: [03] tesa.m kho bya~njanaana.m ^b^ka^eb^kaaraadayo ^b^ma^eb^kaarantaa  pa~ncaviisati bya~njanaa pa~ncapa~ncavibhaagena vaggaa naama honti. ta.m  yathaa -- ka kha ga gha "na, ca cha ja jha ~na, .ta .tha .da .dha .na, ta tha  da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma-iti vaggaa.
text.632: [03] ta.nha.m karo, ra.na.m jaho, sa.m .thito, juti.m dharo, sa.m mato itiidha  ``niggahiita''nti adhikaaro, ``bya~njane''ti vattate.
text.634: [03] vaggabhuute bya~njane pare niggahiita.m kho vagganta.m vaa pappotiiti  nimittaanusvaraana.m .thaanaasannavasena tabbaggapa~ncamo hoti.  vavatthitavibhaasatthoya.m ^b^vaa^eb^saddo. tena ``ta.nha"nkaro, ra.na~njaho,  sa.n.thito, jutindharo, sammato''tiaadiisu nicca.m.
text.635: [03] ta"nkaroti ta.m karoti, ta"nkha.na.m ta.mkha.na.m, sa"ngaho sa.mgaho, ta"nghata.m  ta.m ghata.m. dhamma~ncare dhamma.m care, ta~nchanna.m ta.m channa.m, ta~njaata.m ta.m jaata.m,  ta~n~naa.na.m ta.m ~naa.na.m. ta.n.thaana.m ta.m .thaana.m, ta.n.dahati ^b^bha.m^eb^ .dahati.  tantanoti ta.m tanoti, tanthira.m ta.m thira.m, tandaana.m ta.m daana.m, tandhana.m ta.m  dhana.m, tanniccuta.m ta.m niccuta.m. tampatto ta.m patto, tamphala.m ta.m phala.m,  tesambodho tesa.m bodho, sambhuuto sa.mbhuuto, tammitta.m ta.m mitta.m. ki"nkato  ki.m kato, daatu"ngato daatu.m gatoti evamaadiisu vikappena.
text.636: [03] idha na bhavati, na ta.m kamma.m kata.m saadhu, sara.na.m gacchaami.
text.637: [03] sati copari ^b^vaa^eb^ggaha.ne vijjhantare vaa idha  ^b^vaa^eb^ggaha.nakara.namatthantaravi~n~naapanattha.m, tena niggahiitassa  ^b^sa.m^eb^upasaggapumantassa ^b^le la^eb^kaaro. yathaa -- pa.tisa.mliino  pa.tisalliino, eva.m pa.tisallaa.no, sallakkha.naa, sallekho, sallaapo, pu.mli"nga.m  pulli"nga.m.
text.638: [03] paccatta.m eva, ta.m eva, ta~nhi tassa, eva~nhi vo itiidha  ``vaa''ti adhikaaro.
text.64: [03] te pana pa.thamakkharavasena ^b^ka^eb^vagga^b^ca^eb^vaggaadivohaara.m  gataa, ^b^vaggo^eb^ti samuuho, tattha pa~ncapa~ncavibhaagenaati vaa pa~nca  pa~nca etesamatthiiti ^a^M0.0006^ea^ vaa ^b^pa~ncapa~ncaso,^eb^ mo anto  yesa.m te ^b^mantaa^eb^.
text.640: [03] ^b^e^eb^kaara^b^ha^eb^kaare pare niggahiita.m kho ^b^~na^eb^kaara.m  pappoti vaa, ^b^e^eb^kaare ^b^~naa^eb^desassa dvibhaavo.
text.641: [03] paccatta~n~nevapaccatta.m eva, ta~n~neva ta.m eva, ta~nhi tassa ta~nhi  tassa, eva~nhi vo eva~nhi vo.
text.642: [03] vavatthitavibhaasattaa ^b^vaa^eb^saddassa ^b^evahi^eb^nipaatato  a~n~nattha na hoti, yathaa -- evameta.m, eva.m hoti.
text.643: [03] sa.myogo, sa.myojana.m, sa.myato, sa.myaacikaaya, ya.m yadeva,  aanantarika.m yamaahu itiidha ``~na''miti vattate.
text.645: [03] niggahiita.m kho ^b^ya^eb^kaare pare saha ^b^ya^eb^kaarena  ^b^~na^eb^kaara.m pappoti vaa, ^b^~naa^eb^desassa dvitta.m.
text.646: [03] sa~n~nogo sa.myogo, sa~n~nojana.m sa.myojana.m, sa~n~nato sa.myato,  sa~n~naacikaaya sa.myaacikaaya, ya~n~nadeva ya.m yadeva, aanantarika~n~namaahu  aanantarika.m yamaahu.
text.647: [03] ^b^vaa^eb^saddassa vavatthitavibhaasattaava ^b^sa.m^eb^padantato ca  sabbanaama^b^ya^eb^kaaraparato ca niggahiitaa a~n~nattha na hoti. yathaa  -- eta.m yojana.m, ta.m yaana.m, sara.na.m yanti.
text.648: [03] ettha ca ``saha ye caa''ti vattabbe ``sa ye caa''ti vacanato  suttantesu sukhuccaara.natthamakkharalopopiiti da.t.thabba.m, tena pa.tisa"nkhaaya  yoniso pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso, saya.m abhi~n~naaya sacchikatvaa saya.m  abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa, pariyesanaaya pariyesanaatiaadi sijjhati.
text.649: [03] ta.m ^a^M0.0037^ea^ aha.m bruumi, ya.m aahu, dhana.m eva, ki.m eta.m,  ninditu.m arahati, ya.m anicca.m, ta.m anattaa, eta.m avoca, eta.m eva  iccatra --
text.651: [03] niggahiitassa kho sare pare ^b^ma^eb^kaara^b^da^eb^kaaraadesaa  honti vaa. ettha ca ^b^vaa^eb^saddaadhikaarassa vavatthitavibhaasattaa  ^b^da^eb^kaaro ^b^yateta^eb^saddato parasseva.
text.652: [03] tamaha.m bruumi, yamaahu, dhanameva, kimeta.m, ninditumarahati,  yadanicca.m, tadanattaa, etadavoca, etadeva.
text.653: [03] ^b^vaa^eb^ti ki.m? ta.m aha.m, eta.m eva, akkocchi ma.m avadhi ma.m.
text.654: [03] ettha ca ^b^madaa^eb^ti yogavibhaagena bya~njanepi vaa  ^b^ma^eb^kaaro. tena ``buddhama sara.nama gacchaamii''tiaadi sijjhati.
text.655: [03] taasa.m aha.m santike, viduuna.m agga.m, tassa adaasi.m aha.m itiidha  ``sare''ti vattate.
text.657: [03] niggahiita.m kho sare pare lopa.m pappoti kvaci chandaanurakkha.ne  sukhuccaara.na.t.thaane. pubbassaralopo, parassa asa.myogantassa diigho.
text.658: [03] taasaaha.m santike, viduunagga.m, tassa adaasaaha.m, tathaagataaha.m,  evaaha.m, kyaaha.m.
text.66: [03] ^b^a^eb^kaaro uccaara.nattho, ^b^iti^eb^saddo  panaanantaravuttanidassanattho, a.miti ya.m ^b^a^eb^kaarato para.m vutta.m bindu,  ta.m niggahiita.m naama hoti. rassassara.m nissaaya gayhati, kara.na.m  niggahetvaa gayhatiiti vaa ^b^niggahiita.m^eb^.
text.660: [03] ariyasaccaana.m dassana.m, eta.m buddhaana.m saasana.m, sa.mratto, sa.mraago,  sa.mrambho, avisa.mhaaro, cira.m pavaasi.m, gantu.m kaamo, gantu.m mano itiidha  ``kvaci lopa''nti vattate.
text.662: [03] niggahiita.m kho bya~njane ca pare lopa.m pappoti kvaci  chandaanurakkha.naadimhi. ^b^ra^eb^kaara^b^ha^eb^kaaresu upasaggantassa  diigho.
text.663: [03] ariyasaccaana dassana.m, eta.m buddhaana saasana.m, saaratto, saaraago,  saarambho, avisaahaaro, cirappavaasi.m, dvitta.m, gantukaamo, gantumano.
text.665: [03] kata.m iti, ki.m iti, abhinandu.m iti, uttatta.m iva, cakka.m iva,  kali.m idaani, ki.m idaani, tva.m asi, ida.m api, uttari.m api, daatu.m  api, sadisa.m eva itiidha ``niggahiitamhaa, lopa''nti ca vattate.
text.667: [03] niggahiitamhaa paro saro lopa.m pappoti vaa. niggahiitassa  vaggantatta.m.
text.668: [03] katanti, kinti, abhinandunti, uttatta.mva, cakka.mva, kalindaani,  kindaani, tva.msi, idampi, uttarimpi, daatumpi, sadisa.mva.
text.669: [03] ^b^vaa^eb^ti ki.m? kata.m iti, kimiti, daatumapi, saama.m eva.
text.670: [03] ayampi ^b^vaa^eb^saddassa vavatthitavibhaasattaa  itiiviidaanisiipevaadito a~n~nattha na hoti. yathaa -- aha.m ettha, eta.m  ahosi.
text.671: [03] eva.m assa te aasavaa, puppha.m assaa uppajjati itiidha sare pare  lutte vipari.naamena ``parasmi.m, sare, lutte''ti ca vattate.
text.673: [03] niggahiitamhaa parasmi.m sare lutte bya~njano sa~n~nogo ce,  visa~n~nogova hotiiti sa.myogekadesassa purimabya~njanassa lopo.
text.674: [03] dvinna.m bya~njanaanamekatra .thiti sa~n~nogo, idha pana sa.myujjatiiti  sa~n~nogo, purimo va.n.no, vigato sa~n~nogo assaati  ^b^visa~n~nogo,^eb^ paro.
text.675: [03] eva.m sa te aasavaa, puppha.msaa uppajjati.
text.677: [03] ^b^ca^eb^saddena ti.n.na.m bya~njanaana.m saruupasa.myogopi visa~n~nogo  hoti. yathaa -- agyaagaara.m, vutyassa.
text.678: [03] cakkhu udapaadi, ava siro, yaavacidha bhikkhave, a.nuthuulaani,  ta sampayuttaa ibhiidha ``sare, aagamo, kvaci, bya~njane''ti ca vattate.
text.680: [03] niggahiita~nca aagamo hoti sare vaa bya~njane vaa kvaci  sukhuccaara.na.t.thaane. niggahiitassa rassaanugatattaa rassatoyevaaya.m.
text.681: [03] cakkhu.m udapaadi, ava.msiro, yaava~ncidha bhikkhave, a.nu.mthuulaani,  ta.msampayuttaa, eva.m ta"nkha.ne, ta.msabhaavo.
text.682: [03] ^b^kvacii^eb^ti ki.m? na hi etehi, idha ceva.
text.683: [03] eva.m vutte, ta.m saadhu, eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa, aggi.mva sanama.m itiidha  lopaadesakaariye sampatte yebhuyyena tadapavaadatthamaaha.
text.685: [03] niggahiita.m kho bya~njane pare a.miti hoti.
text.687: [03] eva.m vutte, ta.m saadhu, eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa, aggi.mva sandhama.m.
text.69: [03] idha avuttaana.m parasama~n~naanampi payojane sati gaha.nattha.m  paribhaasamaaha.
text.690: [03] ye idha amhehi visesato na upadi.t.thaa upasagganipaataadayo,  tesa.m vuttayogato vuttanayena sarasandhaadiisu vuttanayaanusaarena ruupasiddhi  veditabbaa.
text.691: [03] tena ``do dhassa caa''ti sutte ^b^ca^eb^saddena pariyaadiina.m  rahanaadiva.n.nassa vipariyayo yavaadiihi, yathaa -- pariyudaahaasi  payirudaahaasi, ariyassa ayirassa, bahvaabaadho bavhaabaadho, na  abhineyya anabhineyya.
text.692: [03] ``ta.m iminaapi jaanaathaa''ti ettha ``paro vaa saro''ti sare  lutte ``tatraakaaro''ti yogavibhaagena ^b^a^eb^kaaro niggahiitassa  ^b^da^eb^kaaro, tadaminaapi jaanaatha iccaadi.
text.703: [03] atthaabhimukha.m namanato, attani catthassa naamanato ^b^naama.m,^eb^  dabbaabhidhaana.m.
text.704: [03] ta.m pana duvidha.m anvattharu.lhiivasena, tividha.m  pumitthinapu.msakali"ngavasena. yathaa -- rukkho, maalaa, dhana.m.
text.705: [03] catubbidha.m saama~n~nagu.nakriyaayadicchaavasena, yathaa -- rukkho,  niilo, paacako, siriva.d.dhotiaadi.
text.708: [03] tattha pa.thama.m ^b^a^eb^kaarantamhaa pulli"ngaa jaatinimittaa  ^b^purisa^eb^saddaa ^b^syaa^eb^divibhattiyo paraa yojiiyante.
text.71: [03] yaa ca pana parasmi.m sakkataganthe, paresa.m vaa veyyaakara.naana.m  sama~n~naa ghosaaghosalopasava.n.nasa.myogali"ngaadikaa, taa payoge sati  etthaapi yujjante.
text.710: [03] ^b^adhikaaro^eb^ya.m. tattha pa~nca maare jitavaati jino, buddho.  jinassa vacana.m jinavacana.m, tassa jinavacanassa yutta.m  ^b^jinavacanayutta.m,^eb^ tepi.takassa buddhavacanassa maagadhikaaya  sabhaavaniruttiyaa yutta.m anuruupamevaati ida.m adhikaarattha.m veditabba.m.
text.713: [03] ^b^adhikaaro^eb^ pana tividho  siihagatikama.n.duukagatikayathaanupubbikavasena, aya.m pana siihagatiko  pubbaaparavilokanato, yathaanupubbikoyeva vaa.
text.716: [03] ^b^li"nga.m^eb^paa.tipadika.m, yathaa yathaa jinavacanayutta~nhi li"nga.m,  tathaa tathaa idha li"nga.m nipaccate .thapiiyati. ^b^ca^eb^saddena dhaatavo  caati jinavacanaanuruupato ``purisa''iti li"nge .thapite tato tassa  dhaatuppaccayavibhattivajjitassa atthavato saddassa ``parasama~n~naa  payoge''ti paribhaasato li"ngasa~n~naaya.m --
text.719: [03] tato jinavacanayuttehi li"ngehi paraa vibhattiyo honti.  ^b^ca^eb^saddaggaha.nena tavetunaadipaccayantanipaatatopi. kammaadivasena,  ekattaadivasena ca li"ngattha.m vibhajantiiti vibhattiyo.
text.72: [03] parasmi.m, paresa.m vaa sama~n~naa ^b^parasama~n~naa,^eb^ veyyaakara.ne,  veyyaakara.namadhiitaana.m vaa sama~n~naatyattho. payujjana.m ^b^payogo,^eb^  viniyogo.
text.720: [03] kaa ca pana taa vibhattiyo? ``vibhattiyo''ti adhikaaro.
text.721: [03] 63^b^.^eb^ ^b^siyo, a.myo, naahi, sana.m, smaahi,  sana.m, smi.msu^eb^.
text.722: [03] syaadayo dvisatta vibhattiyo naama honti. tattha si, yo  iti pa.thamaa, a.m, yo iti dutiyaa, naa, hi iti tatiyaa, sa, na.m  iti catutthii, smaa, hi iti pa~ncamii, sa, na.m iti cha.t.thii, smi.m, su  iti sattamii.
text.723: [03] ida.m ^a^M0.0043^ea^ pana sa~n~naadhikaaraparibhaasaavidhisuttesu  ^b^sa~n~naasutta^eb^nti da.t.thabba.m, vutta~nhi vuttiya.m ``vibhattiiccanena  kvattho, amhassa mama.m savibhattissa se''ti, itarathaa purimasuttena  ekayogo kattabboti. ettha ca pa.thamaadivohaaro, ekavacanaadivohaaro  ca anvatthavasena, parasama~n~naavasena vaa siddhoti veditabbo.
text.724: [03] ekassa vacana.m ekavacana.m, bahuuna.m vacana.m bahuvacana.m, dvinna.m puura.nii  dutiyaatiaadi, itarathaa purimasutte ^b^ca^eb^saddena sa~n~naakara.ne  appakataniratthakavidhippasa"ngo siyaa.
text.725: [03] ``jinavacanayutta~nhi, li"nga~nca nipaccate''ti ca vattate. idha  pana padanipphaadanampi jinavacanassaavirodhenaati ~naapetu.m  paribhaasantaramaaha.
text.727: [03] yathaa yathaa tesa.m jinavacanaana.m uparodho na hoti, tathaa tathaa  idha li"nga.m, ^b^ca^eb^saddenaakhyaata~nca nipaccate, nipphaadiiyatiiti attho.  teneva idha ca aakhyaate ca dvivacanaaggaha.na.m, sakkatavisadisato  vibhattippaccayaadividhaana~nca katanti da.t.thabba.m.
text.73: [03] tattha vaggaana.m pa.thamadutiyaa, ^b^sa^eb^kaaro ca ^b^aghosaa^eb^.  vaggaana.m tatiyacatutthapa~ncamaa, ya ra lava ha .laa caati ekaviisati  ^b^ghosaa^eb^ naama.
text.730: [03] li"ngatthaabhidhaanamatte pa.thamaavibhatti hotiiti pa.thamaa. tatthaapi  aniyamenekavacanabahuvacanappasa"nge ``ekamhii vattabbe ekavacana''nti  paribhaasato li"ngatthassekattavacanicchaaya.m pa.thamekavacana.m ^b^si^eb^.
text.733: [03] si, oiti dvipadamida.m. li"ngassa ^b^a^eb^kaarato parassa  ^b^si^eb^vacanassa ^b^o^eb^kaaro hoti.
text.734: [03] suttesu hi pa.thamaaniddi.t.thassa kaariyino cha.t.thiivipari.naamena  vivara.na.m aadesaapekkhanti da.t.thabba.m.
text.735: [03] ettha ca ^b^sii^eb^ti vibhatti gayhate  vibhattikaariyavidhippakara.nato, ``tato ca vibhattiyo''ti ito  ^b^vibhatti^eb^ggaha.naanuvattanato vaa, eva.m sabbattha ^b^syaa^eb^diina.m  kaariyavidhaane vibhattiyevaati da.t.thabba.m.
text.736: [03] ``vaa paro asaruupaa''ti paralope sampatte tadapavaadena  pubbalopamaaha.
text.738: [03] pubbassarassa lopo hoti ^b^a.m^eb^vacane, aadesappaccayaadibhuute  ca sare pare, saralope kate tu parasarassa pakatibhaavo hoti. ettha  ca ``saralope''ti punaggaha.na.m iminaava katasaralopanimitteyeva parassa  vikaare sampatte pakatibhaavattha.m. parasarassa  pakatibhaavavidhaanasaamatthiyato amaadesappaccayaadibhuute sare paretipi  siddha.m.
text.74: [03] ettha ca vaggaana.m dutiyacatutthaa ^b^dhanitaa^eb^tipi vuccanti,  itare ^b^sithilaa^eb^ti. vinaaso ^b^lopo^eb^. rassassaraa  sakadiighehi a~n~nama~n~na.m ^b^sava.n.naa^eb^ naama, ye ^b^saruupaa^eb^tipi  vuccanti. saraanantaritaani ^a^M0.0007^ea^ bya~njanaani ^b^sa.myogo^eb^.  dhaatuppaccayavibhattivajjitamatthava.m ^b^li"nga.m^eb^. vibhatyanta.m ^b^pada.m^eb^.  iccevamaadi.
text.743: [03] ^b^tu^eb^ggaha.na.m ^a^M0.0045^ea^ ^b^bhikkhunii^eb^aadiisu  saralopanivattanattha.m, ``naye para.m yutte''ti para.m netabba.m. puriso  ti.t.thati.
text.744: [03] puriso ca puriso caati purisa purisaiti vattabbe --
text.746: [03] saruupaana.m samaanaruupaana.m padabya~njanaana.m majjhe ekova sissate,  a~n~ne lopamaapajjante asakinti ekaseso. ettha ca  ``saruupaana''nti vuttattaava siddhe asakimpayoge pu^b^naasaki.m^eb^gaha.na.m  ^b^e^eb^kavibhattivisayaanamevaasakimpayoge evaayanti dassanattha.m, na ca  vicchaapayoge'tippasa"ngo. ``vaggaa pa~ncapa~ncaso mantaa''ti ettha  ``pa~ncapa~ncaso''ti niddeseneva vicchaapayogasiddhiyaa ~naapitattaa, atha  vaa sahavacanicchaaya'maya'mekaseso.
text.749: [03] tattheva li"ngatthassa ^b^ba^eb^huttavacanicchaaya.m ``bahumhi vattabbe  bahuvacana''nti pa.thamaabahuvacana.m ^b^yo,^eb^ purisa yo itiidha ``ato,  vaa''ti ca vattate.
text.751: [03] ^b^a^eb^kaarantato li"ngamhaa paresa.m sabbesa.m pa.thamaayoniina.m,  dutiyaayoniina~nca yayaakkama.m aakaarekaaraadesaa honti vaati  ^b^aa^eb^kaaro, ^b^sabba^eb^ggaha.na.m sabbaadesattha.m, saralopaadi  purimasadisameva, purisaa ti.t.thanti.
text.752: [03] vaa icceva ruupaa ruupaani, aggayo, munayo.
text.758: [03] ^b^a^eb^bhimukha.m katvaa lapana.m ^b^aalapana.m,^eb^ sambodhana.m.  tasmi.m aalapanatthaadhike li"ngatthaabhidhaanamatte ca pa.thamaavibhatti hoti.  pure viya ekavacanaadi.
text.761: [03] aalapanatthe vihito ^b^si ga^eb^sa~n~no hotiiti ^b^ga^eb^sa~n~naaya.m  ``bho ge tuu''ti ito ``ge''ti vattate.
text.766: [03] li"ngassa sambandhii ^b^aa^eb^kaaro rassamaapajjate ^b^ge pare^eb^  vikappena, aduura.t.thassaalapanevaaya.m.
text.768: [03] ``si.m, so, syaa ca, sakhato gasse vaa, ghate caa''ti  evamaadiihi niddi.t.thehi a~n~no seso naama, tato sesato li"ngamhaa  ^b^gasi^eb^iccete lopamaapajjante. ^b^api^eb^ggaha.na.m ^a^M0.0047^ea^  dutiyatthasampi.n.danattha.m, ettha ca satipi ^b^si^eb^ggaha.ne ^b^va^eb^iti  vacanameva ~naapakama~n~natthaapi ^b^si^eb^ggaha.ne aalapanaaggaha.nassa.  keci aalapanaabhibyattiyaa ^b^bhavanta^eb^sadda.m vaa ^b^he^eb^sadda.m vaa  payujjante. bho purisa ti.t.tha, he purisaa vaa.
text.772: [03] ya.m vaa karoti, ya.m vaa vikaroti, ya.m vaa paapu.naati, ta.m kaaraka.m  kriyaanimitta.m kammasa~n~na.m hoti.
text.774: [03] kammatthe dutiyaavibhatti hoti. pure viya dutiyekavacana.m a.m,  ``saralopo''tiaadinaa sare lutte ``diigha''nti diighe sampatte  pakatibhaavo ca, purisa.m passa.
text.778: [03] yo attappadhaano kriya.m karoti, so kattusa~n~no hoti.
text.78: [03] loka aggapuggalo, pa~n~naa indriya.m, tii.ni imaani, no hi  eta.m, bhikkhunii ovaado, maatu upa.t.thaana.m, sametu aayasmaa, abhibhuu  aayatana.m, dhanaa me atthi, sabbe eva, tayo assu dhammaa, asanto  ettha na dissanti itiidha saraadisa~n~naaya.m sabbasandhikara.na.t.thaane  bya~njanaviyojanattha.m paribhaasamaaha.
text.781: [03] kattari ca kaarake tatiyaavibhatti hotiiti tatiyekavacana.m  ^b^naa^eb^.
text.783: [03] ^b^enaa^eb^ti avibhattikaniddeso. ^b^a^eb^kaarantato li"ngamhaa  parassa ^b^naa^eb^vacanassa ^b^enaa^eb^deso hoti, saralopaadi, purisena  kata.m.
text.788: [03] sabbato li"ngamhaa ^b^smaa hi smi.m^eb^iccetesa.m yathaakkama.m  ^b^mhaa, bhi, mhi^eb^iccete aadesaa honti vaa, purisehi, purisebhi  kata.m.

text.806: [03] yasmaa vaa avadhibhuutaa apeti, yasmaa vaa bhaya.m, yasmaa vaa  aadatte, ta.m kaaraka.m apaadaanasa~n~na.m hoti.

text.812: [03] bahuvacane sabbattha tatiyaasama.m, ^b^hi^eb^ssa ^b^bhi^eb^aadeso  hoti. purisehi, purisebhi apeti.
text.815: [03] yassa vaa pariggaho, ta.m saamisa~n~na.m hoti.
text.817: [03] saamismi.m cha.t.thiivibhatti hoti. .thapetvaa ^b^aayaa^eb^desa.m  sabbattha catutthiicha.t.thiina.m samaana.m ruupa.m. purisassa eta.m dhana.m, purisaana.m.
text.82: [03] saraa kho sabbepi sare pare .thite lopa.m papponti.  ^b^lopo^eb^ti adassana.m anuccaara.na.m. ettha ^b^saraa^eb^ti  kaariyiiniddeso. ^b^bahuvacana.m^eb^ panettha ekekasmi.m sare pare bahuuna.m  lopa~naapanattha.m. ^b^sare^eb^ti nimittaniddeso, nimittasattamii caaya.m,  nimittopaadaanasaamatthiyato va.n.nakaalabyavadhaane sandhikaariya.m na hoti.  ^b^lopa^eb^nti kaariyaniddeso, ida.m pana sutta.m ^a^M0.0008^ea^ upari  paralopavidhaanato pubbalopavidhaananti da.t.thabba.m, eva.m sabbattha  sattamiiniddese pubbasseva vidhi, na parassa vidhaananti veditabba.m.
text.820: [03] yo kattukammaana.m kriyaaya aadhaaro, ta.m kaaraka.m okaasasa~n~na.m  hoti.
